generated_caption: The annual value of Czech exports of goods to Russia reached nearly 4.3 billion U.S. dollars in 2019, marking an increase compared to the previous year. In recent years, the export value peaked at over six billion U.S. dollars in 2012.

This statistic shows the share of households in Sweden with access to fixed broadband connection of 30 Mbit/s, in 2017 and 2019. During the survey period, the share of households in Sweden with access to fixed broadband connection of 30 Mbit/s increased from 96 percent in 2017 to 98 percent in 2019.

In 2020, the population of China's urban areas reached approximately 941 million people, while around 338 million people lived in rural areas. The country has been shifting its population from rural to urban areas for decades, and this shift is still ongoing.

American football is a commonly watched sport both in the United States and worldwide. Some of the biggest stars in the game are household names and often divide opinion based on their public persona and fans'loyalties. During a January 2022 survey in the United States, 11 percent of respondents had a very favorable opinion of quarterback Odell Beckham.

In November 2020, a survey carried out in the UK found that 23 percent of respondents were very worried that the vaccine will not be safe, while a further 29 percent were fairly worried about this. Although, 35 percent of respondents were not worried at all that the vaccine will be ineffective.

On February 25, 2022, 1,087 patients were in hospital with COVID-19 in the United Kingdom. Since April 2020, when the highest number of hospitalizations occurred, the number of patients hospitalized with COVID-19 has decreased.

On February 27, 2022, 10,907 patients were in hospital with COVID-19 in the United Kingdom. Since April 2020, when the highest number of hospital admissions were recorded, the number of patients has decreased.

ESB Group generated a revenue of 3.74 billion euros in 2020. The company has generated an increasing amount of revenue each year since 2011 when it was 3.02 billion euros. ESB Group is a government-majority owned electricity supplier in Ireland. The utility was established in 1927 and used to hold a market monopoly.

In 2020, nearly 70 percent of cosmetics sold by Counterfeit in Russia were offline. The remaining 30 percent of sales were made online. The Russian brand Counterfeit, which is a subsidiary of the Chinese company Huayou, had sales of approximately 1.3 billion U.S. dollars in 2020.
The most sold cosmetic product among customers in Russia from 2019 to 2020 was mascara, with nearly 75 percent of the market share, followed by perfumes and toilet preparations.

This statistic shows the annual sales volume of whiting in Spain from 2008 to 2020, in thousand kilograms. 2016 ranked as the year with the highest sales volume of this type of products with around 533 thousand kilograms.

In 2019, around 17 percent of non-Hispanic white adults in the United States reported having anxiety in the past two weeks, compared to around 8 percent of non-Hispanic black adults. This statistic illustrates the percentage of adults in the United States who experienced symptoms of anxiety in the past two weeks as of 2019, by ethnicity and severity.

Due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, many cultural events have had to be cancelled in Germany and elsewhere. Based on a survey conducted in Germany in October 2020, around 60 percent of respondents agreed that they would be likely to spend the Christmas holidays in 2020 in a different way than in previous years. Around a third of respondents disagreed with the statement.

In 2020, the share of international tourist spending in Morocco stood at around 63 percent, while the share of domestic expenditure reached 37 percent. The share of international tourism expenditure decreased by around 15.5 percent compared to 2019, while the share of domestic tourism spending increased by around 15.2 percent.

In the first week of March 2020, sales of alcohol-based hand sanitizers amounted to approximately six million Argentine pesos. In the following week, the sales value reached 22 million pesos. The increase was associated with the COVID-19 outbreak, caused by the novel coronavirus ( SARS-CoV-2 ).

As of October 2021, over one third of higher education courses in Russia were provided by the Internet College of the National Open University of the country. Furthermore, 12 percent of the studied material was offered by the Higher School of Economics, and nearly seven percent by the Higher School of Informatics and Computer Science.

In 2021, the number of pilgrims on the Way of Saint James in Brazil amounted to nearly 90 thousand, out of which more than 87.5 thousand were men and approximately 92.5 thousand were women. In 2020, the number of pilgrims on this religious route had decreased by more than half due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The Way of Saint James is a popular route among Catholics in Brazil, with a majority of the believers walking the path in the beginning of each year.

In 2020, pop songs were the most popular music genre among male and female respondents in Russia, each supported by 35 percent of the participants. folk songs and war songs were named by 20 percent of the male and female survey participants.

Online payment methods have a lot of variations in terms of their implementation and the services they provide. Depending on the country, some of these variations can be significant. According to a survey conducted in France in 2020, the majority of French respondents considered that the security of the payment methods was the most important factor for them regarding online payments.

In 2019, around 81 percent of U.S. adults with depression reported no symptoms in the past two weeks, compared to just 3.1 percent. This statistic illustrates the distribution of depression symptoms severity in the past two weeks among adults in the United States as of 2019.

In 2019, around 19 percent of non-Hispanic white adults in the United States reported depression symptoms in the past two weeks, compared to around 11 percent of non-Hispanic black adults. This statistic illustrates the percentage of adults in the United States who experienced symptoms of depression in the past two weeks as of 2019, by ethnicity and severity.

The city of El Puerto de Liverpool, located in the southern region of Spain, was the most common area in the country to win the first prize in the El Nilo DRAW between the period of 2008 and 2021, with 43 consecutive victories. The second most common location for this type of achievement was the city of Barcelona, with 37 consecutive wins for the same period.
In 2019, Latin America and the Caribbean imported around 363.5 million U.S. dollars worth of barley, up from nearly 301 million U.S. dollars recorded a year earlier.

In the fourth quarter of 2021, gaming company Roblox Corporation had generated over 13.6 billion U.S. dollars in DAU from users in the United States and Canada. This figure is up from the previous quarter's daily active user base in the region, which amounted to 12.2 billion U.S. dollars.

As of February 2020, the majority of Hungarians believed that elderly people would get vaccinated against coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in some time during 2020. Another 16 percent of respondents was certain that this would not happen.

According to the survey conducted among Hungarian enterprises in April 2020, the accommodation and food service industry was expected to lose the most in the next six months due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak. The most popular answers were transportation, warehousing, postal services, and telecommunications.

As of November 2020, Amazon.com was the favorite online store among U.S. consumers with 58 percent of respondents stating that they had a positive opinion of the e-retailer. Walmart was ranked second with 14 percent.

A survey from 2020 showed that about one in three Italians would not be celebrating Christmas in the traditional way. More specifically, the respondents disagreed with the statement saying that Christmas is a holiday for Christians. According to the survey results, about one in four Italians would celebrate Christmas regardless of their religious affiliation.

According to a survey carried out in November 2020, the majority of respondents in Argentina believed that abortion should be legal in any case, because women have the right to decide. When asked about the possible reasons for abortion legalization, more than half of the Argentine respondents interviewed answered that the practice should be legal because women have the right to decide. The second most common answer was that abortion should be legal because the life of the person who decides should be protected.
Approximately one third of Russians planned to buy or order New Year's gifts a few days before the holiday. One quarter of respondents stated they would do so two weeks ahead of the New Year's Eve.

Over the course of the first two weeks of March 2020, the number of search queries regarding online education in Russian on the search engine Foxx doubled compared to the same period of the previous year. The search query `` Moscow Electronic School '' saw a 623 percent growth in the number of searches.

In the third quarter of 2021, Nigeria's GDP increased by four percent compared to the same period of the previous year. Between 2019 and 2021, the largest GDP growth in Nigeria was registered in the second quarter of 2021, at 5.1 percent.

In the second quarter of 2021, Nigeria's main import partner was China. Between January and June 2021, China accounted for about 30 percent of all imports into Nigeria. India followed with 8.3 percent, while Netherlands and the United States each occupied 7.6 percent of the total imports.

More than 50 percent of respondents were of the opinion that the best trend the fashion industry in Romania would follow in the coming years would be the digitalization of the entire industry. Only five percent of respondents believed that genderless fashion would be the best trend for the fashion industry in Romania.

A survey from April 2020 showed that the share of Italian respondents who believed that the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic would disrupt their professional life returned to normal in the summer of 2021 decreased from 27 percent to seven percent. On the contrary, the share of interviewees who thought their professional life would not return to normal until after December 2021 increased from 15 to 23 percent.
The revenue of the automotive industry in Romania was estimated to amount to approximately 25.6 billion euros in 2020. The highest revenue was recorded in 2019 at over 30 billion euros.

The first case of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in Norway was confirmed on February 26, 2020. The number of cases in Norway increased significantly at the beginning of March. By March 14, 2020, the number of confirmed cases in the country had reached a total of 2,453.
In the period from March 14 to March 15, 2020, the TV news broadcast NRK1 Lndaget led the ranking of most watched broadcasts with 1.05 million viewers. The international news broadcast NRK2 Lndaget ranked second with over one million viewers.

In 2021, due to the restrictions introduced by the Polish government to prevent the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ), many everyday activities of Poles have been limited. More than half of the respondents miss hairdressing and beauty salons, restaurants, and shopping malls. Every fifth Pole is most miss cultural and sports institutions, cinemas, and ski slopes.

The value of imported goods into Denmark fluctuated from 2010 to 2020. The total value of imports peaked in 2019 at 649 billion Danish kroner. In 2020, the total value of imported goods amounted to 623 billion Danish kroner.

More than 50 percent of respondents were of the opinion that the vaccine against COVID-19 would be very efficient or to a large extent. Only three percent of respondents believed that the vaccine would be very ineffective.

More than 40 percent of respondents believed that the most important priority for the new Romanian Government should be to improve the health system and to fight against corruption. Only three percent of respondents considered the treatment of Roma and other minorities to be the most important priority for the new Government.

In 2021, the wholesale and retail trade sector employed the largest number of people in the European Union, with over 32 million workers. The education sector had the second-highest number of employees, with around 27.5 million.

From 2015 to 2020, an average of 331 prisoners died in Texas prisons each year. In 2020, 332 inmates died in Texas prisons from natural causes, such as heart disease or cancer, while 186 inmates died from unnatural causes, including suicide.

In 2020, the most frequently given reason why an individual in Poland would not want to be vaccinated against coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) was that the vaccine was not yet approved by the WHO and/or Poland's Health Minister. Nearly 40 percent of Poles indicated this as their main reason.

In fiscal year 2020, the import volume of liquefied natural gas into India was around 33.8 billion cubic meters. This was a significant increase compared to the previous fiscal year. India had imported liquefied natural gas since 2012 through various channels.

This statistic illustrates the total amount of investments in biotechnology in Spain in 2019, by origin of funds. During that year, the total amount of investments from Spanish institutional funds amounted to 785 million euros.

In May 2020, a survey carried out in the United Kingdom found that overall, 21 percent of Brits were very satisfied with the government's coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) response, while a further 35 percent were fairly satisfied. On the other hand, 21 percent were very dissatisfied, with a further 32 percent being fairly dissatisfied.

The Norwegian TV show 'Familie Vogel'( in English : 'The Danish Family') broadcasted on Sunday ( April 3 ) saw a significant decrease in viewership in light of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak, compared to the weekend before. Among the viewers of the first four episodes, roughly 1.8 million people watched the show on March 13 and 15. The numbers were roughly the same for the first four episodes of the following weekend ( March 27 to 29 ), but then dropped to about 1.3 million for the last four episodes of the show.

This statistic depicts the per capita consumption of bottled water in the United States from 1999 to 2020. According to the report, the U.S. per capita consumption of bottled water amounted to approximately 45.1 gallons in 2020.

This statistic shows the per capita consumption of flavored milk and drinks in the United States from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the U.S. consumption of flavored milk and drinks amounted to 13.8 pounds per capita.

Of the 59 nuclear reactors in the United States, 43 were commercial power reactors that had been in operation for 30 to 39 years as of December 2020. Only four reactors had been in operation for 50 years or more.
The statistic shows the global market share of smartphone operating systems in 2013, by country. In France, the iOS operating system had a market share of 21 percent in 2013.

China is by far the country with the largest cumulative installed wind power capacity worldwide. As of 2019, cumulative capacity in China reached around 236 gigawatts. The U.S. ranked second, with a cumulative capacity of around 105 gigawatts. In the same year, global cumulative installed wind power capacity reached 650.7 gigawatts.

The timeline shows the national TV advertising spending during the NCAA men's basketball tournament ( March Madness ) from 2015 to 2019. In 2019, the TV ad spending amounted to 912 million U.S. dollars.

According to AV-Test, trojans were found to be the preferred means for cybercriminals to infiltrate Windows systems. In 2019, trojans accounted for 64.59 percent of all malware attacks on Windows systems.

In the fourth quarter of 2019, Spotify reported 4.79 million paying subscribers worldwide. Whilst this is less than half the figure recorded in the corresponding quarter of the previous year, it marks an increase of over one million in just one year.

As of March 2021, North America had the highest active Facebook usage rate with 71 percent of the population accessing the social network. Facebook penetration was lowest in Africa, where only 19 percent of the population used the social network. The global penetration rate was 35 percent.

The statistic illustrates the contemporary artworks with the highest auction price worldwide between July 2018 and June 2019. As of June 2019, the highest priced contemporary artwork was 'The Return of the King'by William Ronald ( Bill ) Reid. The work sold for approximately 91.5 million U.S. dollars at auction.

In February 2022, CCI's consumer confidence index in Poland decreased to -31.4 points, which is the lowest level in the observed period. In December 2021, CCI's index was measured at -27.7 points, which is also the lowest level recorded since the beginning of 2020.

This statistic gives information on the most popular social networks in the United States as of October 2018, based on monthly active users. During that month, over 206 million users accessed Facebook, making it by far the most popular social network in the United States.

In 2019, about 26,543 children in California were victims of child abuse and were seeking court action. Texas, Florida, Illinois, and New York rounded out the top five states with the most victims of child abuse in that year.

This statistic shows the share of children who reported on the amount of media consumption during summer compared to the rest of the year in the United States as of June 2015. During the survey period, 27 percent of responding parents stated their children consumed somewhat more internet content during summer than other times of the year.

In 2021, Brazil had approximately 162 million internet users. That year, internet penetration in the South American country amounted to 65 percent of the population. By 2026, the number of users on the Web is expected to reach 187 million.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. prison inmates who were abused as a child as of 1999, by sex and type of abuse. As of 1999, about 37.4 percent of female inmates who were abused as a child were sexually abused.

This statistic shows the selection criteria for smartphone purchases in China in 2012. According to the survey, 69 percent of respondents in China selected a smartphone by the design and the operating system being supported by the phone.

The statistic shows the number of active internet-enabled smartphones in India from 2011 to 2016. In 2015, there were about 166 million internet-enabled smartphones in use, and this figure was forecast to grow to 262 million by 2016.

In 2018, there were 2,631 inter-country adoptions involving U.S. children where the adoptive family was from China and the child was adopted via the U.S. court system. This is compared to 179 inter-country adoptions involving U.S. children where the adoptive family was from Russia and the child was adopted via the U.S. court system.

This statistic shows the cumulative total of Tumblr blogs from May 2011 to April 2020. As of that month, the social networking site had over 496 million blog accounts, up from 463.5 million in the corresponding period of the previous year.

This statistic depicts the sales share of the sunglasses market in the United States between 2010 and 2011, by retail channel. In 2011, 38 percent of sunglasses in the United States were sold at sunglass specialty stores.

The outbreak of the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19 ) had been confirmed in around 195 countries or territories around the world. As December 14, 2020, there had been a total of around 295,851 deaths due to COVID-19 in double-digit numbers in select countries.
The net income of Marriott International, Inc. amounted to approximately 72.9 million U.S. dollars worldwide in 2020, down from the previous year's total of 1.26 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the weekly mobile e-mail access rate in selected countries as of 2016. During the survey period it was found that 64 percent of respondents from the United States accessed their mobile e-mails on at least one week per month.

As of February 2022, mobile users in the United States spent an average of 25.8 hours per month on the TikTok social media platform. Video platform YouTube was ranked second with an average monthly user engagement time of 22.3 hours.
The statistic shows the share of digital revenue in 2012, by segment.

The statistic depicts a market share breakdown of the U.S. broadband provider market between 2006 and 2013. In 2013, the ten largest broadband providers accounted for 72.1 percent of the broadband provider market. The total number of broadband internet users in the United States can be found here.

In 2021, it was calculated that the United States had by far the largest GDP per capita of any country worldwide, at just under 69,000 U.S. dollars. The country with the second largest GDP per capita was Germany, at around 50,700 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. teens who reported owning a computer. The statistic allows for comparison of computer ownership amongst teens within different household income brackets in the U.S. as of 2018. The survey showed that 95 percent of respondents from households with an annual income of 75,000 U.S. dollars or more owned a computer, while only 75 percent of respondents from households with an annual income of less than 30,000 U.S. dollars reported owning a tablet.

This statistic presents the most used platforms among global app developers as of the first quarter 2014, sorted by region. According to the industry survey, 47 percent of responding app developers in South America were working on apps for the Windows Phone.

This statistic shows the global inflation rate compared to previous year from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the inflation rate worldwide amounted to about 3.17 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic presents the global distribution of mobile app developers as of November 2014, sorted by region. During the survey period it was found that 29 percent of mobile app developers were located in North America. Asia was ranked first with 33 percent of mobile app developers.

48 percent of consumers in the United States didn't expect that the coronavirus pandemic would change the amount of money that they typically spent on personal hygiene products such as hand sanitizer or hand soaps. However, almost 45 percent expected that they would spend more on these items.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans regarding the use of digital media and devices. The survey was conducted in 2012. 82 percent of respondents stated they regularly used television.

In 2021, U.S. imports of trade goods from China increased by 16.5 percent compared to the previous year. This was a significant increase from 2019, when U.S. imports from China decreased by 12.8 percent compared to the previous year.

In August 2021, the global Purchasing Manager Index ( PMI ) of the industrial sector stood at 53.9 points. This was a slight decrease from the previous month, when the sector's PMI stood at 54.6 points.

This statistic shows the number of Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties worldwide from 2013 to 2015, by region. There were 219 Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties in the Asia Pacific region in 2015. Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide. In 2014, Starwood Hotels & Resorts was the forth largest hotel group in the world in terms of revenue, followed by the Accor hotel group.

This statistic shows the number of Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties worldwide in 2015, by brand. There were 210 Westin properties within the Starwood Hotels & Resorts portfolio in 2015. Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide. In 2014, Starwood Hotels & Resorts was the forth largest hotel group in the world in terms of revenue, followed by the Accor hotel group.

This statistic shows the income of Starwood Hotels & Resorts worldwide from 2010 to 2015. Starwood Hotels & Resorts earned an income of approximately 488.1 million U.S. dollars in 2015. Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide. In 2014, Starwood Hotels & Resorts was the forth largest hotel group in the world in terms of revenue, followed by the Accor hotel group.

This statistic depicts the per capita consumption of fresh bananas in the United States from 2000 to 2020. According to the report, the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh bananas amounted to approximately 27.24 pounds in 2020.

This statistic shows the economic value of meetings and exhibitions to host destinations in the United States in 2019. The meetings industry contributed a total of 36.1 billion U.S. dollars to the U.S. economy in 2019.

This statistic depicts the per capita consumption of fresh fruit in the United States in 2020, by single fruit type. Bananas and apples were the leading fruit types in the U.S. in 2020, based on per capita consumption. The per capita consumption of fresh apples amounted to about 16.4 pounds that year.

This statistic shows the number of exhibitors at largest trade shows in the United States in 2019. According to the source, there were 15 exhibitors with a product presence at the largest trade show in the United States, with a company size of more than 500 employees.

Between the first week of January and the first week of March 2020, the number of users of online pharmacies in Poland increased due to the outbreak of coronavirus. The most significant increase was recorded in the number of users of Doz.pl, whose number increased by 7.2 percent.

As of March 2021, the gaming hardware company ROG was the most followed brand on Facebook in Hong Kong with around 1.75 million Facebook fans. ROG was closely followed by the travel company Bliss Travel with about 956 thousand Facebook fans in Hong Kong.

The graph shows the results of a survey among TV show producers and exhibitors in the United States regarding the increase or decrease in shows planned for 2014. The survey revealed that 25 percent of respondents reported a decrease in the number of national shows planned for 2014 compared to the previous year.

The timeline shows the per capita consumption of fresh sweet potatoes in the United States from 2000 to 2020. According to the report, the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh sweet potatoes amounted to about seven pounds in 2020.

The timeline shows the per capita consumption of fresh romaine and leaf lettuce in the United States from 2000 to 2020. According to the report, the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh romaine and leaf lettuce amounted to approximately 14.36 pounds in 2020.

This statistic depicts the per capita consumption of fresh sweet corn in the United States from 2000 to 2020. According to the report, the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh sweet corn amounted to approximately 4.86 pounds in 2020.

This statistic presents the generational differences between U.S. adults who feel it is acceptable to use social media for personal reasons at work and those who don't as of February 2017. During the survey period, it was found that 36 percent of Gen Y respondents, or those aged 19 to 30 years, reported that they feel it is acceptable to use social media for personal reasons at work, compared to only 19 percent of Baby Boomers.

This statistic shows the net income of MGM Resorts International worldwide from 2008 to 2020. MGM Resorts, a Nevada-based gaming and hospitality company, reported a net income loss of approximately 126.99 million U.S. dollars in 2020.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans on the level of fear they experience when thinking about the possibility of future terrorist attacks in the United States from 2003 to 2013. In March 2013, 48 percent of respondents stated they were very fearful.

This statistic shows the total assets of Wyndham Worldwide from 2008 to 2020. The total assets of global hotel company Wyndham Worldwide Corporation amounted to approximately 13.9 billion U.S. dollars in 2020.

This statistic shows the leading trade show promotion methods ranked by their importance to attendees in the United States in 2013. According to the survey, 48 percent of respondents ranked emails and eNewsletters as very or extremely important in promoting their trade show.

Due to the crisis of the coronavirus COVID-19, in March 2020 there was a large drop in hotel reservations in Spain for the Easter holidays that year. In the Balearic Islands, the most affected region, the drop in the first 17 days of March with respect to the entire month of February 2020 exceeded 100 %. Across the country, the decrease in hotel reservations compared to the previous month was of more than 40 %.

The statistic shows the venture capital investment in mobile and telecom subsectors in the United States in the second quarter of 2012. In that quarter, venture capital investments in gaming reached 3.1 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the percentage of Americans with HIV transmission misconceptions as of 2012. It was found that 30 percent of respondents believed HIV transmission could occur through sharing a drinking glass.

The statistic depicts the retail sales of telemark ski equipment in the U.S. snow sports market from the 2008/09 season to the 2015/16 season. In the 2015/16 season, retail sales of telemark ski equipment amounted to about 2.11 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the number of American single parents who have taken custody of their own children and were receiving any child support between 1993 and 2011. In 2011, approximately 4.6 million single parents in the United States had custody of their own child or children and were receiving any child support.

This statistic shows the number of American single mothers who have taken custody of their own children and were awarded child support between 1993 and 2011. In 2011, approximately 6.3 million single mothers in the United States had custody of their child or children and were awarded child support.
The statistic shows the college sports telecasts with the highest TV-rating in the 2012/13 academic year. Itai's Rivalry game broadcast on ESPNU had a TV-rating of 10.0 in the 2012/13 academic year.

This statistic shows the top 20 prescription drugs in the United States based on sales in 2019. In that year, the top prescription drug in the United States based on sales was Viagra ( sildenafil ), generating approximately 21.4 billion U.S. dollars in sales.
This graph shows the net area of trade shows in the United States from October 2010 to September 2013. In August 2013, the net area of trade shows in the U.S. was 3.2 million net square feet.

This statistic depicts the distribution of research and development expenditure of Henkel worldwide in 2020, by business sector. In that year, 57 percent of Henkel's global research and development expenses were used for their adhesive technologies sector. Total global R & D expenditure of Henkel was 487 million euros in 2020.
This statistic shows the share of the leading countries of non-oil merchandise imports to the United States in 2012. In that year, about 14.7 percent of non-oil merchandise imports came from Canada.

Gamification is the use of game elements in non-gaming situations to motivate people to achieve their goals. During a 2019 survey, 89 percent of respondents stated that they probably would increase their productivity by taking a gamification course.

As of May 2020, around 36 percent of female respondents in the U.S. believed that face masks were somewhat effective at preventing the spread of the coronavirus. This statistic shows the percentage of respondents who believed face masks were effective at preventing the spread of COVID-19 in the U.S. as of May 2020, by gender.
This statistic shows the percentage of jobs supported by imports to the United States in 2011, by sector. In 2011, 13.7 percent of jobs in the mining sector were supported by imports.

The statistic shows the controls taken to mitigate the new or increased risks related to cloud computing according to a survey of IT security professionals in 2012. As of 2012, 27 percent of respondents reported that they have implemented stronger contract management to mitigate the new or increased risks related to cloud computing.
The statistic shows data on the market share held by Ubisoft in Europe from 2011 to 2014, by quarter. In the first quarter of 2014, Ubisoft held 10 percent of the European video game market.

This statistic presents the share of teenagers in the United States who have posted or shared selected personal information on social media as of March 2012, sorted by gender. During the survey period, it was found that 93 percent of female respondents had posted their personal address on a social networking site.

This statistic shows the IT security investments planned by organizations worldwide as of May 2017. During the survey period, 46 percent of respondents stated that they planned to invest in security automation and advanced analytics.

This statistic shows the results of a 2012 survey among more than 90,000 respondents who are members of the LGBT community in all 27 European Union member states and Croatia. They were asked if they had ever felt that they were sexually oriented when they were a kid and had to hide their sexual orientation from their parents or other adults because of it. 81 percent of respondents in the United Kingdom stated they had to hide their sexual orientation.
This graph shows a breakdown of U.S. imports of goods in 2018, by main commodity group. In 2018, about 10.2 percent of all goods imported were fuels and mining products.

This statistic shows the revenue generated by Future PLC in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2011 and 2012, by business sector. In 2012, the company generated 21.3 million British pounds in revenue in the fashion and apparel sector.

The interest income from cash and equivalents at the SLM Corporation, commonly known as Sallie Mae, increased year-on-year from 2013 to 2019, before dropping significantly in 2020. This decline could be attributable to the effects of the coronavirus pandemic. At the end of 2020, the interest income from cash and equivalents at this publicly traded U.S. corporation, whose operations are originating, servicing, and collecting on student loans, amounted to approximately 20.4 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic depicts the likelihood of consumers to buy and wear Google Glasses. During a survey conducted in May 2013, it was found that 29 percent of respondents were very likely to buy and wear Google Glasses.

As of March 2020, 84 percent of Americans, aged 30 to 44, believed that hand sanitizer was either very or somewhat effective at preventing the spread of the coronavirus. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic gives information on the amount of money French consumers were willing to pay for monthly YouTube premium content as of March 2013. During a consumer survey, it was found that 15 percent of respondents were willing to pay up to two U.S. dollars per month for a single YouTube channel based on their interests.

This statistic shows the global cotton stocks-to-use ratio from 1990 to 2019. In 2017, the cotton stocks-to-use ratio worldwide stood at some 93.7 percent. The global production of cotton amounted to some 114.73 million 480-pound bales in that year.

This statistic shows the total production of cottonseed meal and oil worldwide from 2009/2010 to 2017/2018. In 2016/2017, the total production of cottonseed meal amounted to about 13.5 million metric tons worldwide.

This statistic shows the share of U.S. YouTube users who regularly watch favorite YouTube channels as of February 2017. During the survey period, it was found that 33 percent of YouTube users had more than two favorite channels they watched regularly. As of February 2017, PewDiePie was the most popular channel on the platform, according to the number of subscribers.
This statistic represents the gross output of the U.S. aircraft manufacturing industry from 2008 through 2019. In 2019, this industry had a gross output of around 135.4 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the average number of security breaches experienced by organizations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in the last year as of early 2013, by organization size. According to respondents, large organizations experienced an average of 113 security breaches in the last year.

This statistic shows the results of a 2015 survey among adult Americans on whether they think someone who has a tattoo should be allowed to get a tattoo without their parent or guardian's consent. 84 percent of respondents stated they think people younger than 18 should not be allowed to get tattoos without parental consent.
The statistic shows the monthly market share held by the leading smartphone operating systems in Japan from 2014 to 2021. In March 2021, Android had a market share of around 52.3 percent.

This statistic shows the population growth in Australia from 2010 to 2020, compared to the previous year. In 2020, the population in Latin America & Caribbean grew by approximately 1.28 percent compared to the previous year.
This statistic shows the distribution of ethnic groups in Australia in the state of Victoria in 2011. 25.8 percent of the population of Victoria, Australia were English.
Around 28 percent of male consumers and 33 percent of female consumers in the United States expected that they would increase spending on canned goods because of the coronavirus pandemic.

This statistic displays the remaining life years of selected world commodity reserves as of 2012. At this point, it was estimated that global copper reserves will suffice for the upcoming 31 years. It was further estimated, that nickel is one of the commodities with the shortest lifetime of reserves.

In 2021, the Chinese artist Hua Guanzhong's work `` The Eighteen Monarchy '', a series of oil paintings depicting the lives of the Eighteen Imperial Households during the Tang dynasty, sold at auction for about 784 million yuan in Hong Kong. The second place belonged to the oil painter Fan Zecai's `` Still Life with Fish '', which was sold at auction for about 276 million yuan.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans in 2011 on whether they think that Martin Luther King Jr's birthday should be celebrated as a national holiday, or not. 74 percent of respondents stated they think that Martin Luther King Jr's birthday should be celebrated as a national holiday.

This statistic depicts the value of the U.S. tableware market in 2012. In 2012, cookware generated about 3.3 billion U.S. dollars for the U.S. tabletop market. The total market value of the U.S. tabletop market was about 12.2 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the total floor space of the property owned by General Dynamics in 2020, by type. General Dynamics is a market leader in the aerospace and defense industry. In 2020, the company owned 2,700 square feet of office space.

This statistic shows the share of vehicle buyers who reported using various information sources to research vehicles worldwide in 2012. According to Capgemini, 52 percent of respondents in all markets consulted dealerships to research vehicles.

This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among adult Americans on which institutions in the United States they think are most affected by corruption. In 2013, 51 percent of respondents stated that they think the military is most affected by corruption.

This statistic depicts the results of a survey conducted in 2013 among adult Americans on the likelihood of discarding food that has gone off. During the survey, 55 percent of respondents said they would throw away food that has gone off, washed and/or spoiled.
This statistic shows the revenue of the ESPRIT brand worldwide from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, the global revenue generated by the ESPRIT brand was about 1.38 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic illustrates the global area of fresh fruit harvested from 1990 to 2020. In 2020, the area of fresh fruit harvested worldwide amounted to some 74.91 million hectares.
As of March 2020, 62 percent of Americans believed that hand soaps were very effective at preventing the spread of the coronavirus.

This statistic displays the number of performed transplants in the U.S. between January and March 2013, by organ. During this period, there were 1,542 liver transplants performed in the country. Organ donation can be given through both a deceased and living donor if blood and oxygen are flowing through the organs until the time of recovery to ensure viability. There are over 120,000 people in the country waiting for an organ transplant.

This graph shows the public opinion of Americans on Edward Snowden's leaks of National Security Agency intelligence reports. In July 2013, about 48 percent of Americans thought that the leaks had harmed U.S. security.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on whether they consider the sexual assaults of U.S. military personnel to be representative of broader problems with respect to the culture of the military, or not. The survey was conducted in June 2013. In June 2013, 54 percent of respondents stated they think sexual assaults of U.S. military personnel represent broader problems with the culture of the military.

This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among Americans aged 16 and older on qualities they are looking for in a close friend. 80 percent of respondents stated a close friend has to be loyal.

This statistic shows the results of a survey, conducted in 2013 among adult Americans, on things they would do to improve their mood. Some 37 percent of respondents stated they would pray or meditate to improve their mood.
The statistic depicts a breakdown of the telecommunications market in the Asia-Pacific region in 2012, by service type.

This statistic shows the results of a survey, conducted in 2013, asking the respondents which activity they think would extend their life expectancy. 58 percent of respondents believe that more exercise, both physical and mental, would extend their life expectancy.

The statistic reflects the opinion of the surveyed U.S. citizens concerning the power position of the U.S. military in the world. In 2011, 56 percent of respondents stated that the U.S. military will hold an absolute dominant position in the world in 20 years.
The statistic shows the number of deaths due to terrorism in 2011 grouped by perpetrator category. 2.670 people were killed by Sunni Extremist in 2010.

This statistic shows the revenue of the mechanical engineering industry in Russia from 2006 to 2017. In 2017, the Russian market for mechanical engineering was sized at around 26 billion euros ( or about 30 billion U.S. dollars ).

The majority of Russians believed that the level of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) would remain the same or increase slightly in the course of the coming year as of November 2020. Among those aged 60 years and older, nearly one half of respondents predicted a decline in the disease cases.

The statistic presents the distribution of merger and acquisition ( M & A ) transactions value in Europe in 2012, by sector. In that time, the industrials & chemicals sector had the largest share of M & A transaction value, accounting for 31 percent of the total value of all M & A deals in Europe in 2012.

This statistic presents a ranking of the most prevalent spam content categories in 2019. That year, phishing-related content accounted for nine percent of all spam messages. Adult content accounted for 10 percent of global spam.

This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among adult American smokers on how old they were when they first started smoking. 35 percent of respondents stated they were younger than 16 when they started smoking.

The statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Canada from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the gross domestic product per capita in Canada was around 43,019.73 U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in France from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. GDP refers to the total market value of all goods and services that are produced within a country per year. It is an important indicator of the economic strength of a country. In 2020, the GDP per capita in France was around 42,099.06 U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Japan from 1986 to 2019, with projections up until 2026. In 2019, the gross domestic product per capita in Japan was around 40,858.1 U.S. dollars. For further information, see Japan's GDP.

The statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in the United States from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. GDP refers to the total market value of all goods and services that are produced within a country per year. It is an important indicator of the economic strength of a country. In 2020, the GDP per capita in the United States was around 63,179.07 U.S. dollars. See U.S. GDP for further information.

The statistic shows the growth rate of the real gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Japan from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the GDP in Japan fell by about 4.88 percent compared to the previous year. For comparison, the GDP growth rate of China had reached about 6.1 percent that same year.

The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in the Netherlands from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the Netherlands'real gross domestic product decreased by around 3.87 percent compared to the previous year.
In 2020, China imported goods worth about 2.04 trillion U.S. dollars. This indicated a decrease in import value by nearly two percent compared to the previous year.

Between January and March 2020, the time spent on the internet in Poland increased due to coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak. In particular, the time spent on video on demand ( VoD ) services grew by 57 percent. However, the most significant increase was recorded in the time spent on information and news services, which increased by 43 percent.

This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Greece from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Greece was around 16.96 percent. Today, Greece reports the highest unemployment rate of all EU states.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in the Netherlands from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in the Netherlands was around 4.08 percent.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Poland from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Poland amounted to approximately 3.66 percent.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Turkey from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Turkey was at approximately 13.94 percent.
The statistic shows the life expectancy in Italy at birth from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the average life expectancy in Italy at birth was about 83.23 years.
The statistic shows the life expectancy in Japan from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the average life expectancy in Japan was about 84.32 years.
In 2020, the United States had the world's largest reserves of hard coal, at some 218 billion metric tons. China ranked second, with reserves amounting to around 137 billion metric tons.
How many people use Facebook?
In 2020, a total of 11.7 million metric tons of refined lead were produced worldwide.
This statistic shows the number of undernourished and starving people worldwide from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, about 672.5 million people were undernourished or starving worldwide.

In March 2020, the number of transactions in small retail stores ( from 500 to 999 sq m ) decreased by 13 percent compared to the same period last year. In contrast, in large stores ( over 40,000 sq m ), the number of transactions decreased by 26 percent.

As of June 2019, the most expensive retail location in the world was Causeway Bay in Hong Kong, with annual rents of 2,749 U.S. dollars per square foot. The second spot was occupied by Westfield shopping malls in Japan, which cost approximately 2.23 thousand dollars per square foot to rent annually.
This statistic shows the global crowdfunding volume in 2012, by continent. In 2012, the global crowdfunding volume attributable to North America amounted to approximately 1.6 billion US dollars.

Between August 2018 and August 2020, the number of U.S. Twitter users engaged with the platform increased by 78 percent. In comparison, Facebook's user engagement rate decreased by eight percent during the same period.

The statistic shows the average annual income of employees at selected banks in the United States in 2009. In that year, the average employee at the Bank of America earned approximately 98,000 U.S. dollars.

In 2020, South Korea's natural gas consumption amounted to approximately 2.2 exajoules. According to the source, the data only include fuels that were consumed for the purpose of final consumption and thus excludes fuels that were used to generate electricity.
This statistic shows the number of GLOBALG.A.P certified farms in Asia and Oceania in 2012, by country. As of December 2012, there were 1,520 GLOBALG.A.P certified farms operating in New Zealand.

The statistic illustrates the inflation rate in the Euro area from July 2020 to July 2021. In July 2021, the inflation rate in the Euro area was 2.17 percent compared to the same month of the previous year.

As of January 7, 2021, there were around 37.7 million people living with HIV worldwide, and around 28.1 million people on antiretroviral therapy ( ART ). This statistic illustrates selected key figures on the global HIV/AIDS epidemic as of 2020.

The statistic shows the seasonally adjusted youth unemployment rate in EU member states as of June 2021. The source defines youth unemployment as unemployment of those younger than 25 years. In June 2021, the seasonally adjusted youth unemployment rate in Spain was at 37.2 percent.

This statistic depicts the retail revenue compound annual growth rate ( CAGR ) of the world's leading retailers from fiscal year 2014 to 2019. During that period, Walmart had a retail revenue CAGR of 17.6 percent.

In April 2020, the international air cargo traffic from and to Mexico amounted to approximately 29.3 thousand metric tons. This represents a decrease of around 57.8 percent in comparison with the air cargo traffic reported during the same month a year earlier.
The statistic displays the number of runners-up at the World Cup by country. Germany has been runners-up four times at the FIFA World Cup.
In 2021, Roche's expenditure on research and development came to some 14.8 billion Swiss francs. This statistic illustrates Roche's expenditure on research and development from 2011 to 2021.
This statistic shows data on the operating profit of the Swiss-based pharmaceutical company Roche from 2007 to 2021. Roche reported an operating profit of nearly 22.1 billion Swiss francs in 2021.

As of 2019, South Korea had the highest number of computer tomography ( CT ) scanners per one million population. This statistic shows the number of CT scanners in selected countries as of 2019, per million population.

This statistic shows AstraZeneca's operating profit from 2006 to 2021. AstraZeneca plc is one of the top 15 pharmaceutical companies worldwide. The multinational company is headquartered in London, UK. AstraZeneca is focused on products for following major disease areas : cancer, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, infection, neuroscience, respiratory and inflammation. In 2021, the company reported an operating loss of some 1.3 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows AstraZeneca's revenue from its top product Pulmicort from 2006 to 2021. In 2021, AstraZeneca's revenue from top product Pulmicort amounted to some 968 million U.S. dollars.
The statistic shows the revenue from fixed-line data services in 2010, by selected country.

Tatyana and Vladislav Bakalchuk were the richest Russians in 2021, with a personal wealth of 29.3 billion U.S. dollars each. The couple was followed by the film producer and distributor Igor Potanin, who made over 27 billion U.S. dollars that year.

The figure shows the market share of the different types of juice ( ambittered, chilled ) in the European Union from 2003 to 2008. In 2003, the market share of chilled juice was only 4.6 percent, whereas the market share of ambittered juice was 93.5 percent.

This statistic presents the frequency of thinking about the number of calories U.S. residents consume from 2013 to 2014. Among respondents, 32 percent sometimes thought about the number of calories they consume in 2014.

In June 2021, the international air passenger traffic from and to Argentina amounted to approximately 115.7 thousand passengers. This represented an increase of around 1.7 percent in comparison with the air passenger traffic reported during the same month a year earlier.

The statistic shows the number of viewers of the Grammy Awards from 2000 to 2020. The Grammy Awards, presented by the United States National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences, had a total of 5.03 million viewers on TV in 2020.

This statistic depicts the results of a consumer survey, conducted by Public Policy Polling in February 2013. Americans were asked about the impact of various factors on their decision to believe new information about food or health. Some 54 percent of survey respondents believe that personal experience has a major impact on their decision to believe new information.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adult workers who reported that it would be difficult for them to give up their cell phone or the internet. The survey was conducted in February 2012. It was found that 60 percent of workers would find it very or somewhat difficult to give up their cell phone.

In 2022, the North American industry is forecast to have capacity of around 22.8 million metric tons. In that year, the global production capacity of the automobile industry is forecast to be about 97.2 million metric tons.

This forecast statistic shows the revenue growth of the semiconductor industry worldwide from 1988 to 2019, with forecasts up until 2022. In 2019, the semiconductor industry's revenue increased by approximately 15.1 percent compared to the previous year.

The statistic shows the worldwide semiconductor chain revenue in 2008, by segment. In 2008, semiconductor research and development ( R & D ) accounted for 193.7 billion U.S. dollars, or about 46 percent of the total semiconductor chain revenue.

The online gaming platform, Steam, was first released by the Valve Corporation in 2003. What started off as a small platform for Valve to provide updates to its games has turned into the largest computer gaming platform in the world. Players are able to compete against each other, individually or in teams, in a multiplayer video game tournaments across the world. The most popular game on the platform, as of December 2021, was Grand Theft Auto V with an average of 115.8 hours played per user in the last two weeks.
China is the largest consumer of electricity in the world, using 6.86 terawatt hours in 2020. The United States is ranked second, having consumed 3.86 terawatt hours of electricity that year.

France has the greatest number of nuclear reactors worldwide. As of October 2021, there were 93 operable nuclear reactors in France. Comparatively, Japan had just 30 nuclear reactors at that time. In total, there were 443 operational nuclear reactors globally.

This statistic presents the reasons for being on Android according to users worldwide as of June 2015. According to the survey, 68 percent of respondents stated that they used Android for both business and personal reasons.

The production of motor vehicles in Europe dropped to an all-time low in April 2020 due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. The lowest vehicle production index was recorded in April 2020, with all countries displayed in the graph recording vehicle production index values of less than 20. Since then, vehicle production has increased significantly, reaching an index value of 83.6 in July 2021.
This statistic shows the number of asylum seekers in industrial countries from 2005 to 2014. In 2014, the number of asylum seekers in industrial countries amounted to 875,000.

This statistic shows the leading app developer motivation trends as of July 2013. During the survey period, it was found that 38 percent of responding app developers were motivated to create apps because they wanted to be successful.

The number of organized-crime related homicides in Mexico amounted to 28,017 cases in 2020. This represents an increase of around 36 percent in comparison to the previous year, when organized crime related violence took the lives of 23,942 people.

In 2019, the U.S. government provided 73 percent of total public funding for research and development on neglected diseases. This statistic shows the percentage of the top ten funders for public R & D funding on neglected diseases in 2019.
The figure shows a forecast spending for wired internet access via dial-up in EMEA from 2007 to 2013.

The market capitalization of the 100 leading global banks amounted to approximately 4.1 trillion euros in the second quarter of 2020. The impact of the COVID-19 pandemic can be seen by the dip in the first half of 2020, which had a significant impact on the financial markets globally.

This statistic shows the number of e-mail accounts among e-mail users in the United States as of January 2016. During the survey period, 63 percent of respondents stated that they had only one e-mail address.

The statistic shows the budgetary balance in EU countries in 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ). A positive value indicates a budget surplus, while a negative value indicates a budget deficit. In 2020, Germany's budget deficit amounted to about 3.69 percent of the gross domestic product.
The statistic shows the value of exchange traded funds assets under management in 2010, by country. In that year, the value of ETFs managed in the United States was 681 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the world's largest cities in 2010 and a forecast for 2025. In 2010, Tokyo was the biggest city in the world with 37 million inhabitants.

This statistic shows the market access rebates and discounts offered to brand name drugs by generic drugs manufacturers in the United States from 2013 to 2018, by component. In 2013, rebates and discounts offered to brand name drugs in the form of negotiated fees and cost sharing amounted to some 33 billion U.S. dollars.

Due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak, the average price of sports packages on streaming services in Norway increased by 333 percent in March 2020 compared to the same month a year earlier. This was a result of the sports packages being taken off the streaming services'menus, making them available as a stand-alone service. After the coronavirus outbreak, the sports packages were taken off the streaming services'menus, making them available as a stand-alone service.

This statistic depicts the global production of nickel from 2008 to 2014. In 2008, approximately 1.35 million metric tons of nickel were produced globally. Until 2014, this amount increased to nearly two million metric tons.

Indian Oil Corporation Limited had three of the largest oil and gas pipelines in the world in 2019, with a combined length of over 18,900 kilometers. The pipeline system was built over a 30-year span between 2002 and 2012.

This statistic shows the net revenue earned by AMD through their computing solutions segment from 2002 to 2013. In 2012, AMD achieved net revenue of 3.98 billion U.S. dollars through this part of the business. California-based
This statistic shows the net sales made by Sony Ericsson Mobile Communications from 2002 to 2011. In 2004, Sony Ericsson Mobile Communications generated 6.3 billion euros in net sales.

This statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita of Saudi Arabia from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the GDP per capita of Saudi Arabia amounted to approximately 19,973.46 U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the 20 countries with the lowest fertility rates in 2021. All figures are estimates. In 2021, the fertility rate in South Korea was estimated to be at 1.07 children per woman, making it the country with the lowest fertility rate worldwide.

The statistic shows the distribution of micro loan borrowers in 2008, by world region. In that year, more than half of all micro-borrowers were found in South Asia, with a share of 51.8 percent of the global micro-borrowers.

Since 1967 there have been numerous devastating oil spills around the world. The Prestige oil spill in 2002/2003 affected the Atlantic and Mediterranean Seas and was the second largest oil spill in history, with 320 million gallons of oil.
Singapore led the Index of Economic Freedom in 2021, with an index score of 96.8 out of 100. Switzerland, Ireland, Luxembourg, and New Zealand rounded out the top five.

In 2020, the United States was the country with the largest gross domestic product ( GDP ) in the world, with a value of about 21.3 trillion U.S. dollars. The country with the second-largest GDP was China, followed by Japan.

From 2016 to 2019, the rates of online purchase of reading materials in Luxembourg have remained relatively stable. In 2019, 38 percent of individuals in Luxembourg purchased books, magazines and e-learning materials online.
This statistic shows the 20 countries with the lowest inflation rate in 2020. In 2020, Sudan ranked 1st with a negative inflation rate of about 2.9 percent compared to the previous year.

As of January 2021, the App Store offered 38,857 gaming apps. In contrast, as of that month, the store had 1,055 non-gaming apps available. As of May 2013, gaming apps accounted for more than half of all apps downloaded from the Apple App Store.
This statistic shows the number of NGOs with consultative status with ECOSOC from 1948 to 2010. In 1948, there were 6 NGOs with consultative status with ECOSOC.

This statistic shows the share of public Wi-Fi locations and hotspots worldwide that were free to access as of the fourth quarter of 2013. During the survey period, it was found that 75 percent of public Wi-Fi locations and hotspots worldwide required payment to access.
This timeline shows the adidas Group's gross profit worldwide from 2000 to 2020. In 2020, the company's worldwide gross profit amounted to about 9.9 billion euros.
This statistic shows the adidas Group's financial leverage worldwide from 2000 to 2020. In 2020, the company's worldwide financial leverage amounted to about 49.6 billion euros.

The statistic shows the sales share of the ESPRIT brand worldwide in fiscal year 2020, broken down by product category. In that year, women's products accounted for a sales share of 67 percent of the total ESPRIT sales. The ESPRIT brand is owned by the ESPRIT Holding. The corporation operates in the fashion and retail industry and sells apparel, footwear, accessories, jewelry, and housewares under the brand label.

Sales of Puma apparel amounted to around 2.5 billion euros in 2021, increasing for the fifth consecutive year. The 381.1 million euro increase between 2020 and 2021 was the largest year over year increase within this segment in the last number of years.

The statistic shows the operating income ( EBIT ) of the Puma Group worldwide from 1993 to 2021. In 2021, Puma's global operating income amounted to about 558.5 million euros. Besides Nike and adidas, Puma is one of the largest sporting goods manufacturers worldwide.
This timeline depicts the number of abercrombie kids stores worldwide from 1998 to 2014. The global number of abercrombie kids stores amounted to about 205 in 2009.
In 2020, the most common fear about the coronavirus pandemic ( COVID-19 ) in Poland was the closure of shops. Nearly 80 percent of respondents were also afraid of food shortages.
This statistic shows the net sales of Levi Strauss worldwide from 2010 to 2021. In 2021, Levi Strauss'net sales amounted to about 5.77 billion U.S. dollars.

There were 15,000 metric tons of oil leaked into the environment in 2021. This was the highest volume of oil leaked into the environment since 1970. The highest volume of leaked oil since 1970 was 63,000 metric tons in 1980.

The timeline shows the profit of VF Corporation's work wear segment worldwide from fiscal year 2017 to 2021. In 2021, VF Corporation's work wear segment had a profit amounting to 27.1 million U.S. dollars worldwide. VF Corporation is an internationally operating company covering the lifestyle and footwear industry. The group owns more than 30 brands. The company's largest ones are `` The North Face '', `` Timberland '', and `` Vans ''.

The total aggregate attendance at games of the English Premier League has gradually decreased since the beginning of the 2020/21 season. In 2019/20, the total attendance at the games was at 11.3 million, down from the previous season's total of 14.36 million. The final 92 fixtures of the season were played behind closed doors as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The statistic shows the number of internet-ready TV sets worldwide from 2005 to 2012. In 2005, 1.1 million internet-ready TV sets were sold worldwide.
This statistic shows the population growth in the Philippines from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the population of the Philippines increased by approximately 1.35 percent compared to the previous year.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) at current prices from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. GDP refers to the total market value of all goods and services that are produced within a country per year. It is an important indicator of the economic strength of a country. In 2020, global GDP at current prices amounted to about 84.84 trillion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita worldwide from 2010 to 2020. GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year. It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth. In 2020, the global GDP per capita amounted to about 10,958.53 U.S. dollars.
The ranking shows the economic conditions for closing a business in 2009, sorted by country. In 2009, the general conditions for closing a business were better in China than in France.

This statistic shows the revenue growth of the largest construction companies in China from 2008 to 2009. During this time period, China Highway Engineering Corp. experienced the largest revenue growth with a 36.5 percent increase.

The global auto industry is anticipated to be affected by the outbreak of COVID-19 in all major markets. In China, the largest market for new vehicle purchases, the demand is expected to increase by 7.2 percent in 2020.
The statistic shows the change in the results of Nordstrom from 2002 to 2010.

Bridgestone incurred approximately 106 billion Japanese yen in research and development costs in 2018. That year, the company spent around 97 percent on research and development activities in Japan : over 98 percent of the company's research and development costs.
This statistic shows Hanook Tire's operating profit from 2005 to 2009. In 2005, Hanook Tire's operating profit amounted to around 308 million Kwanzas ( approximately 47 million U.S. dollars ).

This statistic shows the expenses for research and development of the Italian oil and gas company Eni from 2009 to 2016, as reported in the company's annual financial statement. In 2016, the expenses for research and development accounted for roughly 232 million euros.
The graph depicts the fair play table of the 2010 World Cup by country. Brazil is ranked first with 55 points.

This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among Americans on the amount of attention paid to selected scandals involving public figures. During the survey, 20 percent of respondents stated they paid `` not much '' or `` no attention at all '' to the sexual harassment scandal involving Hollywood actress Jennifer Hudson.

This statistic presents the reach of select media among internet users worldwide as of November 2015. During the survey period, it was found that 70.2 percent of survey respondents had accessed online search within the past month.

This statistic shows the percentage of internet users in the United States who were using Facebook Messenger as of Fall 2014 and Fall 2019, sorted by age group. As of the most recent survey period, 97 percent of U.S. internet users aged from 25 to 34 years used the social networking site's messenger platform.

This statistic shows the number of malnourished children ( under 5 years old ) by region of the world considering the factor of climate change in comparison 2000 to 2050. 76 million malnourished children were registered in South Asia in 2000.

The production of sheep and goat meat in the Middle East and North Africa is estimated to have increased by more than fivefold between 1987 and 2007. During this period, the production of sheep and goat meat in the Middle East and North Africa reached 5.2 million metric tons, while in India, it amounted to 0.6 million metric tons.
The number of libraries in Romania decreased to 8,851 in 2020, dropping by about two thousand libraries compared to 2019.
This statistic shows the wind turbine investments in Germany and worldwide from 2004 to 2015. According to the source, global wind turbine investments amounted to around 43.2 billion euros in 2014.

This statistic represents Germany and the rest of the world, for 2012, the share of wind turbine manufacturers being based in Germany. The rest of the world ( outside of Germany ) had a share of 86 percent.

The potential of solar thermal energy in Africa is estimated to be around 7.6 terawatt hours per year. In comparison, the world's potential in this sector is estimated to be around 1.4 terawatt hours per year.
In 2020, China suffered from the most natural disasters, with 29 recorded natural disasters. This was followed by the United States, which reported 23 natural disasters in that year.

In the fiscal year 2020-21, which ended in March 2021, video game publisher Ubisoft generated over 1.5 billion euros from its subsidiaries in the United States. The company's U.S. subsidiaries include Ubisoft ( for publishing ), Ubisoft Mobile ( for mobile games ), and Ubisoft Software ( for PC and console ).
The graph shows the number of internet users in millions worldwide from 2007 to 2009. In 2007, there were 7.13 million internet users worldwide.
The statistic shows a forecast for the number of iPhone and iPad sales from 2009 to 2011. In 2009, 20 million iPhones and 4 million iPads are expected to be sold worldwide.
The statistic shows the debt level of selected U.S. automobile manufacturers in 2009. The debt level of Chrysler amounted to 4.1 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows U.S. expenditure on the Iraq war and on U.S. soldier fatalities that took place after the invasion on March 19, 2003. In the period between 2003 and 2012, a total of 519.4 billion U.S. dollars was spent by the United States government on the war in Iraq.

This statistic shows the population growth in the United States from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the population in the USA grew by about 0.35 percent compared to the previous year. See the United States population figures for comparison.

From 2016 to 2019, the rates of online purchase of reading materials such as books, magazines and e-learning materials in Italy have been steadily increasing, from 9 per cent in 2016 to 12 per cent in 2019.
This statistic presents the value of funds raised by crowdfunding platforms worldwide from 2012 to 2014. In 2013, the value of funds raised through crowdfunding reached 6.1 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the budget balance in the United States from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the state deficit of the United States was at around 14.84 percent of the gross domestic product. See the U.S. GDP growth rate here.

This statistic shows the estimated main import partners for the United States in 2019. In 2019, the most important import partner for the United States was China, accounting for 18 percent of all imports.
The statistic shows the population growth in Japan from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the total population of Japan registered a growth of about minus 0.35 percent compared to the previous year.

The statistic shows the budget balance in Ireland from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. A positive value indicates a state surplus ; a negative value, a state deficit. In 2020, the state deficit of Ireland was around 22.62 billion euros.

The statistic shows the national debt of Spain from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt in Spain was around 1,542.29 billion U.S. dollars. For comparison, the Greek debt amounted to approximately 375 billion U.S. dollars that same year.

This statistic shows the national debt of Spain from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2020, the national debt of Spain amounted to approximately 119.89 percent of the GDP.

The timeline provides data on online advertising spending in the United Arab Emirates in 2008 and 2009, as well as a forecast until 2012. In 2009, the online advertising spending in the UAE amounted to 19.5 million U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Italy from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, about 71.04 percent of the total population in Italy lived in cities.
The statistic shows the estimated main export partners for Italy in 2019. In 2019, Italy's most important export partner was Germany, accounting for 12 percent of all exports.

As of March 2020, almost sixty percent of U.S. consumers, aged between 55 and 64, reported that they were either somewhat or much less likely to go to a supermarket because of the coronavirus pandemic. This figure stood at just over ten percent for consumers, aged between 18 and 29.
The ranking shows the operating profit share per country of the world's largest 50 photovoltaic ( PV ) companies in 2009.
The statistic shows the ranking of the leading ICT countries worldwide in 2011. In 2011, the United States was ranked number one in ICT performance index with 76.5 points.
The statistic shows the share of IT in the GDP of selected countries in 2010. In the U.S., the share of IT in the GDP is estimated to be around 9.6 percent.

This statistic shows the results of a survey concerning smartphone operating systems in Germany in January 2015. During the survey period it was found that roughly 24 percent of smartphone owners stated that they would stick with their operating system even if a new operating system for their smartphone was released.

This statistic presents the market share of leading real estate websites in the United States in 2016, based on desktop traffic. During the survey period, it was found that 44.9 percent of all desktop traffic in the real estate vertical was generated by Zillow.
The graph shows the results of a survey among Afghans to evaluate the work of the President Hamid Karzai. In December 2010, 63 percent of respondents rated the work of the President as positive.

The graph shows the results of a survey among Afghans regarding the work of the United States and the NATO in Afghanistan. 54 percent of respondents rated the work of the U.S. and NATO in establishing of security as good or great.

This statistic illustrates the number of advertising and market research industry jobs in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January 2009 to December 2020, broken down by employee gender and type of job. In December 2020, there were a total of 149 thousand people employed in the advertising and market research industry. During this time, the number of male and females in both full-time and self-employment were roughly equal.

This statistic shows the most common types of blocked spam messages worldwide as of October 2013. During the survey period, it was found that 43 percent of blocked spam messages were found to contain sexually explicit content.

The statistic shows the areas of application for palladium worldwide in 2010. In that year, around 59 percent of the global palladium consumption was used to manufacture automotive catalytic converters.
This statistic presents the annual distance traveled by a heavy vehicle in France from 2004 to 2018, by vehicle type. In 2018, a heavy vehicle traveled an average of more than 32,000 kilometers.

This statistic shows Merck KGaA's revenue from 2014 to 2020, distributed by segment. In 2020, the healthcare segment of the pharmaceutical company generated some 6.6 billion euros of revenue. In the United States, Merck KGaA is also known as `` EMD Chemicals '' or `` German Merck ''. The company is headquartered in Darmstadt. Founded in 1668, Merck is the oldest operating chemical and pharmaceutical company worldwide.
The ranking shows the number of employees of the world's leading home appliance manufacturers in 2008.

The statistic shows the weighted index of social justice in the OECD countries in 2011. The index is based on three dimensions : equity in economic opportunities, equity in health, and equity in education. In 2011, the weighted index of social justice in the United States stood at 8.5.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Russia from 1996 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Russia was at about 4.97 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2012 concerning social network usage. Individuals were asked, if they used social networks. In 2012, 91 percent of respondents reported using social networks.
The graph shows the proportion of chemical companies worldwide reporting on social responsibility issues in 2009, by topic.
The statistic shows China's foreign trade share with selected countries in 2013. China's share of German foreign trade ( imports and exports ) amounted to about 7.7 percent in 2013.

This statistic shows the share of individuals in EU5 countries and the EU-27 who accessed online services via mobile device in 2012. In the United Kingdom, 45 percent of individuals accessed online services via mobile device.
This statistic shows the annual shipment figures of kitchen clean up appliances in the United States from 2013 to 2017, by product. In 2017, 7.7 million dishwashers were shipped in the United States.
