This statistic shows the percentage of apps used only once after their installation from 2012 to 2019. During the most recent survey period, it was found that 25.1 percent apps downloaded by mobile app users worldwide were only accessed once after download.

In 2016, the Western Pacific Region had the highest number of incident cases of stroke, with around 13.7 million cases. This statistic shows the number of incident cases of stroke worldwide in 2016, by region.
The ranking shows the number of students per computer in Arab countries.
The ranking shows the percentage of schools in the Americas with internet access.
In January 2022, the inflation rate in China ranged at 0.9 percent. In comparison to the same month of the previous year, the consumer price index in China increased by 0.9 percent.

The statistic represents the global number of Bosch employees as of 2020, with a breakdown by region. The Germany-based multinational engineering and electronics company employed 132,900 people in Germany.

This statistic gives information on the average time spent on various smartphone content usage activities in January 2011. During a survey, it was found that smartphone users spent an average of 677 minutes per month on mobile messaging.

This statistic presents the distribution of mobile data volumes worldwide as of the fourth quarter of 2015, by device. During the survey period, it was found that 38 percent of mobile web traffic was generated via smartphones.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Australia from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Australia amounted to about 1.44 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the ranking of the most expensive cities for business travel in 2011, based on costs per day. New York was ranked as the most expensive city for business travel in 2011, with total costs per day of 552 U.S. dollars.

This statistic displays the share of respondents that uploaded content to social media via smartphone in the United Kingdom in 2013, by location. In 2013, it was found that 48 percent of respondents uploaded social media content to a location near their home or workplace.
The net income of Allianz Group fluctuated considerably between 2005 and 2020. In 2020, the net income of Allianz Group amounted to approximately 7.1 billion euros.

As of March 2020, almost one fifth of consumers in the United States reported that they would be much more likely to go to a shopping mall if the coronavirus were to spread to their community. Over 50 percent of respondents stated that they would be much less likely to go to a shopping mall in the event of a coronavirus spread in their community.
The ranking shows the number of subscribers of leading mobile network operators worldwide in 2010. The number of mobile subscribers of China Mobile amounted to 146 million.
The statistic shows the percentage of mobile social gaming users worldwide as of January 2011. In Asia, 4 percent of mobile social gamers used their devices to play social games.
This statistic shows the number of overnight stays in Germany from Asian source markets in 1990, 2010 and 2020. In 1990, there were 1.5 million overnight stays made by tourists from Hong Kong.

This statistic shows the average monthly household spend on mobile services in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2007 to 2017. In 2017, the average monthly household spend on mobile services was 46 British pounds.

This statistic shows the median number of Twitter followers of non-profit organizations in the United States in 2016, by sector. In the measured period, Twitter profiles of nonprofit organizations in the health sector had a median number of 18.8 thousand followers.

This statistic displays the number of individuals employed by McKesson Europe - formerly known as Celesio AG - as of the financial year 2006 to 2018. During FY 2006, the company employed some 26,300 individuals. McKesson Europe operates in 14 countries and is headquartered in Stuttgart, Germany.
This statistic shows the number of employees of Penguin Random House from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, 11,030 people were employed by the company worldwide, up from 10,328 a year earlier.
This statistic shows the number of employees working at selected German biotechnology companies in 2017. At this time, German company Qiagen N.V. employed some 4,650 people worldwide.

In December 2021, Sony's PlayStation Network had 110.5 million monthly active users worldwide. This figure is up from just under 50 million MAU in January 2014, showing the growing popularity of the online gaming service.

The statistic shows a forecast of the increase of the world population until 2100. The global population in 2100 is estimated to be about 4.74 billion people. This would be an increase from 7.71 billion people in 2019.
In 2022, Poles will spend more on heating than in 2021. The cost of heating in Poland increased by 57.7 percent compared to the previous year.

As a result of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak, cinemas all over the world closed their doors to moviegoers for several weeks. During that time, Russian cinemas recorded a significant decline in box office revenues and had to increase ticket prices to cope with the costs of keeping the facilities open. On average, the price of a movie ticket in a Russian cinema increased by 44 percent between March 19 and March 25, 2020.

This survey shows the public opinion of Americans towards Russia from 1999 to 2013. In 1999, 47 percent of Americans considered Russia an ally of the United States. In 2013, 44 percent of Americans stated the same.

This survey shows the opinion of US air strike operations in Syria in response to reports of the use of chemical weapons by Bashar al-Assad's government, as of September 2013. In September 2013, about 49 percent of respondents opposed US air strikes in Syria.
The statistic shows the percentage of households in selected countries who have a personal computer. In 2010, 23 percent of the households in Luxembourg had a personal computer.

In the third fiscal quarter of 2022, which ended on December 31, 2021, video game publisher Electronic Arts ( EA ) reported a net income of 99 million U.S. dollars. This marks a significant increase from the net loss of 1.57 billion U.S. dollars that the company recorded in the second quarter of 2020.

The statistic shows a comparison of the results of a survey among Americans in 2011 and in 2013 on the reaons for mass shootings. They were asked how much they think drug use is responsible for these shootings. In January 2011, 41 percent of respondents said drug use was to blame a `` great deal '' for these shootings. In 2013, 40 percent of respondents said the same.

This statistic shows the average number of days it has taken for new passenger cars registered in Japan from December 2011 to September 2012 to reach their delivery destination, by manufacturer and type of delivery. In December 2011, it took an average of 4.5 days for a new Toyota car to be delivered to its customer.

The statistic shows the percentage of taxes and social security contributions of the annual gross salary of a employed person with a average income and no children living in a OECD country in 2013. The annual gross salary of a employed person with average income and no children in Germany had to pay 43.1 percent of their income in taxes and social security contributions.

This statistic shows a forecast about the migration balance for developed regions from 2015 to 2050. From 2015 to 2020, the net migration balance of developed regions is expected to be about 14 million people. This figure is expected to be about 11.6 million between 2020 and 2025.

In 2019, the market research and development department of Beiersdorf AG employed 1,370 people. Beiersdorf AG is a multinational corporation based in Hamburg, Germany, manufacturing products for personal care.

The statistic shows the 15 countries with the highest political instability in the period 2009/2010. With a political instability index of 8.8, Afghanistan was the country with the world's largest political instability in 2009/2010.
In 2019, the share of population over 65 years in Greece was 34.7 percent, the highest in Europe. By comparison, the share of population over 65 years in Norway was only 12.5 percent.

The statistic shows the ranking of the countries with the highest political stability in the period 2009/2010. With a political stability score of 3.61, Norway was the country with the world's highest political stability in 2009/2010.

This statistic shows the share of mobile internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2009 and 2013, broken down by gender. In 2013, 48 percent of all mobile internet users were female, up from 21 percent in 2009.

The statistic depicts the exports of orange juice concentrate from Brazil by export region in 2009. Brazil exported orange juice concentrate to the European Union's 27 countries ( including the UK ) to a value of 66.5 million U.S. dollars in 2009.

This statistic shows data on the global revenue of the German company Essilor from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, Essilor had a global revenue of approximately 6.8 billion euros. Essilor had a majority stake in Luxottica until early 2020.

In 2020, Airbus'operating revenue amounted to around 53.5 billion euros, compared with just under 36 billion euros in 2019. The decrease in revenue comes as a result of the coronavirus pandemic, which has impacted the entire aerospace industry.

In 2020, more people died in natural disasters in Europe than in any other continent. In Europe, 42.9 percent of fatalities from natural disasters occurred in 2020. In comparison, 40.1 percent of fatalities from natural disasters occurred in Asia.

This statistic shows a comparison of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) and the national debt in selected euro countries in 2020. In 2020, Italy's GDP amounted to approximately 1.9 trillion euros, while its national debt amounted to approximately 2.6 trillion euros.
The statistic shows the median wealth of US lawmakers in Congress from 2004 to 2010, for both parties. In 2010, the median wealth of a Republican member of Congress was 0.88 million U.S. dollars.
This statistic displays computer usage penetration in the United Kingdom from 2004 to 2017, by gender and age. In 2017, 94 percent of all males aged 16 to 74 years used computers.
The statistic shows the reinsurance losses of Munich Re from natural disasters from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, the reinsurance losses of Munich Re due to natural disasters amounted to 1.1 billion euros.

Rates of online purchase of household goods in Cyprus have remained relatively low, with a low of 3 percent in 2016. However, in 2019 this share increased to 9 percent, the highest over the period of time in consideration.

This statistic presents the time spent on leading app categories on iOS and Android devices in South Korea in 2013. During the survey period, it was found that Android users spent an average of 51 minutes on gaming apps per day while iOS users spent approximately 49 minutes on the same kind of apps.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Spain from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Spain amounted to about 52.19 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

In 2021, Rome was by far the largest city in Italy. With 2.8 million inhabitants, the Eternal City accounted for about 13 percent of the Italian population. Milan followed in the ranking with roughly 1.4 million citizens, while Naples was the third largest city in the country, with 936 thousand residents.

The statistic presents the distribution of the workforce across economic sectors in Mexico from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, 12.6 percent of the workforce in Mexico were employed in agriculture, 25.37 percent in industry and 62.27 percent in services.

This statistic shows the U.S. dollar market share of energy drink beverages and shots in 2012. In that year, energy drinks were estimated to hold a share of 78 percent of the energy drink beverages and shots market.

In 2019, the hydroelectric production in North America amounted to some 738 gigawatt hours. In that same year, the global production of electricity via hydropower was estimated at approximately 3.8 trillion kilowatt hours.
This statistic depicts the total net sales of Sears Holdings from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, Sears Holdings generated total net sales amounting to about four billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic presents the gross value added ( GVA ) by self-employment in the hospitality and tourism industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2011. In 2011 GVA amounted to 797 million British pounds, compared to 643 million British pounds in 2009.

This statistic presents the gross value added ( GVA ) by tourist services in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2011. In 2011 GVA amounted to 383.8 billion British pounds, compared to 350.7 billion British pounds the year before.

This statistic shows the share of organic sales in Great Britain in 2012, by social grouping. Organic food and non-food products were most popular with the AB social grouping, where 38 percent of respondents reported purchasing such products.

Rates of online purchase of household goods in Latvia have remained relatively stable since 2016, ranging between 18 and 21 percent. The percentage of individuals to have purchased household goods online in 2019 was 21 percent, the highest over the time period observed.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the location of internet usage in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2005 to 2015. In 2012, it was found that 49 percent of respondents reported using the internet at home and elsewhere, while 3 percent reported using it only in shops.
The graph shows data on the desire to see the Super Bowl ads in Canada from 2012 to 2014. During a survey, 53 percent of respondents stated they were hoping to see Super Bowl ads in 2014.

This statistic shows the average age in years of light commercial vehicles ( LCVs ) on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2007 and 2015, including projections for 2014 and 2015. The average age of the vehicles can give an idea about how often people are buying new cars, so the older the average vehicle, the longer people are sticking with their old cars rather than buying new ones. Thus the number of people holding on to their aging LCVs wa projected to steadily increase from 2012.

This statistic displays the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2014 concerning the hours of internet use per week, by gender and location. In 2014, 13.6 hours of weekly internet use was reported by male respondents.

This statistic shows the share of part-time employees in the hospitality and tourism sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) by industry in 2011. 45 percent of employees in pubs, bars and nightclubs were on a part-time basis.

The statistic shows the most expensive cities to buy a Club Sandwich worldwide as of May 2014. In 2014, the most expensive city to buy a Club Sandwich was New York City, United States, with a Sandwich costing 32.50 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the games with the longest average video game session times on the launch month platform Raptr in 2013. Raptr users played their longest average game sessions without a break while playing World of Warcraft, with an average session time of 3.14 hours.

The value of fixed income funds under management in the United Kingdom ( UK ) increased overall from January 2020 to December 2021. As of December 2021, the value of fixed income funds was approximately 321 billion British pounds ( GBP ).

This statistic illustrates the net value of retail sales of overseas funds in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from May 2014 to November 2015. It can be seen that the net value of retail sales of overseas funds fluctuated during the period under observation, reaching a value of negative 554 million British pounds ( GBP ) as of November 2015. The largest net value of retail sales of overseas funds during this period was found in October 2015, when net sales of overseas funds reached a value of 1.4 billion British pounds ( GBP ).

This statistic illustrates the total value of overseas funds under management in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from May 2014 to November 2015. It can be seen that the value of overseas funds under management fluctuated during the period under observation, reaching a value of approximately 89.6 billion British pounds as of November 2015. The smallest value of overseas funds under management in the United Kingdom ( UK ) during this period was found in June 2014, when a total of approximately 71.9 billion British pounds of funds were recorded.

According to a survey conducted to understand the impact of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) on Indian businesses, over 30 percent of respondents indicated that they are not able to reduce costs in the current situation. Survey respondents included members belonging to Indian private and public corporate sectors and multinational companies.

This statistic shows the political parties and their respective results at the European Parliament Elections in Northern Ireland ( NI ) in 2014. In 2014, the European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) had 25.4 percent of the votes.

This survey shows the proportion of accommodation and food premises experiencing crime in England and Wales in 2014, by incident type. In the 12 months prior to survey, approximately 13,000 premises experienced burglaries ( including attempts ), making it the most common form of crime experienced by accommodation and food businesses.

This survey shows the proportion of arts, entertainment and recreation premises experiencing crime in England and Wales in 2013, by type of crime. In the 12 months prior to survey, 20 percent of premises experienced vandalism, making it the most common form of crime experienced by arts, entertainment and recreation businesses.

This survey shows the number of crime incidents experienced at agriculture, forestry and fishing premises in England and Wales in 2018, by business size. In the 12 months prior to survey, agricultural businesses with one to nine employees experienced a total of 72,000 crime incidents, making it the most common size group.

This statistic shows the number of vehicles which were excluded from duty in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from fiscal year 2015/16 to fiscal year 2016/17. The majority of vehicles excluded from duty were heavy goods vehicles with a total of 5.5 million excluded from duty in the fiscal year 2016/17.

This survey shows the reasons businesses gave for not reporting cases of burglary with entry on their premises to the police in England and Wales in 2014. Of respondents, over half said the reason for not reporting was due to there being no loss or the crime being trivial.

This survey shows the reasons businesses gave for not reporting online crime to the police in England and Wales in 2012/2014. Of respondents, 39 percent said they did not report the crime due to lack of police engagement, such as believing the police could not have done anything, would not be interested or had not done anything in the past.

This statistic shows the preferred online devices used by employees of the United States when working remotely as of February 2014. During the survey period, it was found that 85 percent of all remote workers used a laptop when working remotely.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on food purchases in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households purchased approximately 102 billion British pounds worth of food, an increase on the previous year.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on coffee, tea and cocoa purchases in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households purchased approximately four billion British pounds worth of coffee, tea and cocoa, showing a gradual annual increase since 2014.
Rates of online purchase of household goods in Poland have been continually rising since 2016, with a high of 25 percent of all individuals having bought household goods online in 2019.

This statistic shows the number of new buses registered in Great Britain from 2006 to 2018, by body type. The majority of new buses registered were single deck buses. The number of single deck buses that were registered in Great Britain peaked in 2006 at 3,500 buses. By 2018, this number had declined to 2,000 buses.

This graph represents the main reasons why people use buses in London, based on percentages of total bus boardings from a 2009 to 2012 four year average. Shopping is the second most common reason, with 19 percent of all bus trips taken for this reason.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on health in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households bought approximately 21.3 billion British pounds worth of health products and services, including medical and pharmaceutical products and hospital and out-patient services.

This statistic shows the share of travelers from the United States who would drive in a foreign country on the opposite side of the road as of May 2014. During the survey, 66 percent of respondents said they would be willing to drive in a foreign country on the opposite side of the road from their home country.

This graph represents the satisfaction of bus users and non-users with bus destinations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. The majority of both groups were very or fairly satisfied, with 71 percent of bus users and 44 percent of bus non-users being very or fairly satisfied.

This statistic shows staff training types in the hospitality and tourism industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2011. 85 percent of employers reported using on-the-job training, while 83 percent also reported using health and safety training.

This statistic shows the rate of heart attacks in men with and without post-stroke thrombolytics ( t-pill ) therapy, by age group, according to the TIMI-SSC study from 2014. In the age group of 65 years and older, the rate of heart attacks per 100,000 persons was 3.7 with and without t-pill therapy.

This statistic shows the impact of the economy on the likelihood of travel among United States travelers from 2012 to 2015. During the survey in 2015, 52 percent of respondents said that the economy had no impact on their likelihood to travel.

This statistic shows the opinions of United States travelers on certain aspects of air travel as of April 2014. During the survey, 58 percent of respondents said they were unsure if they would be able to find a seat with enough legroom on a flight.

This statistic shows the most popular United States destinations for Canadian travelers in 2014. During the survey, 29 percent of the respondents stated that Florida was their favorite U.S. destination for Canadian travelers in 2014.
On May 31, some 33 percent of respondents in the United States stated that they are satisfied or very satisfied with the government's response to the pandemic.

This statistic shows the number of used Nissan cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2014. Although Nissan car sales were down in the UK used car market, the number of second-hand units sold actually increased between 2010 and 2014. In 2014 255,000 used Nissan cars were sold in the UK.

This statistic shows the number of used Volkswagen sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2014. Despite being one of the most popular second-hand car makes, the number of used Volkswagen cars sold in the UK decreased between 2012 and 2014.
This statistic shows the slowest growing luxury watch brands worldwide in 2012 and 2013. In 2013, the slowest growing luxury watch brand was Omega with a growth rate of -26.9 percent.

This statistic shows the number of used cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 according to car segment type. As with new cars, the majority of used cars are sold from the mini segment with more than 2.2 million units sold. The smallest segment is luxury with less than 0.1 million units sold.

This statistic shows the number of used SUVs sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2013. Despite being one of the more popular second-hand car makes, the number of used SUVs sold in the UK was low until 2011. This car type experienced growth in the used car market and in 2013 almost 489 thousand units were sold.

This statistic shows the amount of money spent on pro and contra care TV ads from 2010 to 2014. In the presented period, more than 408 million U.S. dollars were spent on TV ads for underdern products.

This statistic shows the number of used luxury cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2013. Due to being a specialist and expensive type of car, the number of second-hand units sold was low and continues to fall within the specified time period. In 2013 over 41,000 units were sold in comparison with almost 46,000 in 2010.
This statistic shows the most visited tourist attractions worldwide as of April 2014. Each year, 22.5 million people visit Niagara Falls.

This statistic shows the most popular destinations for North American honeymooners as of 2014. This region was the most popular with honeymooners from the United States and Mexico, with 67 percent of respondents choosing to travel there for their honeymoon.

This graph shows the average speed of different vehicles on dual carriageways in Great Britain in 2014. All vehicles had an average speed within the respective speed limits with buses, coaches, and articulated HGVs tending to be the slowest.
As of May 31, some 48 percent of respondents in the United States stated that they are more careful about their personal hygiene as a result of the pandemic.

This graph shows the average speed of different vehicles on different types of roads in Great Britain in 2014. All vehicles had an average speed on motorways which were built for motor vehicle use only. Cars towing and most heavy goods vehicles had an average speed which was higher than that of other vehicles. All vehicles had an average speed which was higher on rural roads than in urban areas.

This statistic displays the distribution of headache consultations at primary-care physicians worldwide as of 2011, by headache disorder type. As of that year, more than one third of all headache-related visits to a primary-care physician were due to migraine.

This statistic shows the combined debt of South Korea's largest container ship operators from 2009 to 2012. In 2012, the debt of South Korea's largest container ship operators amounted to around 21.3 billion South Korean won.

This statistic is based on a survey and shows the preferred alternative or complementary therapies for headache treatment in 2011, by region. Some 47 percent of respondents from Western Europe stated that they prefer acupuncture as an alternative or complementary therapy for headache treatment.

This graph shows the percentage of light goods vehicles speeding on different types of roads in Great Britain between 2002 and 2014. All roads have seen a decrease in the percentage of LGV's that exceeded the speed limit. In 2002, the highest percentage of speeding vehicles was on dual carriageways, at 38 percent, while the lowest was on single carriageways at seven percent.
This statistic shows the contents usually packed into children's lunch boxes in Great Britain in 2017. Of survey respondents, 94 percent usually pack a sandwich in their children's lunch box.

This statistic displays the percentage of U.S. women using prescribed drugs containing sex hormones between 1988 and 2014. In 1999-2002, some 15 percent of U.S. women taking prescribed drugs used sex hormones. Unsurprisingly, women are the largest demographic group of prescription drug users in the United States.

This statistic shows the airport market share of major car rental companies in the United States in 2013. Hertz Global Holdings had the largest share of the airport car rental market in 2013 at 36.1 percent.

This statistic shows the favourite aspects of flying in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. According to the survey, 31 percent of respondents said they were favourite aspects of free drinks and 29 percent said the same about in-flight entertainment.

This statistic shows the responses that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) gave when asked : `` Thinking forward now, how do you think air travel or flying in future will evolve? '' In 2013, 60 percent of respondents said they expect air travel to become cheaper and more accessible for everyone.

In February 2020, the international air cargo and mail traffic from and to Peru amounted to approximately 18.4 thousand metric tons. This represents a decrease of around 23.6 percent in comparison with the air cargo and mail traffic reported during the same month a year earlier.
This statistic shows the per capita real Gross Domestic Product of California from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the per capita real GDP of California stood at 70,717 chained 2012 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the total amount of profit or loss before tax and exceptional items for the twelve leading United Kingdom ( UK ) airline companies in 2013/2014, in thousand British pounds. British Airways had the highest net profit in this period at over 367.5 million British pounds. Second and third were EasyJet and Thomson Airways.

This statistic shows passenger satisfaction with security screening at Stansted Airport in the United Kingdom ( UK ) frim 2016 to 2019. During the 2019 survey, 81 percent of passengers reported being very or fairly satisfied, while five percent were very or fairly dissatisfied.
This statistic shows the per capita real Gross Domestic Product of Pennsylvania from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the per capita real GDP of Pennsylvania stood at 56,664 chained 2012 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the price of tickets for a single journey on the London Underground in zones 1-4 paying by cash between 2004 and 2015. The price for a single ticket remained at four British pounds between 2009 and 2012 before increasing to 5.60 British pounds in 2013. In 2016, the price was 5.90 British pounds.

In 2020, the average annual household expenditure on hair care products in the United States amounted to 64.97 U.S. dollars per consumer unit. This figure represents a decrease from the previous year, when U.S. consumers spent 77.23 U.S. dollars on hair care products annually.

This statistic displays the leading cheese brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ), according to a survey conducted November 2013. Of respondents, 51 percent purchased Cheddar cheese brand, ranking it as most popular cheese brand.

This statistic illustrates the leading five exporting countries of spirits into the United Kingdom in 2020, ranked by export value. The United States ranked highest, with spirits exports valuing over 263 million British pounds, followed by Germany accounting for approximately 72 million British pounds worth of exports.

In 2021, the United States was the leading destination country for the export of tobacco from the United Kingdom. With an export value of approximately 1.6 billion British pounds, the U.S. was more than twice as the country with the second highest value of exported tobacco.
This statistic shows the influence of product quality on sports footwear purchase decisions. 6 % of respondents rated product quality as extremely important.

As of March 2020, almost half of consumers in the United States stated that they had reduced their spending on day-to-day in-store purchases because of the coronavirus pandemic. This figure was even higher for consumers in Italy, with 79 percent of consumers there having reduced their spending on in-store purchases.

This statistic shows the sales of the Richemont Group worldwide in FY2020/21, by distribution channel. In that year, the sales generated by the Richemont Group's retail channel was about 7.24 billion euros.

This statistic depicts the research and development expenses of Church & Dwight worldwide from 2009 to 2020. In 2020, Church & Dwight's global R & D expenditure amounted to approximately 103.1 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the annual trend in the sales volume of flowers, plants, seeds, fertilizers and pet foods ( quantity bought ) in Great Britain from 2011 to 2020. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2018 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, sales within this sector generally increased, except in the year 2020, when sales reached an all-time low of 79.9.

This statistic shows the most popular United States city destinations as of June 2014, by average guest hotel rating. New York City was the most popular city destination in the United States with an average guest hotel rating of 4.1.

This statistic displays the countries with the highest share of the population that is overweight or obese as of 2016. In that year, around 89 percent of the population in Mexico was overweight or obese. Obesity rates in Mexico are more than double the rate of obesity in the United States as a whole.

This statistic depicts the types of dietary supplements used by U.S. adults who take dietary supplements. The statistic is based on a survey conducted in August 2018. Some 28 percent of female U.S. adults reported taking calcium supplements. The nutritional supplement industry has seen a large growth in the market, especially in protein supplements and vitamins.

This statistic shows the percentage of shoppers who plan to buy a brand before shopping in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, by category. Of respondents, 67 percent of shoppers in the clothing and textile market said they plan to buy a brand before shopping, while 28 percent of shoppers in the food market said the same.

This statistic shows the taste rating of selected burger restaurant chains in the United States as of July 2014. During the survey, consumers gave burger restaurant chain Five Guys Burger and Steakhouse a taste rating of 8.1 out of 10.
The statistic shows the number of health and fitness clubs in European countries from 2013 to 2020. In Germany, the number of health & fitness clubs decreased from 8,603 in 2017 to 8,004 in 2020.
This statistic shows the most frequent tippers while on vacation as of June 2014, by nationality. During the survey, 31 percent of respondents from Spain said they left a tip when staying in a hotel.

As of February 2022, the annual online marketplace transaction value in Chile amounted to approximately 7.7 million U.S. dollars. According to a January 2022 survey, online shopping has been increasing in popularity among the South American population during the last few years.

From March 16 to 22, 2020, during the outbreak of the novel coronavirus ( SARS-CoV-2 ), which causes the COVID-19, online sales of health items in Brazil increased by nearly 125 percent compared to the week before. E-commerce sales of health-related products increased by more than 40 percent.

This statistic gives information on the mobile internet penetration in Australia from 2015 to 2021. In 2016, 68.5 percent of the population accessed the internet from their mobile device. This figure is expected to grow to 74.3 percent in 2021.

This statistic presents the total annual turnover of the retail sales of bakery products and cereals ( including rice and pasta ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, turnover from the retail sales of bakery products and cereals amounted to approximately 23 billion British pounds.

This statistic shows the total annual revenue of the retail sale of tools and equipment for house and garden in the United Kingdom from 2008 to 2019. Over this period, tools and equipment retail revenue increased from approximately 3.1 billion British pounds in 2008 to approximately 5.1 billion in 2019.

This statistic shows the willingness of survey respondents to reduce travel by car in order to help the environment in England between 2011 and 2020. The share of respondents who agreed or strongly agreed that they should reduce car travel for environmental reasons increased from 31 percent in 2011 to 32 percent in 2020.

This statistic shows the share of opinions on alcohol consumption and driving in Great Britain between 2006 and 2017. In 2017, 39 percent of respondents agreed that people should not drive after having drunk alcohol, while a further 39 percent disagreed.
In 2018, international visitor spending in Paris amounted to 14 billion U.S. dollars, up from 12.7 billion the previous year.

This statistic displays the 10 most expensive U.S. states for a private room in a community and assisted living facility based on the annual cost of care as of 2020. Annual costs of care in a private room in a community and assisted living facility in Massachusetts amounted to 73,923 U.S. dollars as of 2020.

The number of licensed plug-in government grant eligible cars in the United Kingdom increased substantially between the first quarter of 2010 and the fourth quarter of 2020. In the first quarter of 2010, there were 1,800 plug-in cars and by the fourth quarter of 2020, this figure had increased to 267,837 vehicles.

This statistic displays the distribution of insurers'medical care spending under the Affordable Care Act ( Obamacare ) as of 2014, by segment. During this year, 30 percent of the insurers'medical care spending was dedicated to inpatient care.

This statistic shows the change in the number of ultra-low emission vans, which were not eligible for government grants, licensed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between the first quarter of 2010 and the third quarter of 2017. The number of non-grant eligible vans decreased from 237 in the first quarter of 2010 to 184 by the end of 2017.

According to a survey conducted in March 2020, around 21 percent of respondents in the United States expected to spend either somewhat less or a lot less on clothing as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the number of international overnight visitors in the most popular city destinations in the Middle East and Africa in 2016. Dubai had the largest number of international overnight visitors in 2016 with 14.93 million.

There were over 18.5 thousand seizures of cocaine by the police forces of England and Wales in 2019/20, compared with just over 500 in the previous reporting year, when there were almost 17.5 thousand seizures.

This statistic shows the number of people employed in the restaurant and mobile food service activities industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, the number of employees in the restaurant and mobile food service activities industry was approximately 1.07 million.

This statistic shows the carbon dioxide emissions of vehicles according to their fuel type in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in selected years from 2000 to 2017. CO2 emissions have been falling for all the fuel types aside from a slight increase in petrol emissions in 2007. In 2017, diesel vehicles emitted 122 grams of CO2 per kilometer, petrol vehicles emitted 125 grams of CO2 per kilometer and alternative fuel vehicles emitted 71 grams of CO2 per kilometer.

This statistic presents the most popular online shopping categories in the United States as of September 2017, sorted by gender. During the survey period, it was found that 71 percent of female respondents had purchased clothing online in the past 3 months.

This statistic presents consumer opinions on mobile-optimized websites in the United States as of January 2014. During a survey, it was found that 66 percent of respondents agreed that a website that is optimized for mobile use is more likely to contain relevant and useful information.

The number of tourist arrivals from China to Western Europe decreased by over one million between 2019 and 2020 due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. As a result, China became the fifth largest source of inbound tourists to Western Europe in 2020, accounting for around one percent of all inbound tourists. Arrivals from Central and Eastern Europe, however, increased by over 600 thousand in 2020 compared to 2019 as borders began to open up.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that having British citizenship is important for being  truly British  when asked in 1995, 2003 and 2013. Over this period, this share of respondents with this perception has only changed a little, increasing by only 0.1 percent overall.

This statistic shows the size of herbal cannabis seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. Most of such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were a total of 3,823 herbal cannabis seizures over this twelve month period.

This statistic shows the size of amphetamine seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. Most of such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were a total of 45 amphetamine seizures over this twelve month period.

The outbreak of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has changed the way smartphone manufacturers and vendors have been able to conduct their business, with shutdowns and disruptions all along the supply chain. On the user side, challenging economic conditions and employment insecurity has also led to consumers deferring their purchase of expensive items such as smartphones. While over 1.4 billion units had been expected to be shipped in 2020 before the pandemic, the corresponding number from the revised forecast is now roughly 1.3 billion devices.

This statistic shows the size of ketamine seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. Most such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were a total of 53 ketamine seizures over this twelve month period.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that immigrants take jobs away from people who were born in Britain, when asked in 2003 and 2013. The perceived threat of immigrants taking British jobs increased by seven percentage points over this ten year period.

In 2020, Mexico's tequila exports amounted to approximately 286 million liters, up from nearly 248 million liters a year earlier. In the last two decades, the volume of tequila exported by the country increased by more than 150 percent, in a mostly continual trend.

As of July 2021, the highest grossing Bollywood movie produced in India was Street Dancer 3K, earning over 320 million Indian rupees and over 340 million U.S. dollars in the global box office. The movie was produced by Red Entertainment and starred Akshay Kumar, who was also the leading actor in the list of highest grossing actors in India in 2021.

In 2020, 82 percent of tourism expenditures in Latin America were made for leisure purposes, while 18 percent were business-oriented. That same year, the region's travel and tourism sector contributed to approximately 10 percent of its GDP.

The number one cause of death among lower-middle income countries worldwide in 2016 was heart disease, followed by stroke. The death rate from heart disease was nearly 120 per 100,000 people. This statistic shows the leading 10 causes of death in lower-middle income countries worldwide in 2016, by death rate.

This statistic shows different dealership franchises'ratings of their manufacturers'sales incentive programmes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) according to a car dealership survey carried out in January 2016. The respondents gave a score out of ten. Renault dealers gave their manufacturer's sales incentive programme the lowest rating while the highest score of 9.2 out of 10 was given by Lexus dealers.

This statistic displays the average price of EpiPens in selected countries in 2017. In the United States, the average price of EpiPens was 4,722 U.S. dollars, compared to 816 dollars in the Netherlands. Mylan's EpiPen has seen significant price increases since 2009, reaching a wholesale price of 4,722 U.S. dollars in 2017. As of May 2016, Mylan planned to launch a generic version of its own EpiPen that would cost around 300 dollars, or half the price of the original.

This statistic displays the hospital admission prices for a normal delivery in selected countries in 2017. In that year, the cost of a normal delivery in a hospital stood at some 6,200 U.S. dollars in Australia, while costs in the U.S. stood at some 11,400 U.S. dollars. Medical costs in the United States are among the highest in the world.

This statistic shows the sales value of windscreen wipers, defrosters and demisters for cycles or motor vehicles based on PRODCOM estimates * * in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2018. The UK experienced a decrease in sales value over this period. The sales value reached 4.4 million British pounds in 2018.

In Brazil, Google searches for `` sanitrio '' ( which translates to `` hygiene '' in Portuguese ) increased 368 percent on March 15, 2020, compared to the average registered on Sundays from January 19 and March 8 in the same year. The search for masks was the second most popular hygiene-related search on the Brazilian search engine.

This statistic shows TV shows which most representative family reunion vacations in the United States as of June 2014. During the survey, 28 percent of respondents stated that Modern Family depicted in TV shows most representative family reunion vacations.

This statistic shows the songs which most representative family reunion vacations in the United States as of June 2014. During the survey, 40 percent of respondents stated that the song `` The Greatest Showman '' represented their most representative family reunion vacations.

This statistic shows the most popular subjects among females aged 15 to 21 years old in Great Britain in 2014. The most popular subject among this age group was music with 47 percent of females aged 15 to 21 years stating that it was one of their favorite subjects.

This statistic shows the results of a survey question asking UK consumers how ethical they think retail companies are in 2014. Of respondents, over a third ( 36 percent ) rated the companies as fairly ethical, while 39 percent thought most retail companies were not very ethical.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on self-identification as a feminist in Germany in 2017. During the survey period it was found that, among German women, the majority ( 70 percent ) defined themselves as feminists - someone who advocates and supports equal opportunities for women.

Scooters and mopeds were the most popular means of transport in urban areas in the United Kingdom. In the period between January 2020 and August 2021, a total of 6,857 scooters and mopeds were sold in the UK, with sales peaking in September 2020. That month, some 787 units were sold, a rise of some 21 percent compared to the same month in 2019.

This statistic displays the global inflammation and autoimmunity therapy market by condition based on the MAT ( moving annual total ) until the third quarter of 2015 ( October 2014 to September 2015 ). In that year, the global gout therapy market was worth 0.9 billion U.S. dollars. Autoimmune diseases are defined as the body's own immune system attacks its own tissues which can cause inflammation

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that Britain should take stronger measures to exclude illegal immigrants, when asked in 2003 and 2013. There was a net increase of 10 percent over these ten years of people with this belief, making up 82 percent of all respondents in 2013.

This statistic shows the revenue of GSK from 2012 to 2020, by region. In 2020, the revenue generated in the United States was some 4.3 billion U.S. dollars. The global revenue of GSK was some 14.3 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the most popular subjects among 15 to 21 year olds in Great Britain in 2014, according to a survey conducted by UM London and the Student Room. The most popular subject among this age group was music with 41 percent of respondents stating it as one of their favorite subjects.

In mid-March 2020, traffic in Italy decreased by over 60 percent compared to the same period in 2019. Traffic reduction during the coronavirus pandemic was most pronounced in Italy, the United States, and China.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that international organisations are taking too much power away from the British government, when asked in 2003 and 2013. The perceived threat of international organisations overrunning the British government has increased by 11 percentage points over this ten year period.

In December 2020, some 77 new sportbikes were sold in the United Kingdom. This was a significant decrease compared to the 261 sales made in the same month the previous year. Overall, 2020 has been a difficult year for sales in this sector, with many brands facing supply constraints due to the Covid-19 crisis. Demand is down as a result, with some brands unable to keep up with orders. Demand is typically highest in March and September, as these are the months when the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency distribute new registration plates.

This statistic shows the sales value of steering wheels, steering columns, steering boxes and their parts for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles based on PRODCOM estimates * * in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2020. The UK experienced a decrease in sales value over this period. The sales value reached 140.5 million British pounds in 2020.

This statistic shows the total number of non-moped and moped motorcycles sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between January 2017 and December 2020. As with other vehicles, sales tend to spike in March and September due to the release of new registrations. This also explains the lower sales in February.

In June 2021, Yamaha sold approximately 1,900 motorcycles in the United Kingdom market. This was a year-on-year rise of around 21 percent compared to the sales volume of the same month in 2020. Overall, 2019 was a good year for Yamaha in terms of sales. The company managed to increase the sales volume of its motorcycles, boats, and snowmobiles by around 23 percent, in comparison to 2018.

This statistic shows the number of auctioned cars of all age groups in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between September 2014 and January 2016. The number of cars fluctuated seasonally but reached a low point of approximately 57 thousand cars in December 2014.

The statistic shows the health care and immunization budget in India from financial year 2008 to financial year 2012. In financial year 2010, the budget for health care in India was around 20.5 billion Indian rupees and the budget for immunization was around 1.5 billion Indian rupees.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Cancer is an aggregation of diseases in which cells within a part of the body begin to grow abnormally, often spreading to other parts of the body. In 2019, 689 males and 548.2 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with cancer. While the rate of males registered as newly diagnosed with cancer increased from 667.1 in 2018 to 689.5 in 2019, the rate of females registered newly diagnosed with cancer decreased from 548.2 in 2018 to 535.7 in 2019.
This statistic represents the total number of suicide bombings worldwide from 2011 to 2013. In 2011, there were a total of 200 suicide bombings worldwide.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of stomach cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Stomach cancer, which is also known as gastric cancer, is cancer which begins in the stomach, particularly the lining of the stomach. In 2019, 14.5 males and 6.7 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with stomach cancer. The rate of newly diagnosed cases of stomach cancer has decreased for females since 1995, but the rate of males registered as newly diagnosed has increased.
In 2020, the vast majority of children in Poland watched TV on a daily basis. Twenty-nine percent of respondents watched TV three to five times a week.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of colon cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Colon cancer, also known as colorectal cancer, occurs in the colon or rectum more specifically it occurs when cells in the colon or rectum begin to grown abnormally. In 2019, 53.5 males and 41.8 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with colon cancer. This was a decrease on the previous year's rate of registration among both males and females.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of testicular cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019. Testicular cancer occurs when cells within the testis begin to grow abnormally, these cells often form a tumor. In 2019, 7.2 males per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with testicular cancer. This was a decrease on the previous year's rate of registration.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of generators for combustion engines in the United Kingdom between 2010 and January 2018. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of combustion engine generators reached a value of 19.6 million British pounds in 2017.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of electrical ignition or starting equipment and cut-outs of a kind used for internal combustion engines in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of electrical ignition equipment for engines reached a value of 2.9 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of airbags with inflator system in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of airbags with inflator systems reached a value of 59.2 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of suspension systems and parts thereof for motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of vehicle suspension systems reached a value of 181.2 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of silencers and their parts for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of vehicle silencers reached a value of 68.1 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the number of Peugeot 307 cars registered in Great Britain between 2001 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered cars grew from around 24,800 in 2001 to over 300,000 by 2010, before decreasing again.

This statistic shows the number of Citroen C3 cars registered in Great Britain between 2002 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered cars grew from around 17,300 in 2002 to some 241,300 in 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Toyota Avensis cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Toyota Avensis was one of the most popular car models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered cars grew from around 64,000 in 2000 to 207,000 by 2010, before decreasing again.
On May 31, on a scale of 1 ( no impact at all ) to 10 ( severly impacted ), the average level of the pandemic's impact on personal finances in the United States was rated at 5.3.

This statistic shows the number of Nissan Almera cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Nissan Almera was one of the most popular car models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered cars fell from 90.2 thousand in 2000 to 50.9 thousand by 2018.

This statistic shows the volume of EU and non-EU exports of silencers and parts thereof for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of motor vehicle silencers reached a volume of 5.9 million kilograms in 2013.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. population who knows a victim of workplace sexual harassment, assault, or rape. The survey was conducted in January 2014. 17.8 percent of respondents stated they know a victim in the workplace.

This statistic shows the total number of registered Triumph Street Triple model motorcycles in Great Britain between 2007 and 2018. The number of Triumph Street Triples in Great Britain increased from 48 in 2007 to 8.6 thousand in 2018, while the peak was recorded in 2016.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2019. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Mercedes Sprinter was one of the most popular LGV models in Britain by 2019. The number of registered vehicles grew from around 26,600 in 2000 to some 208,300 registered vehicles by 2019.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Vito light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 17.4 thousand in 2000 to 77.7 thousand by the end of 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Fiat Doblo light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2001 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 2.7 thousand in 2001 to 41.2 thousand by the end of 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Toyota Hiace light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles fell from 35.7 thousand in 2000 to 19.9 thousand by 2018.
This statistic shows the research and development expenditure of tesa worldwide in 2012 and 2013. In 2013, tesa's global R & D expenditure amounted to about 41.8 million euros.

Due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, the number of bed nights in European cities declined by over 80 percent in 2020. The most significant drop was recorded in Rome, with a decrease of 81.9 percent. In Milan, the number of bed nights decreased by 57.7 percent.
This statistic shows the impacts of poor quality of sleep on adults in the U.S. in 2019. It was found that 35 percent of respondents reported that poor quality of sleep affected their mood.
This statistic shows data on the revenue of the Universal Music Group from 2007 to 2020. In 2020, UMG generated a total revenue of over 1.37 billion euros, up from 952 million a year earlier.

This statistic shows the number of registered Leyland DAF 45 FA model heavy goods vehicles in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The number of Leyland DAF 45 FA in Great Britain decreased from 26.9 thousand in 2000 to 3.7 thousand in 2018, following a period of decline.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter heavy goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Mercedes Sprinter was one of the most popular LGV models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered vehicles grew from 994 in 2000 to 5.2 thousand by 2018.

This statistic shows the total number of registered Isuzu Trucks NRR model heavy goods vehicles in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The number of Isuzu Trucks NRR in Great Britain increased from 693 in 2000 to 5,016 in 2018, peaking in 2009 at 5,015 registered units.

This statistic shows the total income from the output of forage plants in the United Kingdom from 2000 to 2020. Despite some fluctuation over the period, income generally rose between 2000 and 2020. In 2020, income peaked at 215 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the average output price of all agricultural products in the United Kingdom from 1994 to 2019. Despite some fluctuation over the period, output prices generally rose between 1994 and 2019. In 2019, the average output price of all agricultural products sold by farmers in the UK was 111.64 index points.

This statistic shows the average summer travel spend per person in the United States from 2011 to 2016. In 2014, the average summer travel spend per person was 1,233 U.S. dollars, up from 1,150 U.S. dollars in 2013.
This statistic shows the retail sales of chewing gum in Canada from 2010 to 2018. Retail sales of chewing gum amounted to approximately 400 million U.S. dollars in 2018.

This statistic shows the annual mileage for diesel and petrol cars in England in 2014 comparing both types of vehicles, by trip purpose. Business trips covered the least amount of miles out of the various trip types with other private reasons had the highest share. Cars with a diesel engine covered the furthest distances mostly when being used for private purposes, with the only exception being vehicles three or more tonnes in weight.

The statistic depicts the sales growth of the leading 20 U.S. selling ethnic hair care brands in 2014. Four brands saw sales increases over the last year, with African Pride experiencing the highest sales increase at 31.4 percent.

In March 2020, nearly 30 percent of bookings related to travel and tourism made through the website TravelgateX in Brazil were cancelled. The website registered a decrease in bookings in March and April, linked to the COVID-19 outbreak. In May 2020, the share of travel bookings that were cancelled increased to 42 percent.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of London, United Kingdom, between 2003 and 2017. Despite a dip in 2008, the number of passenger movements at the port of London generally increased. In 2017, the port of London witnessed approximately 11 million passenger movements.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of Plymouth in the United Kingdom between 2003 and 2017. Despite being a major city in the United Kingdom, Plymouth has seen a decline in passenger movements at its port.

The graph shows the percentage of journalists who were very satisfied with their jobs in the United States from 1971 to 2013. In 2013, only 23 percent of journalists reported that they were very satisfied with their work, down from 49 percent in 1971.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of Hull, United Kingdom, between 2003 and 2020. Despite being a major city in the United Kingdom, Hull has seen a decline in passenger movements at its port. This decline could be attributable to the fact that the city is located further from the coast than other major UK cities, meaning that travel by sea is the only option for passengers to get there. In 2020, due to the coronavirus pandemic, the number of passenger movements dropped to 222,000.
This statistic shows the price per route of low cost airlines in Europe in 2013 and 2014. The average price of a flight with easyJet was 86.97 euros in 2014.

This statistic shows the attitudes of United Kingdom ( UK ) respondents towards career progression in 2014. Among employed professionals, 63 percent reported that they agree or strongly agree that having more skills and experience would help them get promoted.

This statistic presents the mobile payment methods used for mobile purchases according to adult mobile buyers in the United States as of September 2015. During the survey period, it was found that 49 percent of U.S. adults had purchased goods or services via mobile phone using a mobile payment method such as Apple Pay or Android Pay.

This statistic displays the number of individuals employed in the pharmaceutical industry in EFPIA ( European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations ) member countries from 1990 to 2020. In 2020, there were approximately 824,000 employees in the pharmaceutical industry in these countries.

This statistic shows the share of citizens in the United States who normally take a summer vacation as of August 2014, by gender. During the survey, 54.5 percent of the male respondents said they usually take a summer vacation.

This statistic shows the average travel spend per night in the United States from 2012 to 2016, by type of travel agency used. In the 12 months leading to May 2014, U.S. travelers spent an average of 501 U.S. dollars per night when staying with a travel agent who had booked the trip for them.

This statistic shows the opinion of the French on the way the containment rules were set up by the country's authorities in light of the novel coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in March 2020. According to Ipsos, 46 percent of the respondents considered that the containment rules were not bad enough.

This statistic shows the most annoying factors for air travelers in the United States as of July 2014. During the survey, 68 percent of respondents said that uncomfortable seats annoyed them when flying.
This statistic shows the most important import partners for Denmark in 2019. In 2019, the most important import partner for Denmark was Germany with a share of 21 percent in all imports.

This statistic shows the travel planning methods of Generation X in the United States as of July 2016. During the survey, 31 percent of Generation X respondents said they used group discount websites when planning travel.

This statistic shows the results of a survey asking UK consumers when they think they will purchase a 4k Ultra-High definition television. Of respondents, the majority said they do not know, while 25 percent said they will purchase one when the technology is more widely available.

The statistic presents the impact of the creation of new bank products, delivery channels and expansion to new markets on the existing banking channels and structure in the United States in 2013. In that time, 27 percent of respondents stated that the new banking products, channels and expansion did not have any impact on their bank's existing business.

This statistic shows the number of new small rigid heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom between January 2014 and July 2016 on a monthly basis. High sales in March and September were due to the issuance of new vehicle registration numbers. Registrations in July and August were considerably lower.

This statistic shows the share of employees who were satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time worldwide as of August 2014, by country. In France, 79 percent of respondents reported being satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time.

This statistic shows the number of new large rigid heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom between January 2013 and October 2015 on a monthly basis. Registrations in 2014 were almost consistently lower than in 2013.

This statistic shows the number of new articulated heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom between January 2013 and October 2015 on a monthly basis. Registrations in 2014 were almost consistently lower than in 2013.

In 2020, Home Depot carried out over 1.7 billion customer transactions worldwide, while Lowe's carried out over one billion of them. Lowe's customer transaction numbers have increased by about 20 percent since 2011.

The 400 meter hurdles has been included as a men's event in all Olympic Games since 1900, while the women's event was introduced in 1928. Michael Johnson of the United States is the only male athlete to have won the event twice, while Marie-Jos Prec of France is the only woman to have done so. Four men and one woman have won the gold medal in the men's event, while the only woman to have won the gold medal is 2020 champion, Dalilah Muhammad of the United States. The Olympic record for men was set in 1996 by the US'Kevin Young, with a time of 46.78 seconds, and the Olympic record for women was set in 2004 by Jamaica's Melanie Walker, with a time of 52.29 seconds. In 2020, the gold medallist in the women's event in 2016, Dalilah Muhammad, was among four athletes charged with doping offences ; if found guilty, then her victory will undoubtedly be nullified and the medals redistributed accordingly.

As of November 2019, around half of all Americans surveyed believed that climate change was a political issue. Democrats were more likely than Republicans to consider climate change a political issue, with 84 percent of Democrats surveyed in this way. This was similar to the previous year, when 83 percent of Democrats viewed climate change as a political issue.

This statistic presents the back-to-college shopping payment method in the United States in 2017. In that year, 45 percent of the respondents said that they planned to use most often their debit or credit card when shopping for back-to-college items.
This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who were married between age 18 and 32, as of 2014, by generation. In 2014, only 14.9 percent of Millennials were married between age 18 and 32.

In 2020/21 there were 5,631 people arrested in England and Wales for offences relating to fraud, compared with 7,371 in the previous reporting year. Although this is a decrease of over 40 percent, the number of people arrested for fraud offences was still significantly higher than in 2015/16, when just under 14.5 people were arrested.
There were 47,098 persons arrested for criminal damage and arson offences in England and Wales in 2020/21, compared with 47,098 in the previous reporting year, this is a change of 0.1 %.

This statistic presents the results of a survey, which asked consumers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) how often they use selected banking channels. The share of respondents using internet banking regularly has fallen from 80 percent in 2011 to 74 percent in 2015.

This statistic displays the opinion of survey respondents, by generation, as to whether the government should be responsible for providing health insurance to more people in the United States. During the survey conducted in October 2014, 50 percent of Millennials stated that the government should be responsible for providing health insurance to more people.

This statistic shows the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2012 concerning internet users and non-users, broken down by socio-economic group. In 2012, 38 percent of internet users reported having a degree or higher, while 5 percent of non-internet users reported having a degree or higher.

This statistic presents the back-to-school electronics purchases expected by U.S. parents in 2015 and 2016. The survey revealed that 18 percent of parents expected to purchase a tablet for back-to-school in 2016.
In 2021, over 60 percent of Twitter users in Argentina were men, while women accounted for 39 percent of the social network's audience in the South American country.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in small businesses in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 3.05, indicating a medium to strong level of trust from the UK public.

In 2020, 35 percent of companies in Poland forced employees to take a break from work due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. Every fourth company decided to dismiss its employees after two months of unpaid leave.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in multilateral firms in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.33, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in creative companies in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 3.27, indicating a medium to strong level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in construction companies in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.7, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding their agreement with the statement, `` I like technology that improves my human contact with friends and family ''. Five percent of female respondents reported they strongly disagreed with the statement. Individuals aged 16 to 24 were most likely to report disagreement with the statement.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in law firms in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.33, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding media consumption on weekends. During the survey, 29 percent of respondents reported watching live TV from a TV channel on a weekend.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding media consumption first thing in the morning. Media consumption via radio was most common at 26 percent, followed by use of the internet ( 22 percent ).

This statistic shows the reasons for fathers to stay at home in the United States in 1989 and 2012. In 1989, 4 percent of fathers in the United States did not work outside the home because they took care of household responsibilities.
This statistic shows the total population of Taiwan from 1990 to 2018, with forecasts up to 2030. In 2018, the total population of Taiwan amounted to approximately 23.53 million inhabitants.

This statistic provides information on the most popular social networks in selected Arab countries as of November 2014, based on reach. During that period of time, Facebook was the most popular social network in the region with a reach of 87 percent.

The hourly traffic on the Milanese web traffic platform Pornhub changed drastically since the start of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) lockdown. As of March 11, 2020, the traffic was up 19 percent compared to the average values of the previous year. The highest increase was registered between 2am and 4am, with a 45.6 percent growth. Pornhub registered over two million visits in March, up from 1.2 million in February.

This statistic shows the responses that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) gave when asked `` To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement : 'Businesses do not take effective action to regain trust after a damaging event''' as of June 2014. The majority of respondents felt that businesses did not take effective action to regain trust after a damaging event, with 41 percent of respondents feeling this way strongly.

In the fiscal year of 2018, the U.S. Highway Trust Fund collected 63 percent of its revenue through gasoline and diesel taxes. The U.S. Highway Trust Fund is responsible for the maintenance of the nation's highway infrastructure.
In 2021, there were approximately 2.77 million VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the United Kingdom, an increase of around 17 thousand enterprises when compared with the previous year.

This statistic depicts the leading investments in prepping a home for sale in the United States in 2013 and 2014. The survey revealed that 69 percent of respondents are planning to make improvements to the exterior features of their home in 2014.
In 2021 there were approximately 594 thousand local units for VAT/PAYE based enterprises in London, an increase of around 17 thousand when compared with the previous year.

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the crop and animal production industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2018 to 2019, by employment size band. In this year, there were 1,320 local units with employment size between 10 and 19 employees in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises.

Of the 115,900 local units in the VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the crude petroleum and natural gas extraction sector in the United Kingdom in 2020, the majority were businesses that employed less than five people. Local units that employed between five and nine people numbered 15,600, while there were just 10 companies that employed 250 people or more.

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the mining of metal ores and other quarrying industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2019, by employment size band. In this year within this sector there were 230 local units with employment size between 10 and 19 employees in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises.

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the manufacture of wearing apparel sector in the United Kingdom in 2019, by employment size band. In this year within this sector there were 310 local units with employment size between 10 and 19 employees in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises.

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the wood manufacturing sector in the United Kingdom in 2019, by employment size band. In this year, there were 810 local units with employment size between 10 and 19 employees in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises.

During a 2019 global survey, it was found that the average number of pages per buying session for the retail sector amounted to 32. In comparison, the average number of pages per buying session for the automotive sector was 21.

Indonesia  s gross domestic product ( GDP ) grew at a rate of 5.4 percent in 2019. This is expected to decrease slightly to 5.3 percent in 2020, before growing again to 5.7 percent in 2021, and then slightly decrease again to 5.4 percent by 2026.

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the furniture manufacturing sector in the United Kingdom in 2019, by employment size band. In this year, there were 810 local units with employment size between 10 and 19 employees in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises.
