This statistic shows the share of pet owners who have purchased a gift for their pet in Canada as of April 2013, by gender. During the survey, 57 percent of the female respondents said they had purchased a gift for their pet.

This statistic illustrates the annual passenger transport volume of Virgin Trains West Coast in Great Britain from 2008/09 to 2018/19. In March 2016, Virgin West Coast was replaced by Virgin Trains West Coast.

This statistic shows the turnover history of the onshore wind energy industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2013. It shows a compound annual growth rate from 2010 to 2013 of 3.3 percent, with a large growth from 2010 to 2011.

As of April 2020, there were 1,859 crude oil tankers worldwide. The majority of crude oil tankers worldwide were very large crude carriers ( VLCCs ) with a capacity of over one million barrels of crude oil.

With the Coronavirus 2019 ( Covid-19 ) now officially categorized as a pandemic, many countries have stepped up cautionary measures, including restricting public gatherings and travel bans. For the first quarter of 2020, forecasts suggest a global decline of nine million barrels per day in oil demand, with the rate of decline expected to slow in the second quarter.
This statistic shows the development of employment in the solar thermal industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2013. It shows a steady growth, rising from 4,611 to 5,202 employees.

As of April 2020, it was found that 31 percent of Canadian internet users accessed photo sharing app Snapchat. Female internet users were more likely to use the app than their male counterparts, as 31 percent of women reported using the photo sharing app.

This statistic presents the value of mobile peer to peer payments in the United States from 2013 to 2015 and a forecast thereof until 2018. In 2015, the value of mobile P2P payments amounted to 16 billion U.S. dollars and it was predicted to increase to 86 billion U.S. dollars in 2018.

In 2020, 94.62 percent of the population of the United Kingdom ( UK ) used the internet, up from 90.9 percent in the previous year. The share of the population using the internet has only grown in recent years, with the share of non-users falling each year since 2014.

This statistic displays the annual turnover of the data processing ; hosting and related services industry in Denmark from 2008 to 2015. In 2015, this industry had a turnover of 290.9 million euros in Denmark.

This statistic illustrates the shopping frequency during the coronavirus lockdown in Spain in March 2020. The results of this survey showed that between 23 and 27 March, 30.4 percent of respondents claimed to have bought products once a week.

This statistic shows the pet foot food market sales volume in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018, by animal type. Dog food had the highest sales volume at 825 thousand tonnes, followed by cat food at 375 thousand tonnes.

This statistic shows the results of a survey in which respondents were asked if they are aware of the 5 pence charge on single-use carrier bags put in place in all supermarkets and many other high street stores in England from October 5th 2015. The charge is part of a wider initiative to reduce plastic bag use and litter in the UK, with a total of 47 million bags being used as carrier bags, lunch bags, shopping bags and other disposable bags. Of respondents, 25 percent under the age of 35 were aware of the charge.

This statistic shows the number of units of toys and games based on animals and non-human creatures manufactured in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2020. In 2020, approximately 810 thousand units were manufactured in the UK.

This statistic displays the annual turnover of the data processing ; hosting and related services industry in Hungary from 2008 to 2015. In 2015, this industry had a turnover of 66.1 million euros in Hungary.
This statistic shows the number of importing companies in France from 2011 to 2013. The number of companies importing goods to France decreased from 120,873 in 2011 to 105,873 in 2012.

This statistic shows the average monthly data volume per mobile internet subscription in Germany from 2009 to 2021. In 2021, the average data volume per mobile internet subscription amounted to 3,244 megabytes per month.

This statistic shows the gross value added ( GVA ) by the energy generation from waste and biomass sectors in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2013. The compound annual growth rate was -0.1 percent. In 2013, the gross value added totaled 1.2 billion British pounds.

This statistic presents the business trip preparations made by travelers from France in 2014 and 2015. It reveals that 49 percent of respondents used Google to prepare their business trip, while 37 percent used the company's travel agency to do so.

This statistic shows the national distribution of employment in the biomass equipment industry across the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. The total number of jobs was 14,900. England provides the bulk of work in this sector, providing 9,800 of the 14,900 positions.

The statistic shows the trade balance in France from 2010 to 2020, in billion euros. The trade balance is the value of exports minus the value of imports. In 2020, the trade balance deficit of France was around 46.5 billion euros.

According to a survey conducted in March 2020, some 17 percent of U.S. consumers stated that they were buying more pet food and supplies online due to the coronavirus outbreak. Some 75 percent of respondents were spending the same amount as usual.

This statistic shows leading car rental companies in the United States ranked by average index ranking in 2018. YouGov's brand Index 2018 index results show that Enterprise ranked highest with a score of 20.8, followed by Hertz at 14.6.

This statistic shows the results of a 2015 survey among adult Americans on whether they only see a chiropractor for back issues or not. 20 percent of respondents stated they strongly disagree that they only see a chiropractor for back issues.
This statistic illustrates the annual export volume of barytes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in tonnes. In 2012, 19,049 tonnes of barytes were exported from the United Kingdom.
This statistic illustrates the annual import volume of barytes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in tonnes. In 2012, 88,000 tonnes of barytes were imported to the United Kingdom.

This statistic illustrates the annual import value of cadmium metal, pigments, and oxides in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in thousand British pounds. In 2012, 395 thousand British pounds worth of cadmium metal was imported to the United Kingdom.

This statistic illustrates the annual export volume of cadmium metal and pigments in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in tonnes. In 2012, 323 tonnes of cadmium metal was exported from the United Kingdom.

This statistic displays the total number of coke and breeze consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014. In 2013, consumption of coke and breeze was approximately 3.4 million metric tons.

This statistic shows the reasons the age of children can be a challenge when traveling in the United States as of May 2015. During the survey, seven percent of respondents said that the age gap between their children was too large to travel with.

This statistic illustrates the annual import volume of crushed rock in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in tonnes. In 2012, 1.29 million tonnes of crushed rock were imported to the United Kingdom.

This statistic illustrates the annual export volume of diamonds, including unsorted, rough gem, cut gem, industrial, and dust, in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in metric tons. In 2012, 39 metric tons of unsorted diamond was exported from the United Kingdom.

As of December 29, 2021, 73 percent of Indonesian respondents stated that they were wearing face masks when in public places during the COVID-19 outbreak, a decrease from 85 percent on Feb 24, 2020. Indonesia confirmed its first two cases of COVID-19 in March 2020.

The statistic shows the inflation rate in France from 2004 to 2021. The inflation rate is calculated using the price increase of a defined product basket. This product basket contains products and services, on which the average consumer spends money throughout the year. They include expenses for groceries, clothes, rent, power, telecommunications, recreational activities and raw materials ( e.g. gas, oil ), as well as federal fees and taxes. In 2021, the average inflation rate in France was at 1.6 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic illustrates the annual export value of fireclay, fireclay bricks, and refractory hollow-ware in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in thousand British pounds. In 2012, 1.2 million British pounds worth of fireclay was exported from the United Kingdom.

This statistic illustrates the annual import volume of fireclay, fireclay bricks, and refractory hollow-ware in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2014, in tonnes. In 2012, 2,816 tonnes of fireclay was imported to the United Kingdom.

Hertz Global Holdings Inc. reported that between July and September 2020, they had about 13.3 million car rental days in the United States, down by over 60 percent from the previous quarter. The rental car days in the U.S. were also down by more than 75 percent from the previous year.

This statistic displays the number of drug-related deaths due to MDMA/ecstasy use in England and Wales from 1993 to 2020. The number of drug-related deaths due to MDMA peaked in 2014 with 91 deaths, while there were 83 deaths in 2020.

This statistic displays the number of drug-related deaths due to benzodiazepine use in England and Wales from 1993 to 2020. The number of drug-related deaths due to benzodiazepine use amounted to 476 deaths in 2020, the highest number of deaths in the period observed.

This statistic shows the distribution of opinion on which department is primarily responsible for the review and management of cyber risks in organizations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. A total of 57 percent of respondents stated that the responsibility for cyber risk management lies with the IT department.

This statistic displays the number of deaths from fentany drug poisoning in England and Wales from 1999 to 2020. The largest number of deaths from fentany drug poisoning were recorded in 2017, with 74 deaths recorded, while 57 deaths were recorded in 2020.

This statistic represents the annual installations of onshore wind power in Canada from 2007 to 2014 with a forecast for 2015 to 2020. In 2017, onshore wind power installations are expected to total 1,539 megawatts in Canada. Onshore wind energy is currently one of the most affordable renewable energy sources.

This statistic shows the median household income in the United States from 1970 to 2014, by income tier. In 2014, the median household income for the middle class stood at 71,000 U.S. dollars. This study defined middle class income households as those with an income between 67 and 200 percent of the U.S. median household income, after adjustment for household size. In 2014, the middle class income ranged from about 42,000 U.S. dollars to about 126,000 U.S. dollars per year for a three-person household.

This statistic illustrates the number of monetary financial credit institutions ( MFIs ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from December 2008 to December 2019. Over this period of time the number of institutions decreased from over 393 in 2008 to 355 in 2014. Since then the number of monetary financial credit institutions in the United Kingdom increased, reaching 400 as of December 2019.

This statistic shows the distribution of must-have amenities in travel accommodation for tourists from the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2015. According to the survey, 45 percent of respondents said they wanted an air conditioner in their room when travelling for vacation.

This statistic shows the value of crowdfunding raised through donation initiatives globally from 2011 to 2014. In 2013, the value of crowdfunding fudds raised through donations amounted to 1.3 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the IT vulnerabilities among organizations worldwide as of May 2014. During the survey period, it was found that 32 percent of organizations had distributed denial-of-service ( DDoS ) attacks.

This statistic displays the distribution of carbon dioxide emissions worldwide in 2014, based on fuel type. Carbon dioxide can be removed from the atmosphere through reforestation, soil improvements, and other carbon sinks.

This statistic displays the total revenue of the French drug market from 2010 to 2018, in million euro. The market has increased since 2011. In 2018, the revenue amounted to more than 56 billion euro.

The statistic shows the distribution of the global hydropower sector workforce in 2020, by country. According to the source, around 37.4 percent of the workforce in the global hydropower sector were based in China as of 2020.

A cybersecurity risk assessment is a vital first step in strengthening an organization's digital security. However, 29 percent of respondents stated that their organization had not conducted a risk assessment in the past year.

This statistic shows the market value of single greeting cards in the United Kingdom from 2011 to 2020. The UK greeting card market was worth 1.4 billion British pounds in 2020, down from the previous year's value of 1.5 billion.

This statistic displays the share of individuals who have used hearing aids in the last 12 months in England in 2014. The majority of respondents, 92 percent of men and 91 percent of women have never used hearing aids.

This statistic shows the willingness of U.S. consumers to pay for prescription drug costs as of 2015. During the survey, some 54 percent of respondents said they would be willing to pay for their prescription drug costs.

The U.S. electric power sector has an installed capacity of around 1,050 gigawatts today. Projections show that by 2050, this capacity will have increased to 1,687 gigawatts. In the same year, the U.S. is expected to add over 370 gigawatts of renewable electricity capacity.

The personnel costs of the paper and paper product manufacturing industry in Switzerland decreased to 631.8 million euros since the previous year. In 2017, the paper manufacturing industry had personnel costs of 629.5 million euros.

This statistic shows the number of votes each candidate received in the Democratic Party Massachusetts primary held on March 1, 2016. As of March 2, 2016, the candidate with the highest number of votes was Hillary Clinton with 602,895 votes, roughly 47 percent.

This statistic shows the number of votes each candidate received in the Democratic Party Vermont primary held on March 15, 2016. As of March 2, 2016, the candidate with the highest number of votes was Bernie Sanders with 115,851 votes, roughly 66 percent.

This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who were satisfied with the United States gun laws from 2001 to 2016. In 2016, only 33 percent of Americans were satisfied with the gun laws in the United States, compared to 63 percent who were dissatisfied.

This statistic shows the average annual salary of employees in the motorcycle industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, broken down by sector. The average annual salary for those employed in the manufacturing sector was 26.1 thousand British pounds in 2012.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly nights spent on business visits from the Czech Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 1st quarter 2015 to 1st quarter 2018. This statistic presents the value of sugar preserved fruits and nuts exported from the United Kingdom ( UK ) annually from 2001 to 2019, in thousand British pounds. In 2020, exports of mushrooms and truffles, prepared or preserved from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were valued at approximately 3.2 million British pounds. This constitutes to a decrease of approximately 100 thousand British pounds in comparison to the previous year.

In 2020, exports of soups and broths from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were valued at approximately 70 million British pounds. This constitutes to an increase of approximately two million British pounds in comparison to the previous year.

In 2020, imports of sauces, mixed condiments and mixed seasonings to the United Kingdom ( UK ) were valued at approximately 766 million British pounds. This constitutes to an increase of almost 17 million British pounds in comparison to the previous year.

This graph shows the number of revokes of firearms registration certificates in Canada from 2010 to 2018. In 2018, 6,874 firearms registration certificates were revoked nationwide.

In 2020, imports of vermouth and other grape wines into the United Kingdom ( UK ) were valued at approximately 20 million British pounds. This constitutes to an increase of almost two million British pounds in comparison to the previous year.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Malawi from 2010 to 2020. A share of 24 percent of Danes spent less money on personal goods as a result of the coronavirus crisis, while five percent spent more money. The clothing industry was particularly affected, with 24 percent of respondents spending less money and only three percent spending more on buying clothes.

As of 2020, there were approximately 5.6 million inhabitants in Finland, of which roughly 2.8 million were women and roughly 2.7 million were men. The population of Finland has been steadily increasing, but showed a slowing trend in recent years.

This statistic displays business travel spending from Portugal in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 1st quarter 2015 to 1st quarter 2018. In the first quarter of 2018, similar spending on business trips amounted to approximately 16.1 million British pounds.

In 2020, approximately 46.3 thousand live births were recorded in Finland. The number of live births has decreased by nearly 1.5 thousand in the period from 2010 to 2020. In 2010, over 61.5 thousand children were born in Finland.

The average age of the population in the Netherlands increased year on year between 2009 and 2021. In 2009, the average age of the Dutch population was 39.6 years, by 2021 this had increased to 42.3 years. The largest generation in the Netherlands consists of Millennials ( born after 1980 ), who are turning 30 now. Because of the growing population and an increasing life expectancy, the ratio of the old to the young is increasing as well.

This graph represents the average number of structure fires in U.S. store and mercantile properties per year from 2009 to 2013, by type of property. From 2009 to 2013, there was an average of 1,770 structure fires in store and mercantile properties per year.
This graph shows the top five origin countries of mass marketing fraud suspect in Canada in 2014. Nineteen percent of Canadian mass marketing fraud suspects were located in the United States in 2014.

This statistic displays the sales value of over-the-counter pain relief treatments in Great Britain from 2009 to 2020. The total sales value of OTC pain relief treatments reached approximately 659 million British pounds in 2020.

This statistic presents the most popular social networks in South Korea as of December 2015. During the survey period, it was found that 59.8 percent of survey respondents named Facebook as their most-used social networking service.

This statistic shows the monthly trend in the volume of cosmetic and toilet articles sales ( quantity bought ) in Great Britain from January 2016 to November 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2019 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, sales within this sector generally increased, except in April 2020, May 2020 and November 2020, where sales reached a low of 60.

This statistic shows the monthly trend in the volume of footwear and leather goods sales ( quantity bought ) in Great Britain from January 2016 to November 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2019 equal to 100. Sales increased to an index level of 105.1 in November 2021.

The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2018 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, sales within this sector have fluctuated, dropping to an all time low of 47.9 in the second quarter of 2020, before increasing again to reach a peak of 104.1 in the second quarter of 2021.
This graph shows the number of reported thefts of heavy equipment in the United States in 2013, by state. In 2013, a total of 1,639 heavy equipment thefts were reported in Texas.

This statistic shows the quarterly trend in the volume of all retail sales ( quantity bought ) including automotive fuel in Great Britain from 1st quarter 2015 to 3rd quarter 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2019 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, retail sales increased significantly except for the second quarter of 2020 and the first quarter of 2021, where the volume of sales had significant declines. In the third quarter of 2021, volume of retail sales reached to an index level of 104.7.

Due to the coronavirus ( i.e. covid-19 ) pandemic, some Premier League football clubs may struggle financially over the next few months, due to the cancellation and/or postponement of football fixtures. During a representative survey of the British adult population, undertaken on the 31st March 2020, respondents were asked their opinions on whether Premier League football players should be prepared to take a 'pay cut'during the COVID-19 pandemic. Responses have subsequently been categorized by the age of the panelist.

This statistic shows the total number of homeless people in the Netherlands from 2009 to 2021, by background ( in thousands ). It reveals that between 2009 and 2021, the majority of the homeless people in the Netherlands had a foreign background.

This statistic shows the total number of homeless people in the Netherlands from 2009 to 2021, by location ( in thousands ). It reveals that between 2009 and 2021, the majority of the homeless people lived outside the four major cities Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague and Utrecht.

This statistic shows the quarterly trend in the retail sales volume ( quantity bought ) of computers and telecommunication equipment in Great Britain from 1st quarter 2015 to 4th quarter 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2019 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, sales within this sector generally increased until the second quarter of 2020, when sales reached an all-time low of 43.9. Sales volume saw a steady recovery in the following quarters and peaked at an index value of 107.6 in the second quarter of 2021.

This statistic shows the quarterly trend in the retail sales volume of books, newspapers, and periodicals ( quantity bought ) in Great Britain from 1st quarter 2015 to 2nd quarter 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2018 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, sales within this sector have generally decreased, except for the second quarter of 2018 and the second quarter of 2019, where the volume index measured at 103.9 and 104.2 respectively. In the second quarter of 2021, sales volume stood at an index level of 81.6.

In 2020, 227 cyclists were killed in traffic in the Netherlands. This was an increase on the previous year, when there were 204 such fatalities. In the period of consideration, the number of cyclists killed in traffic fluctuated, peaking in 1997 and 2001 at 264 and 277 fatalities respectively.

The unemployment rate in Finland increased from 5.7 percent in 2011 to 7.7 percent in 2021. The highest unemployment rate was measured among young people aged 15 to 24 years. This statistic shows the number of asylum applications from unaccompanied foreign minors in Finland in 2015 and 2016, by country of origin. During the period under survey, the number of asylum applications from unaccompanied minors from Syria amounted to 81 in 2016.

It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the population of Yemen was 19.1 years.
In 2021, 78 percent of Russian women between 18 and 45 years old had gynecologist's visits at least once a year. Every tenth woman did not visit a gynecologist over the observed period.

It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the population of Vanuatu was 21.2 years.

This statistic shows spending on visits from the Irish Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016, by gender. Spending by female visitors declined sharply in 2012, but recovered afterwards. In 2016, similar spending by male visitors amounted to 585 million British pounds.

In 2020, the most searched for TV series `` Stranger Things '' was released in July 2019 and already ranked first among the top ten most-searched TV series worldwide with a maximum monthly search volume of 101 million. `` Stranger Things '' is an American science fiction, drama-horror web TV series created by the Duffer Brothers that first released on Netflix in 2016. `` Stranger Things '' is available in multiple languages and has a large fanbase worldwide.

This statistic shows the worlds's top 50 health care equipment and services companies based on R & D spending growth through the year 2020. The statistic illustrates the compound annual growth rate for the top 50 companies in the global health care equipment and services sector. From 2019 to 2020, Becton, Dickinson, and Company's R & D spending is expected to grow by around 188 percent.

This survey displays the share of technology graduates who were employed for six months or less after graduating in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 and 2014, by industry. In 2013 and 2014, it was found that 33 percent of respondents in IT were employed for six months or less after graduating.

The number of single-person households in Sweden increased slightly from 2011 to 2020. Whereas there were around 1.8 million single-person households in Sweden in 2011, the number had increased to around 1.93 million in 2020.

This statistic shows the reported rate of thefts of goods or currency with a value of over five thousand Canadian dollars in Canada from 2000 to 2019. There were roughly 57.16 thefts of over five thousand dollars per 100,000 residents in Canada in 2019.

This statistic shows spending on visits from Australia to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016, by gender. Spending by female visitors increased sharply to 562.71 million British pounds in 2013. In 2016, similar spending by male visitors amounted to 524 million pounds.

The statistic presents information on the number of gaming brands advertising on TV in the United States in 2014 and 2015. According to the source's estimates, there were 64 gaming brands which advertised on TV in 2015, up from 52 brands a year earlier.

The largest geothermal plant in the world is called the Geysers Geothermal Complex, located in the United States, with a capacity of 905 megawatts. It is made up of 22 power plants and spread over several kilometers, located north of San Francisco. It sits on top of a deep magma chamber that spans over 30 square miles. The United States also has one of the highest installed capacities of geothermal power in the world.

This statistic shows the number of people from the same sex in civil partnerships in Belgium from 2004 to 2014. The number increased from 985 in 2004 to 2,377 in 2010, but decreased again to 2,522 in 2014.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bahrain from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, Bahrain's gross domestic product amounted to around 34.62 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bahrain from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Bahrain amounted to about 35.24 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

As of 2019, Serie A TIM matches were attended by a total of roughly 265 thousand fans. The team that recorded the highest number of spectators was Juventus FC, with 72,874 attendees. On the contrary, FC Internazionale Milano registered the lowest attendance in the season with 12,119 people in the stadium.

8.45 million of the 10.38 million inhabitants in Sweden were born in Sweden. The second largest group of inhabitants, with 810 thousand, were born in the Nordic countries ( excluding Sweden ). The rest of the population was born in other continents and islands.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Myanmar, also known as Burma, from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Myanmar amounted to approximately 1.79 percent.

With over 157 thousand students, the University of Helsinki was the largest university in Finland in 2020. The University of Helsinki is the largest university in the country and is located in the capital, which is also Finland's largest city. The second largest university in Finland was the Tampere University, with over 32 thousand students, followed by the University of Turku with nearly 24 thousand students.

Revenue from connected home products in the United States is expected to reach 5.9 billion U.S. dollars in 2022. Revenue from connected home products in the U.S. is expected to reach 5.9 billion U.S. dollars in 2022.
This statistic shows the home security solutions sales in the United States from 2012 to 2017. In 2014, home security solutions sales amounted to 4.11 billion U.S. dollars.

In 2020, the largest group of asylum seekers in Sweden were from Syria, with 675 men. The second and third most common countries of origin were Iraq and Afghanistan, with 536 and 442 asylum seekers respectively.

This statistic shows the total number of immigrants to the Netherlands from 2009 to 2019, by marital status. It reveals that the majority of the immigrants to the Netherlands in this period were unmarried.

The most common type of households in Sweden as of 2020 were single person households without children, which amounted to around 1.9 million. The second most common household type was cohabiting or married couples living without children, in around 1.13 million households.

This statistic shows the reported rate of violent crimes in Canada in 2020, by metro area. There were roughly 1,769.58 violent crimes reported per 100,000 residents in the Toronto area in Canada in 2020.

This statistic shows the gross weekly earnings of full-time employees in the tech industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by occupation. In that year, managers earned on average 910 British pounds a week, while directors earned 890 British pounds a week.

A survey from April 2020, showed that during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) lockdown about 41 percent of Italian people spent more time streaming audio and video content. 15 percent of them reported a significant increase, while 36 percent of them stated their time spent streaming audiovisual content remained unchanged.

This statistic shows the share of students, who changed the sector of education in Finland in academic year 2016/2017, broken down by gender. During the period under survey, a total of 1.5 percent of female students and 1.5 percent of male students changed the sector of education.

This statistic shows the share of students, who discontinued post-comprehensive school education in Finland in 2015, broken down by gender and sector of education. During the period under survey, out of all female students a share of 5.4 percent discontinued post-comprehensive school education at the university level.

This statistic shows the volume index of households'adjusted disposable income in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the adjusted disposable income of households steadily increased on most years. In 2017, the volume index amounted to 103.5.
This statistic shows the percentage of oil and gas megaprojects facing cost overruns in 2014, by project type.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the attendees'attendance plans for the Ukraine referendum ( including undecided voters ) in the Netherlands in February 2016, by EU position. During the period of the survey it was found that the majority of the respondents who were going to vote in the Ukraine referendum ( 26 percent ) were probably going to vote in it.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly holiday nights from Canada in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female holiday visitors increased from 105.1 thousand between January and March to 544.7 thousand between July and September 2015.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly holiday nights from Finland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female holiday visitors increased from 38.6 thousand between January and March to 131.2 thousand between July and September 2015.

The population in Sweden was around 10.38 million in 2021. Around half of these resided in the counties Stockholm, Skne, and Halland, the three counties where the three largest cities in Sweden are also located. Stockholm county is the capital region with around 2.4 million inhabitants. The second largest region by population was Gtaland, inhabited by around 1.7 million people, followed by Jnkping county with around 1.3 million inhabitants.

The average price of jet fuel in the United States fluctuated considerably between October 2016 and January 2022. In October 2016, the average price of jet fuel stood at 1.52 U.S. dollars per gallon, while in January 2022 this figure increased to 2.57 U.S. dollars per gallon.

The most common age for newlyweds in Sweden in 2021 was from 30 to 34 years of age. In 2021, almost 18 thousand couples got married in this age group. The second and third most common age groups for newlyweds were 25 to 29 year-olds, and 35 to 39 year-olds.
In 2021, online searches for women's bras increased by 85 percent compared to the previous year. Online searches for men's running shoes increased by 12.5 percent during the same period.
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Israel in 2020. In 2020, the most important export partner of Israel was the United States, with a share of 26 percent in exports.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly business nights from Ireland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female business visitors increased from 128.1 thousand between January and March to 95.7 thousand between April and June 2015.
This statistic shows the largest basins in Finland as of 2018, by area. The largest basin is Lapland with an area of 53,000 square kilometers.

According to the forecast, the population of Finland is expected to grow until 2060. The number of people aged 15 to 54 years is forecast to decrease from 2020 onwards, while the number of people aged 55 years and older is expected to increase. By 2060, the number of individuals aged 55 years and older is forecast to reach over one million.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly business nights from Poland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female business visitors increased from 128.6 thousand between January and March to 6.6 thousand between July and September 2015.

This statistic displays the average order value for personalized and social features of retailer apps by consumers of the Poq platform in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. In 2015, the average order value generated via media share amounted to 106 British pounds.

This statistic displays the average browsing time spent on shopping features of retailer apps by consumers of the Poq platform in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. In 2015, the average browsing time spent on full screen product zoom was 13.5 minutes.

The statistic shows Gabon's share in the global gross domestic product ( GDP ) adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity ( PPP ) from 2016 to 2026. In 2020, Gabon's share in the global gross domestic product adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity was estimated to amount to approximately 0.03 percent.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly nights during visits from Portugal to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female visitors increased from 193.6 thousand between January and March to 146.2 thousand between April and June 2015.
This statistic shows the total population of Gabon from 2016 to 2026. In 2020, the total population of Gabon was estimated at approximately 2.11 million inhabitants.

In March 2020, Netflix.pl was the leading video on demand service in Poland, with over 9.5 million page views. The American platform was followed by VOD.pl, which recorded nearly 7.3 million views. Player.pl ranked third with 6.5 million views.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly nights during visits from New Zealand to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female visitors increased from 128.1 thousand between January and March to 218.1 thousand between April and June 2015.
This statistic shows the annual average expenditure per household in Belgium in 2020, by type of household. In 2020, a household with two adults and no children spent about 36,000 euros per year.

This statistic shows the number of visits by business travelers from Finland to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. Around 55.2 thousand business trips were made from Finland to the UK in 2017. In total, business visitors from Finland made approximately 9.9 million business trips to the UK in 2017.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bhutan from 2009 to 2020. In 2020, the share of agriculture in Bhutan's gross domestic product was 19.62 percent, industry contributed approximately 34.45 percent and the services sector contributed about 45.42 percent.

This statistic illustrates the share of management consultancy turnover attributable to strategy services in selected European countries in 2014 and 2017. It can be seen that the share of MC turnover attributable to strategy services in France was approximately 17 percent in 2017.

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the total management consultancy turnover in Italy between 2014 and 2017, broken down by service type. It can be seen that the largest share of MC turnover was attributable to finance, risk and strategy services in 2017, with a share of 19.5 percent.

This statistic shows the number of visits by business travelers from Poland to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2018. Around 824.8 thousand business trips were made from Poland to the UK in 2018. In total that year, 8.8 million business trips were made to the UK from overseas.

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the total management consultancy turnover, by economic sector, in Europe from 2014 to 2017. It can be seen that the service sector accounted for the largest share of MC turnover in each of the years recorded here, with a share of 59 percent in 2017.

This statistic shows the national debt of Dominican Republic from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2020, the national debt of Dominican Republic amounted to approximately 71.54 percent of the GDP.
This statistic presents the number of holiday visits from Denmark to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. The number of holiday visitors peaked at 372 thousand in 2017.

The area occupied by permanent meadows and pastures in Costa Rica has been in decline since 2000. In that year, this sector covered an area of 13.5 thousand square kilometers, whereas in 2016, the land area devoted to this purpose had decreased to 12 thousand square kilometers. Meadows and pastures are areas where herbaceous forage crops are grown.

This statistic presents the leading purchase channels used by consumers to buy bathroom products for home improvement in Germany as of 2013. DIY stores were the preferred channel among German consumers, with 42 percent purchasing bathroom products from such stores.

This statistic presents quarterly holiday travel spending from Belgium in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Inbound holiday spending by female travelers increased from 19.73 million British pounds between January and March to 22.33 million British pounds between April and June.

This statistic presents the number of holiday visits from Spain to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2018. The number of holiday visitors peaked in 2018 at 1.1 million. In 2016, the number of holiday visits reached 916 thousand.

This statistic represents the average annual estimates of the number of female college sports injuries in selected sports in the U.S. during fall season, for academic years 2009/2010 to 2013/2014. The 5-year average gives a total of 3,439 injuries in women's college lacrosse during fall season.

This statistic presents quarterly business travel spending from Spain in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Inbound business spending by female travelers increased from 10.19 million British pounds between January and March to 19.26 million British pounds between April and June.

This statistic presents quarterly business travel spending from Switzerland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Inbound business spending by female travelers decreased from 6.19 million British pounds between January and March to 3.33 million British pounds between April and June.

This statistic presents the quarterly travel spending on visits to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent 581.5 million British pounds in the second quarter, compared to 438.5 million British pounds in the previous one.

This statistic presents the quarterly travel spending on visits from Canada to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent 34.9 million British pounds in the third quarter, compared to 11.2 million British pounds in the previous one.

This statistic presents quarterly travel spending on visits from Sweden to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent the most in the second quarter, at 13.1 million British pounds, while male travelers spent the most in the third quarter, at 9.2 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the number of votes each candidate received in the Democratic Party Idaho caucus held on March 22, 2016. As of March 23, 2016, the candidate with the highest number of votes was Bernie Sanders with 18,858 votes, roughly 66 percent.

A survey from April 2020 showed that during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) lockdown about 65 percent of Italian people spent more time streaming audio and video content on YouTube. This scenario was more common in the Islands ( 65 percent ) than in the North ( 48 percent ).

This statistic shows a comparison of gross domestic product ( GDP ) of emerging and developing economies from 2016 to 2026 in billion U.S. dollars. In 2020, GDP of emerging and developing economies amounted to about 20.89 trillion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the number of visits to friends and relatives from the Czech Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. The number of visits from tourists peaked at 128 thousand in 2007. In 2017 the number of similar visits amounted to around 93 thousand.

The take-up of warehouses for logistics real estate in the Netherlands increased in 2020 over the previous year. In 2020, the take-up in Amsterdam was 48 percent and in Rotterdam 66 percent. The area surrounding Venlo and the West Brabant region also saw good prospects for warehouse real estate.

This statistic shows the religious participation in the Netherlands in 2018, by education level. It shows that in 2018, 83 percent of the respondents with a master or a doctorate degree participated in a religious service/meeting at least once a week.

This statistic shows the opinion of consumers on whether new pharmacies should be allowed to offer new services in the U.S., as of January 2015. It was found that 74 percent of heavy users, those who used pharmacy services at least once a month, believed that new pharmacies should be allowed to offer new services.

This statistic presents travel spending on business visits among men from the Czech Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by male visitors from the Czech Republic fluctuated over this period. In 2017, this spending amounted to approximately 27.1 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the total area of wheat in hectares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 1.7 million hectares of wheat grown in England.

In 2021, there were more than 220 thousand self-employed people with post secondary education in Sweden. Furthermore, there were around 218 thousand self-employed people with an upper secondary education, while there were around 55 thousand with a primary education.
This statistic displays the number of unemployed people in Belgium from 2008 to 2020, by gender. In 2020, about 133,000 men were unemployed and roughly 127,000 women were unemployed.

This statistic presents the reach of leading mobile messenger apps in selected Southeast Asian countries as of December 2015. During the survey period, 94 percent of respondents in Singapore stated that they had the Facebook Messenger app on their mobile device.
The number of deaths in Greenland fluctuated during the period from 2010 to 2020. The highest number of deaths was in 2018, when 548 people died. In 2020, 518 people died in Greenland.

This statistic presents spending on business visits from France to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 363.19 million British pounds in 2015. In 2017, this spending amounted to 341.01 million British pounds.
This statistic presents spending on business visits from Hungary to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 37.19 million British pounds in 2017.

This statistic presents spending on business visits from Portugal to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 60.99 million British pounds in 2015. In 2017, it amounted to 51.19 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the fertility rate in Kyrgyz Republic from 2009 to 2019. The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age. In 2019, the fertility rate in Kyrgyz Republic amounted to 3.3 children per woman.
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in the Kyrgyz Republic from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the average life expectancy at birth in the Kyrgyz Republic was 71.59 years.

This statistic shows the national debt of Montenegro from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2020, the national debt of Montenegro amounted to approximately 106.99 percent of the GDP.
This statistic shows the employment rate in Belgium from 2008 to 2020, by age. In 2020, the employment rate for people aged between 25 and 34 years was at approximately 81.5 percent.
The number of unemployed people in Finland fluctuated between roughly 180 and 250 thousand from 2011 to 2021. In 2021, approximately 210.5 thousand people were unemployed in Finland.

This statistic shows the number of unemployed people in Finland from 2012 to 2017, by region. In 2017, the number of unemployed people in the capital region of Helsinki-Uusimaa amounted to 68 thousand.
This statistic shows consumer confidence in own economy in Finland monthly from September 2017 to September 2018. In September 2018, consumer confidence in own economy was measured at 10.1 points.

As of January 2020, the highest position in the ranking of Russian football regions was occupied by the Chechen Republic, which was followed by the Krasnodar Krai. The lowest rank was recorded by the Belgorod Oblast.

The majority of the people who emigrated from Greenland in 2020 had the Danish citizenship. Greenland is an autonomous region of Denmark, and the vast majority of the population of Greenland has a Danish citizenship. Because of this, both people originating from Greenland moving back home to Greenland as well as Danish people born in Denmark moving to Greenland are included in this statistic under `` Danish citizenship ''.

In 2021, the Consumer Price Index ( CPI ) inflation rate in the Netherlands increased by 2.7 percent when compared to the previous year. This was the highest inflation rate reached since 2008, when the inflation rate increased by 8.4 percent.

The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Djibouti from 2016 to 2018, with projections up until 2026. In 2018, Djibouti's real gross domestic product grew by around 8.46 percent compared to the previous year.

In 2020, 3,174 people died due to accidents in Sweden. The most common accident that led to death was falling from a height, reaching 1,087 deaths that year. In comparison, there were 454 traffic accident deaths.

The market value of publishing media in Finland fluctuated between 2010 and 2020. In 2020, the market value of daily newspapers was 675 million euros, while the market value of free distribution papers amounted to roughly 45 million euros.

In Sweden, more men than women died in traffic accidents in 2020. 569 men and 522 women died in traffic accidents in Sweden in 2020. By comparison, more women than men died in drowning accidents. 107 women and 53 men died in drowning accidents in Sweden that year.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Chad from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Chad amounted to about 18.94 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Chad from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the share of agriculture in Chad's gross domestic product was 46.59 percent, industry contributed approximately 15.01 percent and the services sector contributed about 44.1 percent.

This statistic shows the annual circulation numbers of selected large daily newspapers in Finland from 2013 to 2017. In 2017, the Helsingin Sanomat was the largest daily newspaper with the total circulation of nearly 236 thousand. The circulation of the second largest daily newspaper, Turun Sanomat, amounted to roughly 90 thousand.

In 2020, income taxes made up the largest part of the government tax revenue in Finland. Income taxes accounted for roughly 34.7 billion euros of the total tax revenue, followed by taxes on goods and services with approximately 33.2 billion euros. Taxes gathered through social security contributions made up roughly 27.5 billion euros in revenue.

In 2018, the average age of the population of Finland increased across the country. The North Savo region had the highest average age with 48.2 years for men and 49.2 years for women. The lowest average age was measured in the South Savo region, where men were 20.9 years old on average and women 21.7 years old.

As of end-February 2020, nine drugs and vaccines were in clinical development targeting the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19 ). Of these, four were in the pre-human or pre-clinical phase, three were in the pre-vector phase, and two were in the pre-prophylactic phase. Prophylactic vaccines are expected to elicit broad-based immunity and are therefore considered a leading candidate for the development of a vaccine to limit the severity and duration of the disease caused by SARS-CoV-2.

As of 2020, the largest share of inhabitants in Finland were Finnish-speaking. In the capital region of Uusimaa, roughly 1.3 million inhabitants spoke Finnish as their first language. The most Sami-speaking people, nearly 1,600, lived in the region of Lapland. The majority of the population in Finland spoke Finnish as their first language, while around five percent spoke Swedish as their first language.

The statistic represents the operating income of Air Transport Services Group ( ATSG ), formerly known as Air Wisconsin Airlines, from the fiscal year of 2011 to the fiscal year of 2020. In the fiscal year of 2020, the American regional airline generated total revenue to the value of over 204.5 million U.S. dollars, of which over 98.7 million U.S. dollars came from operating income.

This timeline displays the number of individuals reading print newspapers on a weekday in the United Kingdom from 2003 to 2015, by print and digital version. In 2012, 7.4 million individuals were reading a print version of a newspaper on a weekday. This number fell to 2.8 million in 2014.

In 2022, the total defense budget in Finland was roughly 3.2 billion euros. The military budget accounted for the largest share of the total budget with roughly 1.5 billion euros. The funds allocated to the police forces amounted to nearly 790 million euros, increasing nearly 40 million euros from the previous year.

As of 2022, the defense budget accounted for a total of 0.93 percent of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Finland. Over the shown period, the defense budget share remained relatively stable, fluctuating between 0.9 and 1 percent. The highest share was measured in 2011 at 1.3 percent.

The fertility rate in Finland declined steadily over the past decade. In 2020, the fertility rate was 1.38 children per woman, increasing slightly from the previous year. During the period from 2010 to 2020, the fertility rate decreased by 0.85 children. Overall, the number of children born per woman declined as well, reaching a low of 1.23 in 2020.

As of 2020, the largest share of asylum applicants in Finland were from Syria with 1,112 applications. The second largest share of asylum seekers came from Somalia with 478 applications, followed by Afghanistan with 354 applications.

This statistic shows the number of people who applied to Finnish universities in 2015, broken down by university. During the period under survey, the number of primary school graduates applying to university amounted to 65,834, of whom 17,836 applied to the University of Helsinki.
In the period from 2010 to 2020, the number of adoptions in Finland declined overall. The number of adoptions peaked at 488 in 2010, and decreased to 294 in 2020.

China has the largest installed capacity of coal power plants in the world. As of January 2022, some 1,065 gigawatts of electricity were generated by the country's coal plants. Comparatively, the second largest installed capacity of coal plants was in India, at approximately 240 gigawatts. The global installed capacity of coal plants was approximately 8,470 gigawatts as of January 2022.

Racial disparities exist in the U.S. regarding the level of concern about getting COVID-19 and being hospitalized. Among white adults, 33 percent were very concerned, whereas only 18 percent of black adults felt the same. This statistic shows the percentage of adults in the U.S. who were very or somewhat concerned about getting COVID-19 and being hospitalized as of April 12, 2020, by race.

This statistic displays the average value of private wealth per household in the Netherlands from 2006 to 2014. It shows that between 2006 and 2008 the average household wealth increased from approximately 156,000 to approximately 181,000 euros.

This statistic displays the inflation rate of health services and goods in Belgium from January 2018 to February 2022. In February 2022, the inflation rate for health services and goods was 0.84 percent.
This statistic shows the share of the population with a paid job in the Netherlands from 2006 to 2016. In 2016, 69 percent of the Dutch population had a paid job.
The largest age group among LSS disability service recipients in Sweden in 2020 was people between 20 and 44 years of age. In this age group, 36,300 people received LSS disability services.

This statistic shows the reasons for mobile-first auto consumers in the United States to prefer desktop as of September 2015. During the survey, it was found that 57 percent of respondents preferred to use their mobile devices for finding and viewing videos on a manufacturer's website.
This statistic displays the inflation rate of recreation and culture in Belgium from January 2018 to February 2022. In February 2022, the inflation rate for recreation and culture was 2.6 percent.

This statistic displays the total number of eyes for breeding in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 6.3 million eyes for breeding in England.
This statistic presents the total number of poultry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 1.3 million poultry in England.
This statistic shows the total number of goats and kids in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 85 thousand goats and kids in England.

This statistic shows the number of university of applied sciences applicants in Finland in 2020, broken down by institution. During the period under survey, the number of people in Finland applying to universities of applied sciences amounted to 32,834, of whom the majority applied to Metropolia University of Applied Sciences ( 33,017 applicants ).

The coronavirus outbreak has made it hard for several industries to survive in Sweden. While the number of bankruptcies in the construction industry decreased from March to September 2020, they increased again in October 2021. The number of bankruptcies in the trade in motor vehicles increased from -32 in September 2020 to 74 in October 2021.

This statistic shows the annual volume of movers, rakes and potato harvesters on holdings in Scotland from 2004 to 2014. The number of harvesters on holdings fluctuated over the period, amounting to 1,000 in 2014.

This statistic displays the annual value of machinery expenses for the farming sector in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019. The annual value of machinery expenses increased over the time in consideration from 131.5 million British pounds in 2010 to 161 million British pounds in 2019.

This statistic displays the annual value of farm maintenance expenditure in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019. The annual value of expenditure increased over the time in consideration from 46 million British pounds in 2010 to 52 million British pounds in 2019.

This statistic shows the harmonized index of consumer prices ( HICP ) for the transport sector in Belgium from January 2018 to July 2020. In July 2020, the harmonized consumer price index for the transport sector increased to 109.02.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Italy from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Italy was around 9.31 percent.

This statistic shows the public perception of how well police enforce the law in Canada in 2014, separated by province or territory. In 2014, 68.1 percent of respondents in Quebec thought the police in their province were doing a good job of enforcing the law.

This statistic shows the distribution of freelance workers and the overall working population in the United States in 2019, by racial background. In 2019, about 15.1 percent of U.S. freelancers identified themselves as Hispanic or Latino.
In 2021, the apparel retailer APA Corporation employed approximately 2,200 people worldwide, down from 2,400 in the previous year.

This statistic displays the consolidated production in the market sector from 2005 to 2015 in the Netherlands. It shows that in 2015, the consolidated production in the market sector was worth approximately 710 billion euros.

The most common type of elderly care service received in Sweden in 2019 was home help service, which is a daytime job for people with limited capacity for self-care who are unable to live independently in the community. The number of recipients of this service was around 236 thousand in 2019.

A survey conducted in March 2020 in Japan found that the majority of Japanese people trusted TV news the most for information related to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ), with 58 percent of respondents. Close to half of the respondents also trusted newspapers, and around 45 percent of them relied on radio. Only nine percent of Japanese respondents had the highest confidence in magazines.

The number of disabled persons who received home help service in Sweden fluctuated from 2009 to 2019. The number of disabled people who received home help service peaked in 2010, reaching around 23.7 thousand. In 2019, there were about 21.5 thousand disabled people who received home help service.

The annual depreciation in consumption value of buildings and works in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019 varied over time. In 2016, the consumption value of buildings and works in Northern Ireland amounted to approximately 1.13 billion British pounds. By 2019, the consumption value had increased to around 1.14 billion British pounds.

The number of theft offences recorded by the police in Finland showed an upward trend from 1950 to 2020. In 2020, roughly 138.6 thousand theft offences were reported in Finland, increasing by over 2.4 thousand from the previous year.

This statistic displays the total revenue of taxes on vehicles in Belgium from 2010 to 2019. The total revenue for taxes on vehicles decreased from about 1.9 billion euros in 2010 to roughly 215 million euros in 2019.

How many children are adopted in Sweden? From 2010 to 2020, the number of adoptions has declined. The highest number of adoptions was in 2010, when 20,874 adoptions were registered. In 2020, 16,152 adoptions were completed.

This statistic shows the total revenue of insurance taxes in Belgium from 2010 to 2020. The revenue of insurance taxes increased from about 1.6 billion euros in 2010 to roughly 2.9 billion euros in 2020.
In 2019, the number of companies in Italy engaged in social entrepreneurship amounted to 4.4 thousand. Moreover, the number of companies in this category increased steadily since 2015.
The statistic shows the number of registered recreational boats in South Korea in 2014, by boat type. That year, there were 12,300 registered motor boats in South Korea.

This statistic shows the share of private consumption expenditure on recreation, culture and education in Finland from 2007 to 2017. The share spent on recreation, culture and education has declined over the given time period. In 2017, the share was 11 percent.

This statistic displays the consolidated production of the IT- and information services industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual worth of the production in this sector increased from 14.5 to 23.8 billion euros.

In 2020, the majority of Russian women surveyed for this study stated that they felt comfortable buying hygienic products separately. However, over 20 percent of respondents did not find it comfortable to purchase such goods.

This statistic shows the share of private consumption expenditure on furnishings and household maintenance in Finland from 2007 to 2017. The share of private consumption expenditure on furnishings and household maintenance has decreased over the given time period, amounting to 4.7 percent in 2017.

This statistic displays the consolidated production of the advertising, design and other business services industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual production in this sector increased from 11.3 to 23.6 billion euros roughly.

The annual revenue of the food industry in Italy in 2018 varied according to the sector considered. According to data, the manufacturing of dairy products was the most valuable one, with a total revenue of 21.5 billion euros, followed by the production of cereals, which registered a value of 20.3 billion euros.

This statistic shows the annual averages of Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices ( HICP ) in Sweden from 2006 to 2016. During the time under consideration, the annual average HICP price increase was highest in 2016, when it reached 116.19.

The statistic shows the annual turnover of the retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores in Switzerland from 2009 to 2018. In 2018 food, beverage and tobacco stores generated a total turnover of 1.8 billion euros through retail sales.

This statistic shows the syringe service programs ( SSPs ) for injection-drug users in rural and urban areas of the United States in 2013, by cost. In rural areas of the United States, the mean cost per syringe service program was 0.01 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the change in the favorability of the moment in Belgium from January 2018 to January 2022. The indicator was calculated by the division of the number of positive responses by the number of negative responses. For January 2022, the favorability indicator was -39.2.
The statistic shows the national debt of Mauritius from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt of Mauritius amounted to around 10.12 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the share of persons in disguised unemployment in the age group from 45 to 54 years in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the share of persons in disguised unemployment aged between 45 and 54 years increased, amounting to 2.6 percent in 2017.

This statistic shows the share of persons in disguised unemployment in the age group from 55 to 64 years in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the share of persons in disguised unemployment aged between 55 and 64 years increased, amounting to 3.7 percent in 2017.

How many teachers are there in upper secondary school in Norway? During the time under consideration, the number of teachers fluctuated. The highest number of teachers in upper secondary school was in 2015, when there were 39,731. The number decreased the following years, and was down to 39,399 teachers in 2018. However, in 2019, the number increased again to 39,663 teachers.
The statistic shows the national debt of Panama from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt of Panama amounted to around 35.38 billion U.S. dollars.
