This graph shows the quarterly amount of dried medical marijuana produced in Canada between April 1, 2015 and September 30, 2018, in kilograms. In the quarter from April to June 2018, some 20,420 kilograms of dried medical marijuana were produced in Canada.
This statistic shows the self-reported sexual identity in England in 2014. The majority of respondents self-identified as being heterosexual with approximately 1 in 100 being gay/lesbian or bisexual.

Waitrose sales have decreased by 2.5 percent in Great Britain over a 12-week period ending September 8, 2021 compared to the same time period in 2020. Waitrose has seen its sales grow during the last three and a half years. The second quarter of 2017 saw the highest growth, with sales going up over 13 percent compared to the same quarter in 2016. At the end of 2019, the company experienced shrinking sales for the first time since mid-2015.

The personnel costs of the real estate industry in Bosnia & Herzegovina saw an addition of 1.4 million euros in 2019. Therefore, the personnel costs in Bosnia & Herzegovina reached a peak in 2019 with 30.2 million euros. This could be explained by the fact that Eurostat reports a break in time series for 2017. Notably, the personnel costs in this industry is continuously increasing over the last years.

According to a survey conducted in Indonesia in February 2020, 77 percent of the respondents who had not changed their travel plans for Indonesia's national holiday, would keep traveling in Indonesia during the holiday season despite the outbreak of the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2. Indonesia's President, Joko  Jokowi  Widodo announced the first two confirmed cases of the disease in the country on March 2, 2020. Before the announcement, Indonesia had no confirmed cases of COVID-19, raising concerns about the country  s ability to detect the virus.

By the end of May 2020, it is projected that Ontario will need over 1.2 billion medical-surgical and non-medical grade face masks in order to cope with the COVID-19 pandemic. This statistic shows the projected number of medical-surgical and non-medical grade face masks needed in Canada over the next 12 months as of May 2020, by province.

The average household consumption expenditure on fresh or chilled fruit in Denmark fluctuated from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the household consumption expenditure on fresh or chilled fruit in Denmark was 2,313 Danish kroner on average.

This statistic shows the number of real estate transactions in apartments, flats and studios in Belgium from 1990 to 2017. The number of real estate transactions increased overall with some fluctuation in this period. In 2017, there were approximately 40,000 transactions.
This statistic shows the global consumption of steam coal in 2014 and 2015, by major country. In 2014, China's consumption of steam coal was approximately 3.2 billion metric tons.

The statistic provides information on the number of books self-published by Smashwords in the United States from 2010 to 2018. Smashwords published a total of almost 72 thousand books in 2018, down from 74.2 thousand in 2017.

This statistic illustrates the opinion of Italians towards hunting and furting in 2015 and 2016. As it can be seen, the percentage of Italians considering hunting and furting as a waste of time has increased from 85 to 87 percent.
This statistic shows the population growth in Lithuania from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, Lithuania's population decreased by approximately 0.15 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic displays the views of respondents regarding the impact of future technology on social relationships in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2016. In this period, 47 percent of respondents believe that future technology will improve interaction between people.

This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the rental and leasing activities industry in Malta from 2008 to 2015. In 2012, the rental and leasing activities industry had personnel costs of approximately 17.2 million euros.

The turnover of the publishing activities industry in Bosnia & Herzegovina decreased by 2.9 million euros since the previous year. Therefore, the turnover declined to 45.6 million euros in 2019. In general, the turnover has been subject to fluctuation over the observed period.

This statistic displays the leading 12 brands of AA batteries available in the United Kingdom ( UK ), ranked by cost effectiveness, in 2015. The ranking covers all types of AA batteries. The top three spots are held by standard Lithium batteries, which last up to 4.5 hours at a cost of 1.02 pence per hour.

As of May 2018, Tencent's music apps KuGou, QQ, and Kuwo controlled over 80 percent of the music streaming market in China. NetEase Cloud Music was another key market player with a market share of about 13 percent.

This statistic shows the number of grant-making and giving services businesses in Canada in 2020, by province or territory. In 2020, there were 1,187 grant-making and giving services businesses in Ontario.

This statistic shows the distribution of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, in 2020, by industry. In that year, the construction industry accounted for 6.7 percent of the GDP of Newfoundland and Labrador.
This graph depicts the total college sports sponsorship spending in the United States from 2005 to 2018. In 2017, college sports sponsorship spending amounted to about 1.17 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the most populous metropolitan areas in Canada in 2021. In 2021, around 6.58 million people were living in Toronto, making it the most populous metropolitan area in Canada.

This statistic presents the number of training courses for young volunteers administered by the Arms Length Swimming Association ( ALSA ) East Midlands Region in England in 2015, by type. In 2015, the ALSA East Midlands region offered 62 training courses to young volunteers, of which six were swimming and lifesaving courses.

The statistic presents the box office revenue of The Lord of the Rings Trilogy in North America and worldwide. As of January 2018, `` The Lord of the Rings : The Two Towers '', the second installment in the trilogy based on the novel The Lord of the Rings by J. R. R. Tolkien, reached a gross of 347.37 million U.S. dollars in 3,622 cinemas across North America.

This statistic shows the distribution of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Manitoba in 2020, by industry. In that year, the construction industry accounted for 7.29 percent of the GDP of Manitoba.
This statistic shows the population distribution of Nova Scotia, Canada, as of 2016, by urban/rural type. In 2016, 35.3 percent of Nova Scotia's population lived in population centers.
This statistic presents the global music services usage in 2016, by device. During the survey period, 55 percent of respondents stated that they had used Spotify via their smartphone.

This statistic shows the value of golf clubs that were exported from the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2018. In the period of consideration, the export value of these items has been fluctuating, amounting to 164.5 million British pounds in 2018.

As of March 2, 2022, there have been over 947 thousand deaths related to COVID-19 in the United States. Around 646 thousand of these deaths occurred in an inpatient setting, while around 135 thousand deaths occurred in an outpatient or emergency setting. This statistic shows the number of coronavirus disease 2019 ( COVID-19 ) deaths in the U.S. as of March 2, 2022, by place of death.

According to a global study held in 2019, 38 percent of Gen Z internet users aged 16 to 24 years old got their music via copyright infringement. This generation of young consumers is significantly more likely to do so than those aged 25 or above, and in fact, more than half of Gen Z consumers have accessed music this way.

This statistic displays the number of employees in the processing and preserving of meat and production of meat products industry in Denmark from 2008 to 2016. In 2016, the processing and preserving of meat and production of meat products industry in Denmark employed a total of 13,521 people.

This statistic displays the number of employees in the processing and preserving of meat and production of meat products industry in Norway from 2008 to 2016. In 2016, the processing and preserving of meat and production of meat products industry in Norway employed a total of 12,539 people.

This statistic shows the annual turnover from the processing and preserving of poultry meat industry in Sweden from 2008 to 2017. In 2017, the processing and preserving of poultry meat industry produced a turnover of approximately 498.4 million euros.

This statistic shows the annual turnover from the production of meat and poultry meat products industry in Norway from 2008 to 2017. In 2017, the production of meat and poultry meat products produced a turnover of approximately 1.64 billion euros.

This statistic shows the total monthly receipts and disbursements of Donald Trump's campaign for the 2016 U.S. presidential election. During the month of November, 2016, Donald Trump's campaign received over 8 million U.S. dollars towards the 2016 U.S. presidential election.

This statistic shows the total contributions to Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign as of November, 2016. The Hillary Clinton campaign received over 319 million U.S. dollars in contributions of less than 200 U.S. dollars as of November, 2016.

This statistic shows the percentage of HIV positive respondents in South Africa who reported being fearful of select stigma/discrimination as of 2014. It was found that 31.9 percent of respondents stated being fearful about stigma and discrimination related to their HIV positive status.

Forecasts suggest that by the year 2022 the largest share of the augmented and mixed reality industry will be dedicated to the gaming sector. Video games are expected to account for 34 percent of the augmented and mixed reality software market, which is projected to reach 80 billion U.S. dollars that year. The healthcare and engineering segments are also expected to experience high levels of growth in the coming years, further exhibiting the wide range of possible uses for the technology.

This statistic shows the total volume of investments in property market in Finland from 2011 to 2015, broken down by investor type. During that period, the investments by institutional investors increased from 15.4 billion euros in 2011 to 16.2 billion euros in 2013 and further to 15.9 billion euros in 2015.

Due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, the housing construction industry in Poland recorded significant losses in March 2020. The most significant loss was recorded by individual developers, amounting to 23 percent.

This statistic shows the total contributions to Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign as of October, 2016. The Hillary Clinton campaign received over 2.3 million U.S. dollars in contributions of less than 200 U.S. dollars as of October, 2016.

This statistic shows the total contributions to the 2016 presidential campaign of Gary Johnson. As of November 2, 2016, over 825,000 U.S. dollars was contributed to Johnson's campaign by individuals and organizations that support him.

The monthly expenditure on tobacco and alcohol in Italy in 2019 was higher in metropolitan areas than in the provinces. In particular, the average consumer in the largest Italian cities spent almost 50 euros per month on tobacco and alcohol products.

The statistic above presents the share of political ads, which were aired by outside groups, in U.S. elections from 2000 to 2016. In 2016, about 25 percent of all political ads aired in the United States were done so by outside groups.

This statistic shows the leading hotel technology innovations for business travelers in North America as of September 2016. During the survey, 34 percent of the respondents stated that they would like more mobile-friendly check-in options when traveling for business.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among American voters on their opinion of major party presidential candidates before the 2016 U.S. presidential election. The survey was conducted in March 2016, and Donald Trump was leading the poll with about 59 percent of respondents expressing an unfavorable opinion of him.

This statistic shows the results of a survey in which respondents were asked to indicate their levels of trust in organizations that food that they buy is safe to eat in the United Kingdom in 2015, by level of certainty that food from outside of the EU is prepared to the highest standards. Respondents that were certain food from outside of the EU is prepared to the highest standards were more likely to trust food inspectors than food manufacturers.

As of November 2, 2020, Andrea Belotti was the Serie B footballer scoring the highest number of goals during the season 2020/2021. Overall, Belotti scored four goals, followed by Federico Chiesa ( three goals ) and Andrea Belotti ( three goals ).

This statistic shows the satisfaction with voice search and commands among smartphone users in the United States, according to a survey conducted in October 2015. As of then, 25 percent of smartphone users reported being very satisfied with voice search and commands.

This statistic shows the cadmium discharges to surface and groundwater in Canada from the mineral industry from 2005 to 2014. In 2014, the discharges of cadmium to groundwater and surface water from the mining/mineral industry in Canada amounted to 4.4 metric tons, an amount much larger than usual because of the Mount Polley dam breach that happened in British Columbia that year, which contributed 4.4 metric tons of the total cadmium discharges to water in that year.

According to a survey conducted in the United States and Canada in 2019, about 21 percent of respondents were planning to get a smart home energy storage system. However, about 39 percent of respondents were not interested in smart home energy storage.

This statistic shows the average rent of office space in the Netherlands from 2007 to 2015 ( in euros per square meter ). In 2015, the average office rent in the Netherlands was approximately 131 euros per square meter.
The statistic shows the fertility rate in Norway from 2010 to 2020. The fertility rate rose to 1.96 children per woman in 2010 but started to decline since. In 2020, the rate was 1.47 children.

This statistic shows the average net household income in Italy in 2017, by gender. According to the study, the average net income for women was 26,543 euros, while for men it amounted to 34,719 euros.

This statistic shows the gross disposable income of households in the Netherlands from the first quarter of 1999 to the third quarter of 2021. In the third quarter of 2021, the gross disposable income of households was approximately 106 billion euros.

This statistic shows the savings ratio of disposable income of households in the Netherlands from the first quarter of 2010 to the first quarter of 2021. In the first quarter of 2021, the savings ratio was 23.8 percent. This is a decrease when compared to the same quarter in the previous year.

This statistic gives information on the level of familiarity with Google Wallet according to online users in the United States as of December 2016, sorted by age group. During the survey period, 97 percent of Millennial respondents were aware of the digital payment service but only six percent used it.

This statistic shows the top ten political races in the United States in 2016, by spending by outside groups. As of August, 2016, about 753 million U.S. dollars was spent by outside groups in the race for the U.S. Senate in Colorado.
This statistic shows the total debts of the major political parties in the 2016 U.S. election cycle. As of November 2, 2016, the Democratic Party had over 47.6 million U.S. dollars in campaign debt.

This statistic displays the average healthcare costs per patient with dementia in selected countries as of 2015. In South Korea, the average costs of care for a patient with dementia amounted to over 1,200,000 U.S. dollars.

This statistic illustrates the net operating cash flow of the Italian fashion company Prada Group from 2014 to 2020. According to data, the net operating cash flow decreased overall during the period under consideration, passing from 794 million euros at the end of the financial year 2014 to approximately 269 million euros in December 2020.

In 2020, Target had a total of 1,876 stores throughout the United States, with 1,876 stores being stores and 24 distribution centers. Target Corporation operates a chain of general merchandise stores, which offer a wide variety of general merchandise and food products to their customers. The company has operated primarily in the United States since its inception.

This statistic shows estimates of the potential additional food that could be produced from existing sub-sectors of the UK food retail and manufacturing industry. Without the need for further expansion, the production of dairy products ( including milk, cheese, yoghurts, cream and butter ) in the UK would have a potential additional production of 6,000 metric tons.
This statistic shows the Gini coefficient of after-tax income in Canada from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the Gini coefficient of after-tax income in Canada was 0.3.

Germany was the leading country in terms of sales of aerothermal heat pumps in the European Union ( EU ), with over 1.3 million units sold in 2020. The United Kingdom ( UK ) followed with approximately 1.5 million units. In total, around 7.5 million units were sold across the EU in 2020.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among registered voters in the United States on how they see the 2016 Senate election results. As of November 8, 2016, about 42 percent of respondents who voted for the Democratic candidate in their district thought that Senate candidate Bernie Sanders would win the election.

The statistic displays the literacy rate in rural and urban regions of the state of Arunachal Pradesh in India in 2011, with a breakdown by gender. In that year, the literacy rate among females living in the rural areas of Arunachal Pradesh stood around 52 percent.

This statistic shows the number of travel accommodation establishments in Belgium from 2007 to 2016. In 2007 there were 3,385 travel accommodation establishments in Belgium. The figures increased in the following years.

This statistic shows the number of travel accommodation establishments in Germany from 2007 to 2017. In 2007 there were 53,738 travel accommodation establishments recorded in Germany. The figures fluctuated in the following years.

This statistic illustrates the physician and hospital drug administration costs for selected cancer drugs in the United States as of 2016. For example, the drug Herceptin, which is administered in a physician's office, generated drug administration costs of some 671 thousand U.S. dollars, while the hospital cost for the same drug was some 12.2 million U.S. dollars.
This statistic outlines the demand for copper alloy by region worldwide from 2012 to 2017. In 2017, the demand for copper alloy in North America was some 2,097 metric tons.

In 2019, the value of new private sector non-residential construction put in place in Texas reached around 45.5 billion U.S. dollars. This is more than double the value of private sector non-residential construction put in place in the second ranked state, New York, which reached around 32 billion U.S. dollars in the same year.

From March 16 to 22, 2020, amidst the COVID-19 outbreak, the number of online transactions in Argentina increased by 86 percent in comparison to the week from February 24 to March 1, 2020. The most e-commerce-oriented sector in the South American country was the food and grocery sector, with an increase of 76.8 percent in online sales. The first cases of COVID-19 in Argentina were confirmed on March 3, 2020.

This statistic displays the distribution of the annual expenditure of the British Mountaineering Council ( BMC ) between 2010 and 2019. In 2019, the BMC spent approximately 1.4 million British pounds on salaries and personal costs.

Between 2011 and 2021, the number of homicides in Italy experienced a decrease. More specifically, the amount of people murdered reached 258 in July 2021, dropping by about 100 compared to 2011. The largest number of homicides was registered in January 2011, when 556 individuals were killed.

This statistic shows the number of international tourist arrivals at accommodation establishments in Belgium from 2006 to 2019. In 2019, the number of foreign arrivals amounted to approximately 9.4 million.

This statistic shows the number of international tourist arrivals at accommodation establishments in the Czech Republic from 2006 to 2018. In 2018 there were around 10.65 million international arrivals at accommodation establishments in the Czech Republic.

This statistic shows the number of international tourist arrivals at accommodation establishments in Estonia from 2006 to 2019. In 2019, the number of foreign arrivals amounted to approximately 2.24 million.
This statistic displays the number of exhibitors at the BFI London Film Festival between 2013 and 2019, by type. In 2019, there were 28 world premieres at the BFI London Film Festival.

The statistic gives the literacy rate in rural and urban regions of the state of Kerala in India in 2011, with a breakdown by gender. In that year, the literacy rate among females living in rural areas in Kerala was around 91 percent.

The statistic displays the literacy rate in rural and urban regions of Mizoram in India in 2011, with a breakdown by gender. In that year, the literacy rate among females living in rural areas in Mizoram was around 80 percent.

The statistic displays the literacy rate in rural and urban regions of the state of Sikkim in India in 2011, with a breakdown by gender. In that year, the literacy rate among females living in rural areas in Sikkim was around 74 percent.
In the third quarter of 2021, film, TV, and video program companies in Sweden employed 12,135 people. This was a slight increase compared to the previous quarter.

As of December 2020, there were approximately 1.14 million business purpose vehicles registered in South Korea. According to the source, a business purpose vehicle was defined as an automobile or van that was used to transport goods or passengers and weigh more than 3.5 metric tons.

This statistic shows the share of people who participated in scratchcard lottery games in Wales in 2016, by age group. scratchcards are small cards with a pattern of letters or numbers that are used to win prizes. In 2016, it was found that 40 percent of the respondents between the age of 25 and 34 years, had participated in scratchcard lottery games in the last year.

This statistic illustrates the number of U.S. commercial flight collisions with birds from 2000 to 2015, by bird type. During this time period, there were 732 reported commercial flight collisions with flocks of geese in the United States.
This statistic shows the annual emissions of carbon monoxide ( CO ) in Italy from 2010 to 2016. In 2016, the emissions of carbon monoxide amounted to approximately 2.3 million kilotons.

This statistic shows the production, imports, and exports of ethane in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2019, in thousand metric tons. It shows that production decreased until 2014, but increased again over the following years, peaking at 981,000 metric tons in 2019.

The age group with the highest share of consumers who bought books and newspapers online in Norway in 2021 was in the age group 35-44 years with 56 percent of the respondents. In the age group 75-79 years, 26 percent of the respondents had bought books and newspapers online.

The statistic shows the most watched NCAA college football games in the United States in the 2016 regular season. The game between Michigan State and Notre Dame, broadcast on ABC on November 1, was watched by a total of 16.9 million viewers.
Stocks of gas and diesel oil fluctuated over the years in the United Kingdom, peaking at 4.2 million metric tons in 2012. By 2019, figures decreased by roughly 1.3 million metric tons.

The share of female enrolled in higher education in India was just over 23 percent in financial year 2015. There was an increase in the number of female students enrolled in higher education institutes across India since the passing of the Right to Education Act in 2009. However, this does not consider that many female students, especially in rural areas, drop out of school before even completing their elementary education.

The statistic gives the share of higher education enrollment in India across selected states and union territories in financial year 2015. The share of higher education enrollees in the state of Chhattisgarh was just over two percent.

This statistic shows the contribution of travel and tourism to employment in Europe in 2017, by type. Travel and tourism directly contributed approximately 14.3 million jobs to the European economy in 2017.

This statistic shows the number of housing units in France as of January 1st, 2018, by type of urban unit. At that time, France had more than 9 million housing units in urban areas with more than 100,000 inhabitants.

In financial year 2015, the number of teachers working in universities and colleges across India was around 1.25 million. There was a consistent increase in the number of teachers working in universities and colleges in the country.

This statistic shows the share of companies in Denmark which used mobile broadband connections in from 2010 to 2018. During the period, the share of companies increased annually from 43 percent in 2010, up to 94 percent in 2018.

This statistic shows the edible grocery sales forecast for Tesco in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 forecast to 2020. In 2010, Tesco made 40.69 billion US dollars in sales, which is forecast to increase to 53.26 billion US dollars by 2020.

This timeline displays the year-on-year percentage change in the retail sales volume of the total economy in Italy in 2018 with a forecast to 2022. According to data, the retail sales volume of the Italian economy is expected to increase by 0.8 percent in 2022.

This statistic presents the most popular Grammy Awards moments on Twitter, as measured by the number of mentions on the day of the ceremony, February 15, 2016. According to the source, Ed Sheeran receiving the award for Song of the Year for his single 'Thinking Out Loud'was the most popular moment of the ceremony, with over 7 million mentions on Twitter.

The statistic presents data on the frequency of using various media to get election news in the United States as of November 2016. During the survey, 14 percent of respondents stated they often used cable television news to get election news.

This statistic shows the distribution of Twitter conversation surrounding the 2016 U.S. presidential debates between Clinton and Trump as of October 19, 2016. During the second debate, Republican nominee, Donald Trump, accounted for 64 percent of Twitter buzz.

This statistic depicts the federal drug control spending by the Department of Health and Human Services in FY 2021, by agency. The National Institute on Drug Abuse and Addiction had the highest amount of federal drug control spending with some 9.7 billion U.S. dollars requested for that agency in 2021.

This statistic shows the distribution of investments in energy efficiency worldwide in 2015, broken down by sector. At this time, buildings accounted for some 53 percent of the global investments in energy efficiency.

In 2020, leather goods made up 42.4 percent of Salvatore Ferragamo's worldwide revenue. The Italian fashion company specialized in leather goods, footwear, apparel, fragrances, and accessories registered a worldwide revenue of approximately 1.3 billion euros in 2020.

As of April 2020, most Hungarians agreed with the government's decision on increasing the number of tests for coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) per capita. The highest level of disagreement was recorded among Fidesz-KDNP voters.

This statistic shows the total value of build permits issued for existing commercial real estate in the Netherlands from the fourth quarter of 2014 to the fourth quarter of 2016, by province ( in million euros ). In the fourth quarter of 2014, build permits in the province of Groningen were worth approximately 12 million euros.

This statistic shows the total number of build permits issued for existing commercial real estate in the Netherlands from the fourth quarter of 2015 to the fourth quarter of 2016, by province ( in thousands ). In the fourth quarter of 2015, the number of permits to build new commercial real estate in the province of Groningen was approximately 30,000.

The statistic displays the age structure in India between 1961 and 2010, broken down by gender. In 2010, about 52 percent of the Indian population were female, while only about 50 percent of the population were male.

This statistic represents the projected number of passenger aircraft that are to be retired from 2017 to 2036, broken down by aircraft type. By 2036, around 3,087 small single-aisle aircraft will be removed from passenger service.

In 2018, men in the Netherlands cycled on average 3.4 kilometers per day, whereas women cycled an average of 3 kilometers per day. Both genders increased their daily cycling distance from 2010 to 2018, although the rise in distance was greater for men.

This statistic presents the distribution of financial assets of high net worth individuals in the United States in the first quarter of 2015. In quarter 1, 2015, cash and cash equivalents constituted 23.8 percent of the financial assets of HNWI's in the United States.

This statistic illustrates the per capita consumption of packaged water in the European Union ( EU ) from 2010 to 2020. In 2010, 102.3 liters of packaged water were consumed per person in the EU, which increased to 109.1 liters per person by 2020.

This statistic shows the share of diet soft drinks in the European Union ( EU-28 ) from 2011 to 2019. The share of diet soft drinks has gradually increased over the years to a total of 24 percent in 2019.

This statistic shows the annual growth of the total retail sales value in Hong Kong from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the retail sales value in Hong Kong had decreased by approximately 24 percent, compared to the previous year.

This statistic presents the leading crowdfunding platforms in the United States as of May 2017, by number of offerings. In that month, there were 438 offerings on Crowdcube. Crowdcube is a platform for social fundraising, allowing individuals to create fundraising projects and collect money online.

According to a survey conducted in Indonesia in February 2020, about 63 percent of the respondents who had not changed their travel plans for Indonesia's national holiday, would keep going with their holiday plan despite the outbreak of the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2. Indonesia's President, Joko  Jokowi  Widodo announced the first two confirmed cases of the disease in the country on March 2, 2020. Before the announcement, Indonesia had no confirmed cases of COVID-19, raising concerns about the country  s ability to detect the virus.

This statistic presents the total volume of diesel consumption of foreign heavy vehicles in France from 2004 to 2018. In 2018, the diesel consumption of foreign heavy vehicles was more than 3.4 million cubic meters.

This statistic shows the mean out-of-pocket expenses per office-based physician visit in the United States in 2016, by specialty. The mean total out-of-pocket expense per office based physician visit in the specialty of cardiology stood at some 106 U.S. dollars, whereas the overall mean expense was at some 76 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults aged 18 years and older that reported difficulty sleeping due to environmental factors as of 2014. It was found that 25 percent of respondents reported having difficulty sleeping due to the temperature in their bedroom.

Google was the leading search engine in Norway, holding a market share of 97 percent as of October 2021. Yahoo was ranked second with a 1.6 percent market share. The figures were similar for desktop search engines in the country. Google's growth can be seen in the company's revenue figures over the years, with a dramatical increase from 0.4 billion U.S. dollars in 2002, to over 160 billion U.S. dollars in 2019.

This statistic shows the most commonly purchased over-the-counter sleep remedies in the United States in 2015. The survey revealed that 44 percent of respondents buy NyQuilze or DayQuilze, making it the most popular over-the-counter sleep remedy.

This statistic displays the number of flight departures between Canada and the Netherlands from 2010 to 2019. In 2019, there were approximately 2.2 million flight departures between the two countries.
With a turnover of over 30 billion Swedish kronor, Meritor HVS AB, was the leading company in Kronoberg county in February 2021. Ranked second was Klvern AB, turning over nearly 25 billion kronor.

With a turnover of roughly 18.5 billion Swedish kronor, Meritor HVS AB, was the leading company in Uppsala county as of February 2021. Ranked second was Clas Ohlson AB, generating a turnover of around 6.8 billion kronor.

With a turnover of roughly 5.3 billion Swedish kronor, Meritor HVS AB, was the leading company in Vsterbotten county in February 2021. Ranked second was Clas Ohlson AB, with a turnover of around 3.3 billion kronor.
With 1,407 employees, Meritor HVS AB was the largest company in Vsterbotten county as of March 2021. Ranked second was Klvern AB counting 994 employees.

With over 18 thousand employees, Meritor HVS AB was the largest company in stergtland county as of March 2021. Ranked second was Eberspcher Exhaust Technology Sweden AB counting over 17 thousand employees.

The outbreak of the coronavirus epidemic in Poland had a significant impact on the tourism industry. In the first quarter of 2020, the number of tourists decreased by 23 percent compared to the same period last year, and by 27 percent compared to the first quarter of 2019.

The turnover of the machinery and equipment manufacturing industry in Bosnia & Herzegovina saw no significant changes in 2019 in comparison to the previous year 2018. Nevertheless, 2019 still represents a peak in turnover in this industry in Bosnia & Herzegovina with 185.3 million euros.

This statistic shows the market share of tea in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, based on value. Black tea makes up the majority of the tea market at 69.6 percent, followed by fruit and herbal teas at 12.2 percent.

Gross electricity production in Belgium in 2020 showed that fossil-fueled electricity plants were still the main power producers in the country. However, wind and solar power plants increased their production significantly, reaching 1.1 billion and 438 million metric tons of oil equivalent, respectively. In total, electricity production in Belgium amounted to 7.3 billion metric tons of oil equivalent.

The personnel costs of the wearing apparel manufacturing industry in Bosnia & Herzegovina saw an addition of 4.9 million euros in 2019. Therefore, the personnel costs in Bosnia & Herzegovina reached a peak in 2019 with 70 million euros. This could be explained by the fact that Eurostat reports a break in time series for 2017. Notably, the personnel costs in this industry is continuously increasing over the last years.

This statistic shows the annual turnover of the manufacture of basic pharmaceutical products and pharmaceutical preparations in Turkey from 2009 to 2014. In 2014, this industry produced a turnover of approximately 3.5 billion euros.
In fiscal year 2021, India exported silk worth over 14.8 billion Indian rupees. This was a decrease in value of exports from the previous financial year in the country.
In financial year 2020, the fish catch volume in India was approximately 12 million metric tons. There was a consistent growth in the volume of fish catch since financial year 2001.

This statistic shows the share of individuals who had shopped online in Iceland from 2005 to 2014, by gender. The share of female online shoppers had increased to 66 percent in 2014 from a value of 37 percent in 2005.
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the water transport industry in North Macedonia from 2012 to 2016. In 2016, there were 11 water transport enterprises in North Macedonia.

Data on the number of hate crimes recorded by the police in England and Wales in 2020/21, by police force area, shows that the London Metropolitan Police recorded over 24 thousand cases of hate crime, the most of any police force in England and Wales.

According to the results of a survey conducted during the first week of a nation-wide lockdown due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in India, mobile apps for business saw a spike in usage. Around 80 percent of the respondents stated that they had used the video calling app, Zoom Video, more than in the previous week.

This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the manufacture of leather and related products industry in Turkey from 2009 to 2014. In 2014, this industry had personnel costs of approximately 402.3 million euros.

This statistic illustrates the potential use of Industry 4.0 functions by companies in Italy in 2015, by type. During the survey period, it was found that 86 percent of Italian companies reported the potential use of data collection as a Industry 4.0 function.

This statistic shows annual production value of the manufacture of wearing apparel industry in North Macedonia from 2011 to 2017. In 2016, the production value of this industry came to approximately 265.4 million euros.

Data on the number of hate crimes commited against transgender people in England and Wales in 2020/21, by police force area, shows that the London Metropolitan Police recorded the highest number of such crimes, at 292.

This statistic represents the amount of water used in power plants in the United States as of September 2016, broken down by energy source. Nuclear power plants used approximately 710.5 gallons of water per megawatt hour to generate electricity.

This statistic shows the distribution of prisoners under jurisdiction of federal or state correctional authorities in the United States in 2020, by sex and age. As of December 2020, about 19.2 percent of prisoners under federal or state jurisdiction were between the ages of 30 and 34.

This statistic shows the value of imports of plastic apparel and clothing accessories into the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2020. In 2020, the import value of these goods was approximately 1.44 billion U.S. dollars.

Data on the number of racially motivated hate crimes recorded by the police in England and Wales from 2011/12 to 2020/21 shows that after reaching a low of 36,812 cases in 2011/12, the number of racially motivated hate crimes has increased year-on-year. In 2020/21, the number of racially motivated hate crimes reached 9,247 cases.

In 2020, imports of rubber clothing and accessories, except hard rubber, into the United Kingdom ( UK ) were valued at approximately 1.17 billion U.S. dollars. This constitutes to an increase of almost 551 million U.S. dollars in comparison to 2019.

This statistic shows the total population of Germany from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the total population of Germany was around 83.16 million people. See figures for the population of Italy for comparison.

According to a survey carried out in Great Britain in April 2020, it was found that the top priority for the British public during the coronavirus lockdown is to ensure that essential workers have the necessary PPE to do their job safely. This was followed by making sure that vulnerable people, such as the elderly, are looked after safely, while 30 percent of respondents said their top priority during the lockdown is to make sure that there are no major economic problems.

In the fourth quarter of 2021, London registered approximately 78.5 thousand hotel nights spent by visitors from the Netherlands. In the previous quarter, approximately 80 thousand hotel nights were registered in London from Dutch visitors.
In 2019, there were approximately 1.4 million new life insurance policies issued in Singapore. In that year, the total amount insured amounted to 1.22 trillion Singapore dollars.

This statistic illustrates the areas of the most famous Italian wineries in Italy in 2016. According to data, among the most famous Italian wineries were the Veneto-based companies Botter S.p.A. and Zonin SA with an area of 263.4 hectares.

This statistic illustrates the share of total freight train kilometers operated by various train operators in Great Britain ( UK ) between 2010 and 2021. During this period, the total amount of freight transported by all operators increased. However, the market share of some operators fluctuated over the years. For example, in 2019/20, only 0.16 percent of all freight was transported by National Express East Anglia ( NXEA ). In 2020/21, this share increased to 0.09 percent.

This statistic shows the usage of online banking credentials for various online services in Finland in 2016. During the period under survey, roughly 20 percent of internet users with online banking credentials used those credentials frequently to verify online orders.

This statistic displays the level of knowledge of respondents regarding antibiotics in Estonia, in 2018. Antibiotics are medications that can kill or hinder the growth of bacteria which cause infections in people and animals. Antibiotics are not used to treat viruses. In 2018, 83 percent of respondents incorrectly answered when asked if antibiotics could kill viruses. 28 percent of respondents answered incorrectly when asked if antibiotics are effective against cold or flu, while 82 percent of respondents answered correctly when asked if unnecessary use of antibiotics could make them ineffective.

In fiscal year 2021, India imported electronic products to the value of over 3.9 trillion Indian rupees. This was a slight increase in import value of electronic products compared to the previous fiscal year in the country.

This statistic displays how individuals first got the information about not taking any antibiotics unnecessarily in Greece, in 2018. Antibiotics are medications that can kill or hinder the growth of bacteria which cause infections in people and animals. Antibiotic resistance occurs when there is a mutation in the bacteria's genes, however excessive use of antibiotics can also lead to the spread of antibiotic resistant bacteria. In 2018, 49 percent of respondents in Greece reported that they first got the information about not taking antibiotics unnecessarily from a doctor, this was followed by 33 percent of respondents who reported that they saw the information on TV.

This statistic displays the response of individuals when asked at what level they believe it is most effective to tackle resistance to antibiotics in Greece, in 2018. Antibiotics are medications that can kill or hinder the growth of bacteria which cause infections in people and animals. Antibiotic resistance occurs when there is a mutation in the bacteria's genes, however excessive use of antibiotics can also lead to the spread of antibiotic resistant bacteria. In 2018, 29 percent of respondents believed that antibiotic resistance should be tackled at national level whereas only five percent of respondents believed that antibiotic resistance should be tackled at the individual level or within the family.

This statistic displays the share of individuals who received information not to take antibiotics unnecessarily in Spain, in 2016, by country. Antibiotics are medications that can kill or hinder the growth of bacteria which cause infections in people and animals. Antibiotic resistance occurs when there is a mutation in the bacteria's genes, however excessive use of antibiotics can also lead to the spread of antibiotic resistant bacteria. In 2016, 76 percent of respondents in Spain reported that they did not remember receiving any information not to take antibiotics unnecessarily, this was above the European Union average at 65 percent.

Capital ratios express a bank  s capital as a percentage of its risk-weighted assets ( RWAs ). Capital requirements for European banks were raised after the Basel III accord and phased in on the 1st of January 2015, with a new minimum requirement of CET1 ratio of 4.5 percent. The United Kingdom's largest banks have all continued to meet the minimum requirement up to the 4th quarter of 2020.

This statistic displays how respondents obtained their last course of antibiotics in Finland, in 2018. Antibiotics are medications that can kill or hinder the growth of bacteria which cause infections in people and animals. In 2018, 82 percent of respondents in Finland reported that they had obtained their last course of antibiotics from a medical practitioner.
In September 2021, Italy registered approximately 22.7 million employed people. Between January 2020 and September 2021, the number of employed individuals experienced a constant decrease.

This statistic displays the import value of photosensitive semiconductor devices in Germany from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the import value of such devices in Germany amounted to approximately 1.69 billion euros.

This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the United States in March 2017, by gender. U.S. adults were asked about their level of satisfaction with the hospital treatment they received in the preceding five years. In total, 48 percent of female respondents indicated that they were very satisfied with their hospital treatment in the preceding five years, compared to 51 percent of male respondents.

This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the United States in March 2017, by age. U.S. adults were asked about their level of satisfaction with the hospital treatment they received in the preceding five years. In total, around 42 percent of those aged 18 to 29 years reported that they were very satisfied with their hospital treatment, compared to 61 percent of those aged 61 years and older.

This statistic displays the import value of photosensitive semiconductor devices in Luxembourg from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the import value of such devices in Luxembourg amounted to approximately 81.28 million euros.

This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the United States in March 2017. U.S. adults were asked about characteristics of hospitals that are most important to them. In total, 82 percent of respondents stated that the friendliness and treatment of staff was an important characteristic of a hospital.

This statistic displays the import value of photosensitive semiconductor devices in Romania from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the import value of such devices in Romania amounted to approximately 17.14 million euros.
This statistic shows the distribution of employed males in Vietnam in 2013, by sector. In that year, 29.8 percent of employed men in Vietnam were working in the service sector.

This statistic shows the result of a survey on most played video games among boys aged 9 to 12 years in Norway in 2015, according to their parents. The game about the famous Norwegian television character 'Fantor'was the most popular video game among boys aged 9 to 12 years ( 22 percent of children ). 'Minecraft'( 55 percent of individuals ) ranked second.

Argentina is the Latin American country with the largest number of permanent meadows and pastures. In 2016, these areas added up to nearly 1.1 million hectares, out of which more than 400 thousand were arable land and permanent crops. The total area of forests in Argentina has been decreasing since the beginning of the 21st century.

This statistic displays the export value of photosensitive semiconductor devices in Greece from 2009 to 2018. In 2018, the export value of such devices in Greece amounted to approximately 2.47 million euros.

In 2018, around 10.2 percent of children in the United States aged 3 to 17 years had one or more respiratory allergies in the past 12 months. This statistic shows the percentage of children in the U.S. with respiratory allergies in the past year as of 2018, by gender.

This statistic displays the percentage of children in the U.S. who had food allergies in the past 12 months as of 2018, by ethnicity. In that year, 5.6 percent of white children had food allergies in the past year.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults that could select the correct answer for select questions regarding hospital care providers in the U.S. in 2017, by gender. According to the data, among both genders, the largest number of respondents could select 'ambulatory care provider'as the correct answer.

This statistic shows the most important challenges the small and medium enterprise ( SME ) face in Germany as of April 2018. From the responding SMEs, 78 percent stated that their most important challenge was attracting new customers.

This statistic shows the most important challenges the small and medium enterprise ( SME ) face in the Netherlands as of April 2018. From the responding SMEs, 76 percent stated that their most important challenge was attracting new customers.

This statistic shows the share of small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in Italy engaged in international trade from February 2016 to January 2018. From the responding SMEs in February 2017, 17 percent were conducting business with international partners.

This statistic shows the distribution of small and medium enterprises ( SME ) employees in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from February 2016 to January 2018, by employment size band. From the responding SMEs in February 2017, 32 percent had between 10 and 19 employees.

This statistic depicts the share of organizations that have experienced a ransomware attack in the past 12 months, sorted by the type of solution implemented. During the 2016 survey period, it was found that 35 percent of responding organizations that had experienced a ransomware attack had implemented security software filters and rules to prevent attacks.
This statistic shows the age of the small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in France as of April 2018. From the respondents, 26 percent of the SMEs were between one and three years old.

This statistic presents the average pricing of banking services offered by banks in France as of January 2017. At that time, the average price for basic banking services such as current account management or checking of the account balance was around 45 euros.

This statistic shows the age of the small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in Sweden from December 2016 to February 2017. From the respondents, 21 percent of the SMEs were between one and three years old.

This statistic shows the gender distribution of the management of the small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in Germany as of April 2018. From the respondents, 20 percent had mainly female management while in 59 percent of the SMEs the management was predominately male.

This statistic shows the gender distribution of the management of the small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in Spain as of April 2018. From the respondents, 26 percent had mainly female management while in 48 percent of the SMEs the management was predominately male.

This statistic shows the proportion of input sourced directly abroad in the small and medium enterprises ( SMEs ) in Ireland from October 2016 to February 2017. From the responding SMEs exporting in February 2017, 36 percent stated that they sourced less than 25 percent of their inputs directly abroad.

This statistic describes the estimated number of people living with HIV in Indonesia from 2000 to 2018. In 2018, there were around 636 thousand people living with HIV in Indonesia, compared to around 100 thousand in 2000.

This statistic shows the harmonized consumer price index for the health sector in Serbia from December 2017 to August 2020. In August 2020, the consumer price index for the health sector stood at 109.02 points. This was a slight decrease from the previous month.
In 2019, China accounted for some 51.5 percent of the world's total production of float glass. In the same year, Asia and Oceania accounted for 12.1 percent of the world's float glass production.

This statistic depicts the number of Italian individuals who did not go on holiday in 2018, broken down by age group. According to data, the largest group of people who did not go on holiday was aged 65 years and over ( 10 million individuals ), whereas the smallest group of individuals who did not go on holiday was aged between 25 and 34 years ( 3 million individuals ).

In the financial year 2019, a total of 1.45 billion metric tons of cargo was exported from Australia. In that same year, an export trade surplus of around 23.8 billion Australian dollars was recorded.

This statistic shows the share of households in North Macedonia that used a desktop or portable computer to access the internet from 2004 to 2014. The share of households in North Macedonia that used a desktop or portable computer to access the internet grew from 9.3 percent in 2004 to 66.5 percent in 2014.

According to April 2020 survey data of adults in the United States, nine percent of male respondents were currently using Match.com. Only four percent of female survey respondents confirmed being users of the social dating site.

In 2020, Sweden was the major importer of main clothing from Finland. Over one quarter of the total exports of clothing from Finland went to Sweden, amounting to 24.6 million euros. Germany was the second major importer, receiving 15.3 million euros worth of clothing.

In 2020, the most important clothing importer to Finland was China with a share of 39.6 percent in the total clothing imports. The second most imported clothing came from Bangladesh with a share of 10.1 percent. Other major clothing importers to Finland that year were Turkey, Sweden, Vietnam, and other countries.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the share of government entities using Twitter in Italy from 2014 to 2015. During the survey period, it was found that 100 percent of the metropolitan cities reported to use Twitter.

This statistic displays the number of likes on the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Venice in Italy from 2014 to 2015. The Facebook like button is a feature that allows the user to show their support for specific comments, pictures, wall posts, statuses or fan pages as the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Venice. According to data, the number of likes on the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Venice increased positively passing from 8,432 in March 2014 to 9,098 in March 2015.

This statistic displays the number of deaths as a result of ischemic heart disease in Sweden from 2000 to 2014, by gender. The number of deaths among males due to ischemic heart disease decreased from 335 in 2000 to 168 in 2014.

This statistic shows the total assets of Bausch Health from 2012 to 2021. Bausch Health Companies Inc. was known as Valeant Pharmaceuticals until July 2018 when the name was changed under a new company leadership. In 2021, the total assets of Bausch Health stood at some 28.9 billion U.S. dollars.
In the third quarter of 2019, fixed telephony lines accounted for 95.8 percent of the telephony lines in Mexico, with residential lines making up 95.8 percent of the lines.

This statistic shows the total operating expenses of Bausch Health from 2013 to 2021. Bausch Health Companies Inc. was known as Valeant Pharmaceuticals until July 2018 when the name was changed under a new company leadership. In 2021, the total operating expenses of Bausch Health stood at some 7.9 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic displays the number of posts of the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Genoa in Italy from 2014 to 2015. Nowadays Facebook is used by public administrations as tool where citizens can participate to discussions and share their feelings about relevant topics. According to data, the number of posts of the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Genoa decreased negatively from 7.02 in March 2014 to 4.35 in March 2015.

This statistic displays the number of posts of the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Naples in Italy from 2014 to 2015. Nowadays Facebook is used by public administrations as tool where citizens can participate to discussions and share their feelings about relevant topics. According to data, the number of posts of the Facebook page of the metropolitan city of Naples increased passing from 1,907 in March 2014 to 3,297 in March 2015.

In 2017, the early-onset Alzheimer's disease diagnostic rate was 4.5 per 100,000 population among those aged 30 to 44 years, compared to a rate of 5.1 among those aged 55 to 64 years. This statistic illustrates the early-onset Alzheimer's disease diagnostic rate in the U.S. in 2013 and 2017, by age.

This statistic displays the number of enterprises in the processing and preserving of poultry meat products in Italy from 2008 to 2017. In 2017, there were 96 enterprises in the processing and preserving of poultry meat industry in Italy.

This statistic displays the number of enterprises in the operation of dairies and cheese making industry in Spain from 2008 to 2017. In 2017, there were 1,239 enterprises in the operation of dairies and cheese making in Spain.

This statistic shows the customer utility perceptions of the energy supplier market in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2016. The majority of respondents for each category agree to some extent with the statements provided. 20 percent of respondents strongly agree that they are satisfied with the variety of suppliers available, while 33 percent of respondents strongly disagree that they are satisfied with the variety of suppliers available.

This statistic shows the forecasts of the supermarkets sales in Italy between 2017 and 2021. According to the study, the supermarkets sales will increase in the country from 43 billion euros in 2017 to approximately 44 billion euros in 2021.

This statistic displays the rate of concussions for those aged under 65 years in the U.S. in 2015, by state. As of that year, the rate of concussions in Alabama for this age group stood at 7.2 per 1,000 members.
In 2021, the transfer fees of Premier League soccer clubs amounted to approximately 1.7 billion euros. This represented a decrease of around 25 percent on the previous year's total.

This statistic shows the usage of electronic medical records ( EMR ) by primary care physicians in Canada from 2004 to 2018. In 2018, around 84 percent of primary care physicians in Canada used electronic medical records.

This statistic illustrates the total value of financial assets of pension funds within the euro area ( EU ) from the first quarter of 2015 to the second quarter of 2019. It can be seen that the total value of financial assets of pension funds increased overall during the period under observation, reaching a value of almost 2.9 trillion euros as of the second quarter of 2019.

In the fiscal year 2020, the revenue of Japan Airlines Co., Ltd. ( JAL ) amounted to approximately 5.2 trillion Japanese yen, down from about 1.4 trillion yen in the previous fiscal year. According to the source, the spread of COVID-19 and the associated decline in domestic air travel demand was responsible for this decrease.

In 2021, Brazil scored 0.66 in the gender gap index area of economic participation and opportunity. This means that women are 34 percent less likely to have equal economic participation and opportunities than men. That year, Brazil scored 0.53 in estimated earned income, which shows that, on average, women in Brazil only earn 53 percent of the income earned by men.

According to April 2020 survey data of adults in the United States, four percent of respondents living in suburban communities were currently using eHarmony. Adults living in rural areas were most likely to use the social dating site, as six percent of respondents from that category confirmed being current users.

This statistic presents the average stadium utilization of professional football matches of Ladbrokes Premiership in Scotland from 2010 to 2017. In 2017, the average stadium of Ladbrokes Premiership was utilized at 71.7 percent.

The statistic shows the average annual pay of restaurant employees in the United States in 2019, by state. According to the source, restaurant employees in Hawaii earned an average of 30.15 U.S. dollars an hour in 2019.

In the United Kingdom in 2021, average weekly earnings for all workers increased by 4.7 percent when compared with the previous year, after adjusting for inflation. In the three months to December 2021, the average usual weekly earnings in the UK increased by 4.5 percent when compared with the three months to December 2020.

During a survey held in March 2018, it was found that 72 percent of respondents aged 16 to 19 years old had streamed music via Spotify in the six months preceding the survey. This makes them the age group most likely to use Spotify, although the service is also popular with 45 percent of respondents aged 25 to 34 years old.

This statistic shows the average expenditure per consumer on selected music activities in the United States as of 2018. During the survey, respondents stated that they spent an average of 100 to 199 U.S. dollars per consumer on music activities in the past 12 months.
This statistic illustrates the volume of air freight handled at Vagar Airport in the Faroe Islands from 2009 to 2021. In 2021, the volume of freight amounted to 700 metric tons.

This statistic shows the median basic pay for employees in the United Kingdom ( UK ) for April 2019, by gender and age group. With men consistently earning more basic pay than their female colleagues, the largest difference can be found in individuals between the ages of 50 to 59 years, with men earning 593.78 British pounds, whilst women earned 375.62 British pounds.

This statistic gives information on the share of internet users in Peru in 2016, broken down by education level. In 2016, around 34 percent of internet users in Peru had completed university, while 22 percent had only finished secondary school.

In 2021, the average annual growth in wages for full-time employees in the United Kingdom was lower for men than for women. For men, the average annual growth in wages for full-time employees was minus 1.3 percent, compared with 1.4 percent for women.

This statistic provides information on the mobile telephony user penetration in Peru from 2012 to 2016. During a survey it was found that 78 percent of Peruvians owned a mobile telephony line, up from 62.3 percent in 2012.

According to a survey conducted in Indonesia in February 2020, 63 percent of the respondents who had not bought tickets for overseas travel stated they would still stick with their traveling plan and buy the ticket. Indonesia's President, Joko  Jokowi  Widodo confirmed the first two confirmed cases of the disease in the country on March 2, 2020. Before the announcement, Indonesia had no confirmed cases of COVID-19, raising concerns about the country  s ability to detect the virus.

According to April 2020 survey data of adults in the United States, 11 percent of respondents with an income of 100,000 U.S. dollars and greater used OkCupid. Respondents with lower incomes were less likely to use the social dating app.

This statistic shows the imports volume of processed meat to Argentina from 2012 to 2018. In 2018, the processed meat imports to Argentina amounted to over 245 thousand kilograms, up from more than 47.8 thousand kilograms recorded a year earlier.

In 2021, the median annual growth in earnings for full-time employees in the United Kingdom was minus 0.7 percent, compared with the previous year. During the provided time period, the annual growth in median earnings fluctuated, with the largest growth occurring in 2000, at 5.9 percent.

This statistic depicts the proportion of all hospitals that are part of non-profit systems in the United States from 1995 to 2016. According to the data, in 1995, 17 percent of all hospitals were part of a non-profit system, while in 2016, 35 percent are part of non-profit systems.

This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of beverages industry in Bosnia and Herzegovina from 2011 to 2015. In 2015, there were an estimated 111 enterprises manufacturing beverages in Bosnia.

In 2021, Honduras scored 0.72 in the gender gap index, which shows a gender gap of approximately 28 percent ( women are 28 percent less likely than men to have equal opportunities ). Political empowerment is the gender gap index area where Honduras scores the worst.

This statistic presents the leading YouTube entertainment channels in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of August 2018, ranked by number of subscribers. As of the survey period, KSI Zai Lab was the most subscribed YouTube entertainment channel, with almost 17.5 million subscribers.

This statistic presents the number of athletes from Latin America and the Caribbean participating in the 2018 PyeongChang Winter Games, sorted by sports discipline. Out of a total of 37 athletes from this region, eleven were to compete in bobsleigh.

This statistic shows the total population of Puerto Rico from 2008 to 2020, by gender. In 2020, Puerto Rico's female population amounted to approximately 1.66 million, while the male population amounted to approximately 1.49 million inhabitants.

In 2020, the population of Puerto Rico was estimated at almost 3.2 million inhabitants, of which more than 1.03 million were women between 15 and 64 years old. The youngest age range - from 0 to 14 years - is the only one where the male population exceeds that of women.

This statistic shows the percentage of adults who bought technology gifts for Christmas in the United States from 2005 to 2017. The survey revealed that nine percent of the respondents are planning to buy technology gifts for Christmas in 2017.
Nearly half of the respondents stated that they would visit shopping centers only two weeks after the reopening of shopping malls in Poland in 2020.

This statistic shows the house price index in Austria from the first quarter of 2016 to the second quarter of 2020. In the quarter ending June 2020, the house price index stood at 134.92. This was a slight decrease from the value in the previous year.

The statistic shows Laos'budget balance in relation to GDP between 2016 and 2020, with projections up until 2026. A positive value indicates a budget surplus, a negative value indicates a deficit. In 2020, Laos'budget deficit amounted to around 4.92 percent of GDP.

The statistic shows the distribution of employment in Laos by economic sector from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, 61.44 percent of the employees in Laos were active in the agricultural sector, 13.01 percent in industry and 26.09 percent in the service sector.
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Laos in 2019. In 2019, the most important export partner of Laos was Thailand, with a share of 36 percent in exports.

This statistic shows the number of countries competing at the 2016 Youth Olympics Games in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, by continent. A total of 46 athletes from Europe will be competing at the 2016 Youth Olympics.

This statistic shows the total population of Sub-Saharan Africa from 2010 to 2020. Sub-Saharan Africa includes all countries south of the Sahara desert. In 2020, the total population of Sub-Saharan Africa amounted to approximately 1.14 billion inhabitants.

The statistic presents data on the share of consumers who have seen, want to see, or at least heard of the movie  Lady Bird  in the United States as of February 2018. During a survey, 19 percent of respondents stated they wanted to see the movie  Lady Bird .

The statistic presents data on the share of consumers who have seen, want to see, or at least heard of the movie  Roman J. Israel, Esq.  in the United States as of February 2018. During a survey, ten percent of respondents stated they wanted to see the movie  Roman J. Israel, Esq. .

This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Sub-Saharan Africa from 2009 to 2019. Sub-Saharan Africa includes almost all countries south of the Sahara desert. In 2019, the average life expectancy at birth in Sub-Saharan Africa was 61.68 years.

What is the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Greenland? From 2011 to 2019, the GDP increased annually. In 2011, it amounted to roughly 14 billion Danish kroner, and in 2019, the GDP reached 19.9 billion Danish kroner.

In 2020, due to the coronavirus pandemic ( COVID-19 ) in Poland, many shops had to close down. When they reopen, more than half of the respondents will visit clothing shops. Every third Pole plans to visit interior and garden equipment stores, and every fourth person intends to visit shoe stores.

The turnover of the pharmaceutical industry in Italy decreased in 2019 compared to the previous years. In fact, in 2018 the revenue of the Italian pharmaceutical sector amounted to 15.1 billion euros, whereas in 2019 it decreased to 14.5 billion euros.

This statistic represents United Parcel Service of America's ( UPS ) ground delivery fleet size in 2016, broken down by segment. In that year, United Parcel Service had 108,000 vehicles for its package operations.

This statistic illustrates the main reasons for the use of blockchain technology among businesses in Italy as of 2017. The majority of respondents, 67 percent, believed that the main use of blockchain would be in the area of asset management.

This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in the Arab world ( Arab League ) countries in 2020. Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country. In 2020, 79.5 percent of Syria's total population lived in urban areas and cities.

In 2021, Mexico was the Latin American country with the worst gender pay gap index, with 0.87 points. This means that, on average, women's income in Mexico represented only 87 percent of the income earned by men. The Dominican Republic was the country with the best gender pay gap index in the region that year, with 0.65 points.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Bhutan from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Bhutan was at about 23.9 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Botswana from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Botswana was at about 32.3 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Brazil from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Brazil was at about 12.5 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Chile from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Chile was at about 6 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in China from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in China was at about 6.9 deaths per 1,000 live births.

As of June 15, 2021, over 625.9 thousand confirmed cases of coronavirus were reported in Belgium. With over 159 thousand positive tests combined, the provinces of Lige and Hainaut registered the most COVID-19 infections in the country. On the other hand, the Belgian province of Luxembourg registered the fewest cases.

This statistic shows Kuehne + Nagel's expenditure on research and development from the fiscal year of 2011 to the fiscal year of 2021. In the fiscal year of 2021, the logistics company spent around 6.2 billion Swiss francs on research and development.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Denmark from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Denmark was at about 3.2 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Eritrea from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Eritrea was at about 30.5 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Greece from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Greece was at about 3.3 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Guinea from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the infant mortality rate in Guinea was at about 62.1 deaths per 1,000 live births.

This statistic shows the estimated percentage of elderly people in developed countries who have experienced depression as of 2017, by country. According to the data, among the elderly in the Netherlands, some 14.5 percent had experienced depression as of 2017.

This statistic shows the volume of frozen broiler meat imported to South Africa in 2016, by category. In 2016, South Africa imported 24 thousand metric tons of frozen carcass portions to South Africa.

This survey shows the estimated percentage of Canadian seniors aged 65 years and older that had experienced emotional distress within the past two years as of 2017, by province. According to the data, around 20.1 percent of older adults in Ontario had experienced emotional distress within the past two years.

This statistic shows the rate of drug events that were originated in U.S. hospitals in 2010 and 2014, by drug type. The rate of drug event that were originated in U.S. hospitals due to systemic agents/analgesics was 27.4 per 10,000 hospital stays in 2010.

The statistic shows the leading Overwatch League teams on Facebook worldwide as of February 2018, ranked by number of fans. As of the measured period, the most followed Overwatch League team on Facebook was the Dallas Fuel, with almost 11.2 thousand fans, followed by the San Francisco Shock, with over 5.2 thousand fans.

As of 2018, the most commonly spoken languages outside of South Africa were Nguni and English. This is similar to the languages spoken within the country, which were Nguni and English. The most common language spoken within South Africa was Afrikaans, which is also the country's official language. However, an increasing number of South Africans speak English and other languages.

This statistic depicts the most popular reasons to go out for an aperitif in Italy in 2017. According to survey results, 24 percent of respondents preferred to have an aperitif to celebrate a special occasion, while 20 percent of them chose it as a treat for themselves.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Sierra Leone from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Sierra Leone was at about 81 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Singapore from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Singapore was at about 2.1 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Spain from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Spain was at about 2.6 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Switzerland from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the infant mortality rate in Switzerland was at about 3.5 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Timor-Leste from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in Timor-Leste was at about 38.1 deaths per 1,000 live births.
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in the United Kingdom from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the infant mortality rate in the United Kingdom was at about 3.7 deaths per 1,000 live births.
This statistic presents the annual revenue of Keppel DC REIT in Singapore from 2014 to 2017. In 2017, Keppel DC REIT generated a revenue of approximately 129 million Singapore dollars.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Djibouti from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Djibouti was at approximately 11.58 percent.

This statistic shows the opinion of staffing firm employees about the best sources of candidates in the North American staffing industry in 2018. During the survey, 63 percent of the respondents stated that they believed social media websites were the best source of candidates for staffing positions.

In 2018, the largest land area in Brazil was occupied by forests, amounting to nearly 4 million square kilometers, followed by the areas occupied by wetlands, which reached approximately 1.5 million square kilometers that year. The Brazilian state with the largest forest area in 2018 was Amazonas, with over 2 million square kilometers of forest.

During fiscal year 2020, the gross hydroelectricity generation across India was about 156 billion kilowatt hours. Being the third largest producer as well as consumer of electricity in the world, the country's national electric grid had an installed generation capacity of approximately 370 gigawatts.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Bangladesh from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Bangladesh was at approximately 5.27 percent.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Benin from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Benin was at approximately 2.54 percent.

In 2021, the corruption perception index score of the Bahamas amounted to 63 points, a slight improvement in comparison to the previous year. The Bahamas ranked as the second country, after Uruguay, with the best corruption perception in Latin America.

In Costa Rica, the corruption perception index score remained constant at 58 points in 2020 and 2021, a slight improvement in comparison to the previous two years. Costa Rica has seen better corruption perception levels from 2012 to 2016, when the score stood at 59 points. The worst possible score in perception of corruption is 0, whereas a score of 100 indicates that no corruption is perceived in the respective country.

The prospects of investment and development in the house building real estate market in Europe are expected to recover in 2022 from a significant decline in 2021 according to industry experts. The sectors with highest prospect scores in 2022 were new energy infrastructure, life sciences, and logistic facilities.

In December 2019, Negin Mirsalehi ( @ neginmirsalehi ) was the most-followed of all Instagram influencers coming from the Netherlands. This according to data provided by InfluencerDB. The Iranian-Dutch fashion blogger fits in a larger trend : Dutch influencers either have a background in music ( such as rappers Lil'Kleine and Boef ), or they were involved in beauty or fashion. Examples of the latter category were bodybuilder and DJ Tavi Castro, Moroccan Dutch `` Mimi '' or Meryem van Os-Karin, Monica Geuze ( @ monicageuze ), `` Nikkietutorials '' or Nikkietutorials, and makeup artist Nikki de Jager ( @ nikkijander ). FC Barcelona footballer Lieke Martens ( @ liekemartens ) was ranked ninth.

As of December 2019, the Dutch artist Mariana di Vaio was the most-followed artist from the Netherlands on Instagram. All entries in this ranking are artists with an Instagram account who were born in the Netherlands or resided in the country and whose work is predominantly visual. The artist is famous for her paintings of landscapes, seascapes, flowers and fruit. The Instagram account of the Dutch artist Nikki de Jager ( born in Amsterdam in 1986 ) was ranked second. This account focuses on the artist's personal life and travels. It was followed by the account of the late Dutch artist Rema Hennings ( born in Amsterdam in 1955 ).
